*                                                                  0642 02126000
*         /***********************************************************/ 02127000
*         /*                                                         */ 02128000
*         /* FLUSH THE STACK BUFFER BEFORE MAKING CHANGES.           */ 02129000
*         /*                                                         */ 02130000
*         /***********************************************************/ 02131000
*                                                                  0643 02132000
*         CALL STACKFL;                                            0643 02133000
*                                                                  0643 02134000
@RF00637 BAL   @14,STACKFL                                         0643 02135000
*         /***********************************************************/ 02136000
*         /*                                                         */ 02137000
*         /* CONVERT AND RETURN THE PAGE NUMBER TO THE CALLERS AREA. */ 02138000
*         /*                                                         */ 02139000
*         /***********************************************************/ 02140000
*                                                                  0644 02141000
*         IF PGNOF = ON & PGNOL > 0 & PGNOL <= 4             /*YM5742*/ 02142000

         BNP   @RF00644                                            0644 02150000
         C     @08,@CF00053                                        0644 02151000
         BH    @RF00644                                            0644 02152000
*             DO;                                                  0645 02153000
*               CVDREG = PCTCPN;                                   0646 02154000
         LH    CVDREG,PCTCPN(,PCTPTR)                              0646 02155000
*GEN     (CVD   CVDREG,PACKWD);                                    0647 02156000
         CVD   CVDREG,PACKWD                                            02157000
*GEN     (UNPK  PAGE,PACKWD);                                      0648 02158000
*                                                                  0648 02159000
         UNPK  PAGE,PACKWD                                              02160000
*               PAGE(4) = PAGE(4) | 'F0'X;  /* TURN OFF SIGN.        */ 02161000
         OI    PAGE+3,X'F0'                                        0649 02162000
*               PGNOC(1:PGNOL) = PAGE((5-PGNOL):4);                0650 02163000
         L     @08,@PC00007                                        0650 02164000

         LA    @01,PAGE-1(@04)                                     0650 02171000
         EX    @03,@SM00869                                        0650 02172000
*             END;                                                 0651 02173000
*         GDTTPH ->PCTSTM = PCTSTM;                                0652 02174000
@RF00644 L     @08,GDTTPH(,GDTPTR)                                 0652 02175000
         MVC   PCTSTM(8,@08),PCTSTM(PCTPTR)                        0652 02176000
*         GDTTPH ->PCTSME = PCTSME;                                0653 02177000
         L     @04,PCTSME(,PCTPTR)                                 0653 02178000
         ST    @04,PCTSME(,@08)                                    0653 02179000
*         IF PCTAPF = ON                                           0654 02180000
*           THEN                                                   0654 02181000

         BNO   @RF00654                                            0654 02183000
*             GDTTPH->PCTACT = PCTSTD;                             0655 02184000

@RF00654 L     @08,GDTTPH(,GDTPTR)                                 0656 02190000
         MVC   PCTACT(8,@08),PCTACT(PCTPTR)                        0656 02191000
*         /***********************************************************/ 02192000
*         /*                                                         */ 02193000
*         /* FREE  THE TP01 SUB-POOL AND RETURN TO THE CALLER.       */ 02194000
*         /*                                                         */ 02195000
*         /***********************************************************/ 02196000
*                                                                  0657 02197000

*                                                                  0657 02199000
@RC00654 MVC   @AL00001+4(8),@AL00657                              0657 02200000
         ST    GDTPTR,@AL00001                                     0657 02201000
         L     @15,GDTFPL(,GDTPTR)                                 0657 02202000
         LA    @01,@AL00001                                        0657 02203000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             0657 02204000
*         /***********************************************************/ 02205000
*         /*                                                         */ 02206000
*         /* CLEAR THE STID AND HEADER QUEUE POINTERS.               */ 02207000
*         /*                                                         */ 02208000
*         /***********************************************************/ 02209000
*                                                                  0658 02210000
*         PCTPTR = GDTTPH;                                         0658 02211000
         L     PCTPTR,GDTTPH(,GDTPTR)                              0658 02212000
*         PCTSPP = NULLPTR;                                        0659 02213000
         SLR   @08,@08                                             0659 02214000
         ST    @08,PCTSPP(,PCTPTR)                                 0659 02215000
*         PCTSQP = NULLPTR;                                        0660 02216000
         ST    @08,PCTSQP(,PCTPTR)                                 0660 02217000
*         PCTAHP = NULLPTR;                                        0661 02218000
         ST    @08,PCTAHP(,PCTPTR)                                 0661 02219000
*         PCTBNL = PCTBUF;                                         0662 02220000

         L     @04,PCTBUF(,PCTPTR)                                 0662 02222000
         ST    @04,PCTBNL(,PCTPTR)                                 0662 02223000

         LR    @15,@08                                             0663 02225000
         L     @14,@SA00007                                        0663 02226000
         LM    @00,@12,@SA00007+8                                  0663 02227000
         BR    @14                                                 0663 02228000
*         END RESETCON;                                            0664 02229000
*                                                                  0664 02230000
*         /*                                                         */ 02231000
*         /* PROCEDURE NAME - GET PRINT CONTROL TABLE.               */ 02232000
*         /*                                                         */ 02233000
*         /* FUNCTION - GETS CORE FOR AND INITIALIZES THE PRINT      */ 02234000
*         /* CONTROL TABLE.                                          */ 02235000
*         /*                                                         */ 02236000
*         /* INPUT - NONE.                                           */ 02237000
*         /*                                                         */ 02238000
*         /* OUTPUT - NEW UNINITIALIZED PRINT CONTROL TABLE.         */ 02239000
*         /*                                                         */ 02240000
*         /***********************************************************/ 02241000
*                                                                  0665 02242000
*INITPCT: PROC;                                                    0665 02243000
*                                                                  0665 02244000
INITPCT  STM   @14,@04,@SA00008                                    0665 02245000
         STM   @06,@12,@SA00008+28                                 0665 02246000
*         /***********************************************************/ 02247000
*         /*                                                         */ 02248000
*         /* FLUSH THE STACK BUFFER BEFORE MAKING CHANGES.           */ 02249000
*         /*                                                         */ 02250000
*         /***********************************************************/ 02251000
*                                                                  0666 02252000
*         IF GDTTPH ¬= NULLPTR                                     0666 02253000
*           THEN                                                   0666 02254000
*                                                                  0666 02255000
         L     @08,GDTTPH(,GDTPTR)                                 0666 02256000
         LTR   @08,@08                                             0666 02257000
         BZ    @RF00666                                            0666 02258000
*             CALL STACKFL;                                        0667 02259000
*                                                                  0667 02260000
         BAL   @14,STACKFL                                         0667 02261000
*         PCTPTR = GDTTPH;                                         0668 02262000
*                                                                  0668 02263000
@RF00666 L     @08,GDTTPH(,GDTPTR)                                 0668 02264000
         LR    PCTPTR,@08                                          0668 02265000
*         /***********************************************************/ 02266000
*         /*                                                         */ 02267000
*         /* IF AN EXISTING SECONDARY TABLE EXISTS, FREE IT.         */ 02268000
*         /*                                                         */ 02269000
*         /***********************************************************/ 02270000
*                                                                  0669 02271000
*         IF GDTTPH ¬= NULLPTR & PCTSPP ¬= NULLPTR                 0669 02272000
*           THEN                                                   0669 02273000
         SLR   @04,@04                                             0669 02274000
         CR    @08,@04                                             0669 02275000
         BE    @RF00669                                            0669 02276000
         L     @03,PCTSPP(,PCTPTR)                                 0669 02277000
         CR    @03,@04                                             0669 02278000
         BE    @RF00669                                            0669 02279000
*             DO;                                                  0670 02280000
*               PCTPTR = PCTSPP;                           /*@OZ07572*/ 02281000
         LR    PCTPTR,@03                                          0671 02282000
*               IF GDTTPH -> PCTAPF = ON                   /*@OZ07572*/ 02283000
*                 THEN                                             0672 02284000
         TM    PCTAPF(@08),B'00001000'                             0672 02285000
         BNO   @RF00672                                            0672 02286000
*                   GDTTPH->PCTACT = PCTSTD;                       0673 02287000
         MVC   PCTACT(8,@08),PCTSTD(PCTPTR)                        0673 02288000

*                   GDTTPH->PCTACT = PCTACT;                       0674 02290000
         B     @RC00672                                            0674 02291000
@RF00672 L     @08,GDTTPH(,GDTPTR)                                 0674 02292000
         MVC   PCTACT(8,@08),PCTACT(PCTPTR)                        0674 02293000
*               PCTPTR = GDTTPH;                           /*@OZ07572*/ 02294000
*                                                                  0675 02295000
@RC00672 L     PCTPTR,GDTTPH(,GDTPTR)                              0675 02296000
*               CALL IDCSAFP0 (GDTTBL,TPPOOL,ALL);                 0676 02297000
*                                                                  0676 02298000

*               GDTTPH->PCTSQP = NULLPTR;                  /*@Y30LSBE*/ 02304000
*                                                                  0677 02305000

         SLR   @04,@04                                             0677 02307000
         ST    @04,PCTSQP(,@08)                                    0677 02308000
*             END;                                                 0678 02309000
*                                                                  0678 02310000
*             OLDERID2 = NEWERID2;                                 0679 02311000
@RF00669 L     @08,GDTTR2(,GDTPTR)                                 0679 02312000
         MVC   @TS00001(95),NEWERID2(@08)                          0679 02313000
         MVC   OLDERID2(95,@08),@TS00001                           0679 02314000

@RF00493 EQU   @RC00487                                                 03274000

./  ADD  SSI=63450600,NAME=IDCTP05
         TITLE '**********  AMS GET STATIC TEXT MODULE  **********     *00001000
                        '                                               00002000
        MACRO                                                           00003000
        GETMAIN &R,&LV=                                                 00004000
        L     REG15,0(REG1)           GDTTBL ADDRESS                    00005000
        L     REG15,GDTPRL(REG15)     PROL ROUTINE ADDRESS              00006000
        CNOP  2,4                     BOUNDARY ALIGNMENT                00007000
        LA    REG14,*+14              RETURN ADDRESS                    00008000
        BALR  REG1,REG15              LINKAGE TO PROL ROUTINE           00009000
        DC    A(MODID)                MODULE ID ADDRESS                 00010000
        DC    A(@SIZDATD)             AUTOMATIC STORAGE SIZE ADDRESS    00011000
        MEND                                                            00012000
IDCTP05  CSECT ,                                                   0002 00013000
@MAINENT DS    0H                                                  0002 00014000
         USING *,@15                                               0002 00015000
         B     @PROLOG                                             0002 00016000
         DC    AL1(16)                                             0002 00017000
         DC    C'IDCTP05   76.346'                                 0002 00018000
         DROP  @15                                                      00019000
@PROLOG  STM   @14,@12,12(@13)                                     0002 00020000
         BALR  @12,0                                               0002 00021000
@PSTART  DS    0H                                                  0002 00022000
         USING @PSTART,@12                                         0002 00023000
         L     @00,@SIZDATD                                        0002 00024000
         GETMAIN  R,LV=(0)                                              00025000
         LR    @11,@01                                             0002 00026000
         USING @DATD,@11                                           0002 00027000
         ST    @13,@SA00001+4                                      0002 00028000
         LM    @00,@01,20(@13)                                     0002 00029000
         ST    @11,8(,@13)                                         0002 00030000
         LR    @13,@11                                             0002 00031000
         MVC   @PC00001(16),0(@01)                                 0002 00032000
*                                       /* TERMINAL CONDITION CODE.  */ 00033000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00034000
*         /*                                                         */ 00035000
*         /* MAIN LINE CODE FOR GET STATIC TEXT MOD BEGINS HERE      */ 00036000
*         /*                                                         */ 00037000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00038000
*                                                                  0163 00039000
*         PCTPTR = GDTTPH;              /* SET PCT ADDRESSABILITY.   */ 00040000
         L     @10,@PC00001                                        0163 00041000
         L     PCTPTR,GDTTPH(,@10)                                 0163 00042000
*         IF PCTSPP ¬= NULLPTR                                     0164 00043000
*           THEN                                                   0164 00044000
         L     @10,PCTSPP(,PCTPTR)                                 0164 00045000
         LTR   @10,@10                                             0164 00046000
         BZ    @RF00164                                            0164 00047000
*             PCTPTR = PCTSPP;                                     0165 00048000
*                                                                  0165 00049000
         LR    PCTPTR,@10                                          0165 00050000
*         IF GDTDBG = NULLPTR                                      0166 00051000
*           THEN;                                                  0166 00052000
@RF00164 L     @10,@PC00001                                        0166 00053000
         L     @10,GDTDBG(,@10)                                    0166 00054000
         LTR   @10,@10                                             0166 00055000
         BZ    @RT00166                                            0166 00056000
*           ELSE                                                   0168 00057000
*             CALL IDCDB010 (GDTTBL,'TP5I');                       0168 00058000
*                                                                  0168 00059000
         L     @10,@PC00001                                        0168 00060000
         ST    @10,@AL00001                                        0168 00061000
         LA    @06,@CC00679                                        0168 00062000
         ST    @06,@AL00001+4                                      0168 00063000
         MVI   @AL00001+4,X'80'                                    0168 00064000
         L     @15,GDTDBG(,@10)                                    0168 00065000
         LA    @01,@AL00001                                        0168 00066000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             0168 00067000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00068000
*         /*                                                         */ 00069000
*         /* FIRST, COMPUTE THE NAME OF THE DESIRED MODULE           */ 00070000
*         /*                                                         */ 00071000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00072000
*                                                                  0169 00073000
*         OLDERID2 = NEWERID2;                                     0169 00074000
@RT00166 L     @10,@PC00001                                        0169 00075000
         L     @06,GDTTR2(,@10)                                    0169 00076000
         MVC   @TS00001(95),NEWERID2(@06)                          0169 00077000
         MVC   OLDERID2(95,@06),@TS00001                           0169 00078000
*         NEWID2 = 'TP5E';                                         0170 00079000
         MVC   NEWID2(4,@06),@CC00680                              0170 00080000
*         MODNAM(1:5) = PMODNAM;        /* SET PATTERN IN MODNAM     */ 00081000
*                                                                  0171 00082000
         MVC   MODNAM(5),PMODNAM                                   0171 00083000
*         MODNAM(6:8) = STID(1:3);                                 0172 00084000
*                                                                  0172 00085000
         L     @06,@PC00001+4                                      0172 00086000
         MVC   MODNAM+5(3),STID(@06)                               0172 00087000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00088000
*         /*                                                         */ 00089000
*         /*  CHECK FOR MODULE ALREADY IN CORE                       */ 00090000
*         /*                                                         */ 00091000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00092000
*                                                                  0173 00093000
*         IF PCTSTM ¬= MODNAM                                      0173 00094000
*           THEN                                                   0173 00095000
         CLC   PCTSTM(8,PCTPTR),MODNAM                             0173 00096000
         BE    @RF00173                                            0173 00097000
*             DO;                                                  0174 00098000
*               IF PCTSTM(1) ¬= '00'X   /* ANY MODULE YET.           */ 00099000
*                 THEN                                             0175 00100000
*                                                                  0175 00101000
         CLI   PCTSTM(PCTPTR),X'00'                                0175 00102000
         BE    @RF00175                                            0175 00103000
*                   CALL IDCSADE0 (GDTTBL,PCTSTM);                 0176 00104000
*                                                                  0176 00105000
         ST    @10,@AL00001                                        0176 00106000
         LA    @06,PCTSTM(,PCTPTR)                                 0176 00107000
         ST    @06,@AL00001+4                                      0176 00108000
         L     @15,GDTDEL(,@10)                                    0176 00109000
         LA    @01,@AL00001                                        0176 00110000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             0176 00111000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00112000
*         /*                                                         */ 00113000
*         /*  LOAD THE REQUIRED MODULE                               */ 00114000
*         /*                                                         */ 00115000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00116000
*                                                                  0177 00117000
*             CALL IDCSALD0 (GDTTBL,MODNAM,PCTSME);                0177 00118000
*                                                                  0177 00119000
@RF00175 L     @10,@PC00001                                        0177 00120000
         ST    @10,@AL00001                                        0177 00121000
         LA    @06,MODNAM                                          0177 00122000
         ST    @06,@AL00001+4                                      0177 00123000
         LA    @06,PCTSME(,PCTPTR)                                 0177 00124000
         ST    @06,@AL00001+8                                      0177 00125000
         L     @15,GDTLOD(,@10)                                    0177 00126000
         LA    @01,@AL00001                                        0177 00127000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             0177 00128000
*             PCTSTM = MODNAM;                                     0178 00129000
         MVC   PCTSTM(8,PCTPTR),MODNAM                             0178 00130000
*           END;                                                   0179 00131000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00132000
*         /*                                                         */ 00133000
*         /* LOCATE THE REQUIRED ENTRY IN THE STATIC TEXT MODULE     */ 00134000
*         /*                                                         */ 00135000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00136000
*                                                                  0180 00137000
*         INDEX = STID(4) + 1;          /* SET ENTRY INDEX.          */ 00138000
*                                                                  0180 00139000
@RF00173 LA    @10,1                                               0180 00140000
         L     @06,@PC00001+4                                      0180 00141000
         SLR   INDEX,INDEX                                         0180 00142000
         IC    INDEX,STID+3(,@06)                                  0180 00143000
         ALR   INDEX,@10                                           0180 00144000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00145000
*         /*                                                         */ 00146000
*         /* CHECK TO INSURE THAT THIS ENTRY IS IN THIS MODULE.      */ 00147000
*         /*                                                         */ 00148000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00149000
*                                                                  0181 00150000
*         IF INDEX-1 > LMINDX(1) | LMINDX(INDEX) = -1 | INDEX = 1  0181 00151000
*           THEN                                                   0181 00152000
         LR    @06,INDEX                                           0181 00153000
         BCTR  @06,0                                               0181 00154000
         L     @04,PCTSME(,PCTPTR)                                 0181 00155000
         CH    @06,LMINDX(,@04)                                    0181 00156000
         BH    @RT00181                                            0181 00157000
         LR    @06,INDEX                                           0181 00158000
         ALR   @06,@06                                             0181 00159000
         BCTR  @04,0                                               0181 00160000
         BCTR  @04,0                                               0181 00161000
         LH    @06,LMINDX(@06,@04)                                 0181 00162000
         C     @06,@CF00682                                        0181 00163000
         BE    @RT00181                                            0181 00164000
         CR    INDEX,@10                                           0181 00165000
         BNE   @RF00181                                            0181 00166000
@RT00181 DS    0H                                                  0182 00167000
*             DO;                                                  0182 00168000
*               SETRC = 8;                                         0183 00169000
*                                                                  0183 00170000
         MVC   SETRC(2),@CH00182                                   0183 00171000
*               CALL IDCSAEP0(GDTTBL,MODID,SETRC);                 0184 00172000
*                                                                  0184 00173000
         L     @10,@PC00001                                        0184 00174000
         ST    @10,@AL00001                                        0184 00175000
         LA    @06,MODID                                           0184 00176000
         ST    @06,@AL00001+4                                      0184 00177000
         LA    @06,SETRC                                           0184 00178000
         ST    @06,@AL00001+8                                      0184 00179000
         MVI   @AL00001+8,X'80'                                    0184 00180000
         L     @15,GDTEPL(,@10)                                    0184 00181000
         LA    @01,@AL00001                                        0184 00182000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             0184 00183000
*             END;                                                 0185 00184000
*                                                                  0185 00185000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00186000
*         /*                                                         */ 00187000
*         /* SET UP ADDRESSING TO THE ENTRY.                         */ 00188000
*         /*                                                         */ 00189000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00190000
*                                                                  0186 00191000
*         STENTRY = ADDR(LMINDX(1)) + LMINDX(INDEX);               0186 00192000
@RF00181 L     @10,PCTSME(,PCTPTR)                                 0186 00193000
         LR    @04,INDEX                                           0186 00194000
         ALR   @04,@04                                             0186 00195000
         BCTR  @04,0                                               0186 00196000
         BCTR  @04,0                                               0186 00197000
         LH    STENTRY,LMINDX(@04,@10)                             0186 00198000
         ALR   STENTRY,@10                                         0186 00199000
*         STFLAG = LMNTRYF;                                        0187 00200000
         MVC   STFLAG(1),LMNTRYF(STENTRY)                          0187 00201000
*         STENTL = LMNTRYL;                                        0188 00202000
*                                                                  0188 00203000
         LH    @10,LMNTRYL(,STENTRY)                               0188 00204000
         ST    @10,STENTL                                          0188 00205000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00206000
*         /*                                                         */ 00207000
*         /* IF THIS IS A MESSAGE,INITIALIZE FOR THE MESSAGE.        */ 00208000
*         /*                                                         */ 00209000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00210000
*                                                                  0189 00211000
*         IF STMF = ON                                             0189 00212000
*           THEN                                                   0189 00213000
         TM    STMF,B'10000000'                                    0189 00214000
         BNO   @RF00189                                            0189 00215000
*             PCTPMN = -1;                                         0190 00216000
*                                                                  0190 00217000
         MVC   PCTPMN(2,PCTPTR),@CH00682                           0190 00218000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00219000
*         /*                                                         */ 00220000
*         /* SET UP A NON-POOL ENTRY FOR RETURN TO THE CALLER.       */ 00221000
*         /*                                                         */ 00222000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00223000
*                                                                  0191 00224000
*         IF SBPOOL = 0                                            0191 00225000
*           THEN                                                   0191 00226000
@RF00189 L     @10,@PC00001+8                                      0191 00227000
         ICM   @04,15,SBPOOL(@10)                                  0191 00228000
         BNZ   @RF00191                                            0191 00229000
*             DO;                                                  0192 00230000
*                                                                  0192 00231000
*               CALL IDCSAGS0 (GDTTBL,STENTL,ENTRETP);             0193 00232000
*                                                                  0193 00233000
         L     @10,@PC00001                                        0193 00234000
         ST    @10,@AL00001                                        0193 00235000
         LA    @07,STENTL                                          0193 00236000
         ST    @07,@AL00001+4                                      0193 00237000
         L     @07,@PC00001+12                                     0193 00238000
         ST    @07,@AL00001+8                                      0193 00239000
         MVI   @AL00001+8,X'80'                                    0193 00240000
         L     @15,GDTGSP(,@10)                                    0193 00241000
         LA    @01,@AL00001                                        0193 00242000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             0193 00243000
*               RESPECIFY RTNREG RSTD;                             0194 00244000
*               TESTRC = RTNREG;                                   0195 00245000
         LR    TESTRC,RTNREG                                       0195 00246000
*               RESPECIFY RTNREG UNRSTD;                           0196 00247000
*                 IF TESTRC ¬= 0                                   0197 00248000
*                   THEN                                           0197 00249000
*                                                                  0197 00250000
         LTR   TESTRC,TESTRC                                       0197 00251000
         BZ    @RF00197                                            0197 00252000
*                     DO;                                          0198 00253000
*                       RESPECIFY(REG13,REG14,REG15) RSTD;         0199 00254000
*                       REG15 = 28;                                0200 00255000
         LA    REG15,28                                            0200 00256000
*                       REG14 = GDTABT;                            0201 00257000
         L     @10,@PC00001                                        0201 00258000
         L     REG14,GDTABT(,@10)                                  0201 00259000
*                       REG13 = GDTABH;                            0202 00260000
         L     REG13,GDTABH(,@10)                                  0202 00261000
*                       GEN(BR    REG14);                          0203 00262000
         BR    REG14                                                    00263000
*                       RESPECIFY(REG13,REG14,REG15)UNRSTD;        0204 00264000
*                     END;                                         0205 00265000
*                                                                  0205 00266000
*               /*****************************************************/ 00267000
*               /*                                                   */ 00268000
*               /* MOVE THE ENTRY TO THE RETURN AREA.                */ 00269000
*               /* SET THE LINE TO BLANKS IF IT IS A MESSAGE.        */ 00270000
*               /*                                                   */ 00271000
*               /*****************************************************/ 00272000
*                                                                  0206 00273000
*               IF STMF = ON                                       0206 00274000
*                 THEN                                             0206 00275000
@RF00197 TM    STMF,B'10000000'                                    0206 00276000
         BNO   @RF00206                                            0206 00277000
*                   DO;                                            0207 00278000
*                     ENTRET(1) = ' ';                             0208 00279000
         L     @10,@PC00001+12                                     0208 00280000
         L     @10,ENTRETP(,@10)                                   0208 00281000
         MVI   ENTRET(@10),C' '                                    0208 00282000
*                     MVC(ENTRET(2:STENTL),ENTRET);        /*@ZA15700*/ 00283000
         L     @07,STENTL                                          0209 00284000
         BCTR  @07,0                                               0209 00285000
         BCTR  @07,0                                               0209 00286000
         EX    @07,@SM00688                                        0209 00287000
*                   END;                                           0210 00288000
*               QENTP = ENTRETP - 12;                              0211 00289000
@RF00206 L     @10,@PC00001+12                                     0211 00290000
         L     @10,ENTRETP(,@10)                                   0211 00291000
         SL    @10,@CF00573                                        0211 00292000
         ST    @10,QENTP                                           0211 00293000
*               DO WHILE STENTL > 0;                               0212 00294000
         B     @DE00212                                            0212 00295000
@DL00212 DS    0H                                                  0213 00296000
*                 IF STENTL > MAXMOV                               0213 00297000
*                   THEN                                           0213 00298000
         LA    @10,256                                             0213 00299000
         C     @10,STENTL                                          0213 00300000
         BNL   @RF00213                                            0213 00301000
*                     DO;                                          0214 00302000
*                       QTEXT(1:MAXMOV) = LMNTRYD;                 0215 00303000
         L     @07,QENTP                                           0215 00304000
         MVC   QTEXT(256,@07),LMNTRYD(STENTRY)                     0215 00305000
*                       QENTP = QENTP + MAXMOV;                    0216 00306000
         ALR   @07,@10                                             0216 00307000
         ST    @07,QENTP                                           0216 00308000
*                     END;                                         0217 00309000
*                   ELSE                                           0218 00310000
*                     QTEXT(1:STENTL) = LMNTRYD;                   0218 00311000
         B     @RC00213                                            0218 00312000
@RF00213 L     @10,QENTP                                           0218 00313000
         L     @07,STENTL                                          0218 00314000
         BCTR  @07,0                                               0218 00315000
         EX    @07,@SM00690                                        0218 00316000
*                 STENTL = STENTL - MAXMOV;                        0219 00317000
@RC00213 LA    @10,256                                             0219 00318000
         L     @07,STENTL                                          0219 00319000
         SLR   @07,@10                                             0219 00320000
         ST    @07,STENTL                                          0219 00321000
*                 STENTRY = STENTRY + MAXMOV;                      0220 00322000
         ALR   STENTRY,@10                                         0220 00323000
*               END;                                               0221 00324000
@DE00212 L     @10,STENTL                                          0221 00325000
         LTR   @10,@10                                             0221 00326000
         BP    @DL00212                                            0221 00327000
*             END;                                                 0222 00328000
*                                                                  0222 00329000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00330000
*         /*                                                         */ 00331000
*         /* GET A POOL ITEM AND ENQUE THE POOL REQUEST ELEMENT.     */ 00332000
*         /* QBASE IS USED TO KEEP THE POINTER TO THE PREVIOUS ENTRY */ 00333000
*         /*    IN THE CHAIN IN ORDER TO ADD TO THE CHAIN.           */ 00334000
*         /*                                                         */ 00335000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00336000
*                                                                  0223 00337000
*           ELSE                                                   0223 00338000
*             DO;                                                  0223 00339000
*                                                                  0223 00340000
         B     @RC00191                                            0223 00341000
@RF00191 DS    0H                                                  0224 00342000
*             /*******************************************************/ 00343000
*             /*                                                     */ 00344000
*             /* LOCATE THE END ENTRY IN THE QUEUED ENTRYIES.        */ 00345000
*             /*                                                     */ 00346000
*             /*******************************************************/ 00347000
*                                                                  0224 00348000
*               QENTP = PCTSQP;                                    0224 00349000
         L     @10,PCTSQP(,PCTPTR)                                 0224 00350000
         ST    @10,QENTP                                           0224 00351000
*               DO WHILE QENTP ¬= NULLPTR;                         0225 00352000
         B     @DE00225                                            0225 00353000
@DL00225 DS    0H                                                  0226 00354000
*                 QBASE = QENTP;                                   0226 00355000
         L     @10,QENTP                                           0226 00356000
         LR    QBASE,@10                                           0226 00357000
*                 QENTP = QCHAIN;                                  0227 00358000
         L     @10,QCHAIN(,@10)                                    0227 00359000
         ST    @10,QENTP                                           0227 00360000

         END   IDCTP05,(C'PLS1000',0701,76346)                          01169000
./  ADD  SSI=73540319,NAME=IDCTP06
         TITLE '******* IDCTP06: TEXT PROCESSOR ERROR CONVERSION ROUTIN*00001000
               NE ******'                                               00002000
        MACRO                                                           00003000
        GETMAIN &R,&LV=                                                 00004000
        L     REG15,0(REG1)           GDTTBL ADDRESS                    00005000
        L     REG15,GDTPRL(REG15)     PROL ROUTINE ADDRESS              00006000
        CNOP  2,4                     BOUNDARY ALIGNMENT                00007000
        LA    REG14,*+14              RETURN ADDRESS                    00008000
        BALR  REG1,REG15              LINKAGE TO PROL ROUTINE           00009000
        DC    A(MODID)                MODULE ID ADDRESS                 00010000
        DC    A(@SIZDATD)             AUTOMATIC STORAGE SIZE ADDRESS    00011000
        MEND                                                            00012000
IDCTP06  CSECT ,                                                   0002 00013000
@MAINENT DS    0H                                                  0002 00014000
         USING *,@15                                               0002 00015000
         B     @PROLOG                                             0002 00016000
         DC    AL2(@EP00002-@MAINENT)                                   00017000
         DC    AL1(16)                                             0002 00018000
         DC    C'IDCTP06   77.354'                                 0002 00019000
IDCTPER  DS    0H                                                  0002 00020000
         USING *,@15                                               0002 00021000
         B     @PROLOG                                             0002 00022000
         DC    AL2(@EP00140-IDCTPER)                                    00023000
         ENTRY IDCTPER                                                  00024000
         DROP  @15                                                      00025000
@PROLOG  STM   @14,@12,12(@13)                                     0002 00026000
         BALR  @12,0                                               0002 00027000
@PSTART  DS    0H                                                  0002 00028000
         USING @PSTART,@12                                         0002 00029000
         L     @00,@SIZDATD                                        0002 00030000
         GETMAIN  R,LV=(0)                                              00031000
         LR    @11,@01                                             0002 00032000
         USING @DATD,@11                                           0002 00033000
         ST    @13,@SA00001+4                                      0002 00034000
         LM    @15,@01,16(@13)                                     0002 00035000
         ST    @11,8(,@13)                                         0002 00036000
         LR    @13,@11                                             0002 00037000
         XC    @ZTEMPS(@ZLEN),@ZTEMPS                                   00038000
         AH    @15,4(,@15)                                         0002 00039000
         BR    @15                                                 0002 00040000
@EP00002 DS    0H                                                  0003 00041000
*                                      /*SYSPRINT OUTPUT FILE NAME   */ 00042000
*                                                                  0140 00043000
*        /************************************************************/ 00044000
*        /*                                                          */ 00045000
*        /*  END OF AMS GLOBAL DECLARATIONS                          */ 00046000
*        /*                                                          */ 00047000
*        /************************************************************/ 00048000
*IDCTPER: ENTRY(GDTTBL,ECVPT);                                     0140 00049000
         B     @EC00140                                            0140 00050000
@EP00140 MVC   @PC00001(8),0(@01)                                  0140 00051000
@EC00140 DS    0H                                                  0141 00052000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00053000
*         /*                                                         */ 00054000
*         /* ARGUMENT OF INVOCATION - ADDRESS OF ERROR CONVERSION    */ 00055000
*         /*  TABLE.                                                 */ 00056000
*         /*                                                         */ 00057000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00058000
*                                                                  0141 00059000
*         DCL                                                      0141 00060000
*           ECVPT   PTR(31);                                       0141 00061000
*                                                                  0141 00062000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00063000
*         /*                                                         */ 00064000
*         /* MODULE ID USED IN UEPIL AND UPROL ROUTINES              */ 00065000
*         /*                                                         */ 00066000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00067000
*         DCL                                                      0142 00068000
*           MODID  CHAR(4) STATIC INIT('TP06');                    0142 00069000
*                                                                  0142 00070000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00071000
*         /*                                                         */ 00072000
*         /* CONSTANTS USED THROUGHOUT IDCTP06                       */ 00073000
*         /*                                                         */ 00074000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00075000
*         DCL                                                      0143 00076000
*           CATERROR  BIT(8)  CONSTANT('80'X), /* CATALOG ERROR      */ 00077000
*           CATRC08   FIXED(31) CONSTANT(8),   /* CATLG RC 8         */ 00078000
*           DUPENTID  BIT(8)   CONSTANT('0A'X),/* ENTRY ID FOR DUPE  */ 00079000
*           DYNALER   BIT(8)  CONSTANT('20'X), /* DYNAMIC    @Z40GSJG*/ 00080000
*                                        /* ALLOCATION ERROR @Z40GSJG*/ 00081000
*           CATRC240  FIXED(31) CONSTANT(240), /* CATLG RC 240       */ 00082000
*           FBFLG08   BIT(8)   CONSTANT('08'X),/* REASON CODE DUPE   */ 00083000
*           FDEFMID   BIT(8)   CONSTANT('2B'X),/* ENTRY ID FILE DEF  */ 00084000
*           INVARGL   FIXED(8) CONSTANT(3),    /* INVALID ERCNVTAB   */ 00085000
*           LOCENTID  BIT(8)   CONSTANT('09'X),/* ENTRY ID- NONEXIST */ 00086000
*           LONGCTG   FIXED(8) CONSTANT(2),    /* MSG ENTRY ID       */ 00087000
*           SHORTCTG  FIXED(8) CONSTANT(1),    /* MSG ENTRY ID       */ 00088000

*           LOCCIID   BIT(8)   CONSTANT('0B'X),/* GENERAL MSG@OZ09407*/ 00090000
*           UNIVMSG   CHAR(3) CONSTANT('UV0'); /* STATIC TEXT MOD ID */ 00091000
*                                                                  0143 00092000
*         /**************************************************@Z40GSJG*/ 00093000
*         /*                                                 @Z40GSJG*/ 00094000
*         /* BUFFER USED FOR RETURN OF VERBAL MESSAGE. THE   @Z40GSJG*/ 00095000
*         /* UPRINT COMMAND RETURNS THE PRIMARY MESSAGE TO   @Z40GSJG*/ 00096000
*         /* THIS BUFFER.                                    @Z40GSJG*/ 00097000
*         /*                                                 @Z40GSJG*/ 00098000
*         /**************************************************@Z40GSJG*/ 00099000
*         DCL                                              /*@Z40GSJG*/ 00100000
*           MSGBUFER CHAR(72);                             /*@Z40GSJG*/ 00101000
*                                                                  0144 00102000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00103000
*         /*                                                         */ 00104000

*         /*                                                         */ 00106000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00107000
*         DCL                                                      0145 00108000
*           ERDARGL  CHAR(LENGTH(DARGLIST) + (LENGTH(DARGARY) * 4));    00109000
*                                                                  0145 00110000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00111000
*         /*                                                         */ 00112000
*         /* INTERNAL STATUS ERROR INDICATOR                         */ 00113000
*         /*                                                         */ 00114000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00115000

*         /*                                                         */ 00121000

*                                                                  0147 00123000

         BALR  @14,@15                                             0157 00169000

*         /*                                                         */ 00171000
*         /* DETERMINE THE TYPE OF ERROR TO BE CONVERTED AND PASS    */ 00172000

*                                                                  0160 00189000

*                     CALL DAERCNV;/* DYNAMIC ALLOCATION ERROR       */ 00255000

@RF00168 MVC   ERRSTAT(2),@CH00171                                 0177 00272000
*             END;                                         /*@Z40GSJG*/ 00273000
@RC00168 DS    0H                                                  0179 00274000
*         RESPECIFY RTNREG RSTD;                                   0179 00275000

*         /*                                                         */ 00282000

*         /*                                                         */ 00294000

*                                                                  0184 00298000
*         IF GDTDBG = NULLPTR                                      0184 00299000
*           THEN;                                                  0184 00300000

         L     @10,GDTDBG(,@10)                                    0184 00302000
         LTR   @10,@10                                             0184 00303000
         BZ    @RT00184                                            0184 00304000
*           ELSE                                                   0186 00305000
*             CALL IDCDB010 (GDTTBL,'TPEB');                       0186 00306000
*                                                                  0186 00307000
         L     @10,@PC00001                                        0186 00308000

         L     @15,GDTDBG(,@10)                                    0186 00313000
         LA    @01,@AL00001                                        0186 00314000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             0186 00315000
*         IF ERRSTAT = LASTCC00                                    0187 00316000
*           THEN                                                   0187 00317000
@RT00184 LH    @10,ERRSTAT                                         0187 00318000
         LTR   @10,@10                                             0187 00319000
         BNZ   @RF00187                                            0187 00320000
*             DO;                                                  0188 00321000
*                                                                  0188 00322000
*             /*******************************************************/ 00323000
*             /*                                                     */ 00324000
*             /* PRINT OUT THE CONVERTED MESSAGE - THE DARGLIST HAS  */ 00325000
*             /* BEEN SUCCESSFULLY CONSTRUCTED BY THE CONVERSION PROC*/ 00326000
*             /*                                                     */ 00327000
*             /*******************************************************/ 00328000
*             CALL AMSTP011 (GDTTBL,PRTFILE,DDSTRU);               0189 00329000
*                                                                  0189 00330000
         L     @10,@PC00001                                        0189 00331000
         ST    @10,@AL00001                                        0189 00332000
         LA    @02,@CF00107                                        0189 00333000
         ST    @02,@AL00001+4                                      0189 00334000
         LA    @02,DDSTRU                                          0189 00335000

         L     @15,GDTPRT(,@10)                                    0189 00338000
         LA    @01,@AL00001                                        0189 00339000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             0189 00340000
*             RESPECIFY RTNREG RSTD;                               0190 00341000
*             TESTRC = RTNREG;                                     0191 00342000
         LR    TESTRC,RTNREG                                       0191 00343000
*             RESPECIFY RTNREG UNRSTD;                             0192 00344000
*                                                                  0192 00345000
*             IF TESTRC ¬= 0                                       0193 00346000

         LTR   TESTRC,TESTRC                                       0193 00348000
         BZ    @RF00193                                            0193 00349000
*                 ERRSTAT = LASTCC04;                              0194 00350000
*                                                                  0194 00351000
         MVC   ERRSTAT(2),@CH00034                                 0194 00352000
*             END;                                                 0195 00353000
@RF00193 DS    0H                                                  0196 00354000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00355000
*         /*                                                         */ 00356000
*         /* ALL ERRORS IN THIS ROUTINE ARE CONSIDERED TO BE A       */ 00357000
*         /* RESULT OF AN INVALID ERROR CONVERSION TABLE. THIS IS    */ 00358000
*         /* INDICATED BY A LASTCC08 VALUE IN TESTRC. A VALUE OF     */ 00359000
*         /* LASTCC04 IS POSSIBLE BUT MERELY INDICATES MINOR PROBLEMS*/ 00360000
*         /* AND DOES NOT CAUSE A MESSAGE TO BE PRINTED.             */ 00361000
*         /*                                                         */ 00362000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00363000
*         IF ERRSTAT = LASTCC08                                    0196 00364000
*           THEN                                                   0196 00365000
@RF00187 CLC   ERRSTAT(2),@CH00171                                 0196 00366000
         BNE   @RF00196                                            0196 00367000
*             DO;                                                  0197 00368000
*                                                                  0197 00369000
*             ERDARGL = ''B;                                       0198 00370000
         XC    ERDARGL(52),ERDARGL                                 0198 00371000
*             DARGSMOD = 'TP6';                                    0199 00372000
         L     @10,DDSTRU                                          0199 00373000
         MVC   DARGSMOD(3,@10),@CC00630                            0199 00374000
*             DARGSENT = INVARGL;                                  0200 00375000
*                                                                  0200 00376000
         MVI   DARGSENT(@10),X'03'                                 0200 00377000
*             CALL AMSTP011 (GDTTBL,PRTFILE,DDSTRU);               0201 00378000
*                                                                  0201 00379000
         L     @10,@PC00001                                        0201 00380000
         ST    @10,@AL00001                                        0201 00381000
         LA    @15,@CF00107                                        0201 00382000
         ST    @15,@AL00001+4                                      0201 00383000
         LA    @15,DDSTRU                                          0201 00384000
         ST    @15,@AL00001+8                                      0201 00385000
         MVI   @AL00001+8,X'80'                                    0201 00386000
         L     @15,GDTPRT(,@10)                                    0201 00387000
         LA    @01,@AL00001                                        0201 00388000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             0201 00389000
*             END;                                                 0202 00390000
*                                                                  0202 00391000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00392000
*         /*                                                         */ 00393000
*         /* RETURN TO THE INVOKER OF UERROR                         */ 00394000
*         /*                                                         */ 00395000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00396000
*         CALL IDCSAEP0(GDTTBL,MODID,ERRSTAT);                     0203 00397000
@RF00196 L     @10,@PC00001                                        0203 00398000
         ST    @10,@AL00001                                        0203 00399000
         LA    @15,MODID                                           0203 00400000
         ST    @15,@AL00001+4                                      0203 00401000
         LA    @15,ERRSTAT                                         0203 00402000
         ST    @15,@AL00001+8                                      0203 00403000
         MVI   @AL00001+8,X'80'                                    0203 00404000
