         LA    @01,@AL00001                                        0203 00406000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             0203 00407000
*/********************************************************************/ 00408000
*/*                                                                  */ 00409000
*/* PROCEDURE NAME - CATERCNV                                        */ 00410000
*/*                                                                  */ 00411000
*/* FUNCTION - CONVERT CATALOG MANAGEMENT ERROR RETURN CODES INTO    */ 00412000
*/*            VERBAL MESSAGES. ONLY THOSE RETURN CODES WHICH RESULT */ 00413000
*/*            FROM COMMON USER MISTAKES ARE GIVEN SPECIFIC PROSE    */ 00414000
*/*            EXPLANATIONS; OTHER, NON-COMMON RETURN CODES, RESULT  */ 00415000
*/*            IN A GENERAL VERBAL 'CATALOG ERROR' MESSAGE. A        */ 00416000
*/*            SECONDARY MESSAGE, GIVING THE ERROR AND REASON CODES  */ 00417000
*/*            IS ASSOCIATED WITH THE VERBAL MESSAGE.                */ 00418000
*/*                                                                  */ 00419000
*/*            BOTH THE PRIMARY AND SECONDARY MESSAGE ARE TRANSMITTED*/ 00420000
*/*            BY A SINGLE DYNAMIC DATA STRUCTURE ARGUMENT LIST      */ 00421000
*/*            (DARGLIST). IF IDCAMS IS BEING USED INTERACTIVELY VIA */ 00422000
*/*            TSO, THE SECONDARY MESSAGE IS ISSUED TO THE TSO       */ 00423000
*/*            SECOND LEVEL INFORMATIONAL CHAIN.                     */ 00424000
*/*                                                                  */ 00425000
*/* INPUT    - THERE ARE NO ARGUMENTS OF INVOCATION TO THIS PROCEDURE*/ 00426000
*/*             THE FOLLOWING AREAS GLOBAL TO IDCTP06 ARE USED BY    */ 00427000
*/*             CATERCNV.                                            */ 00428000
*/*                                                                  */ 00429000
*/*             . ERCNVTAB - THE ERROR CONVERSION TABLE INDICATES-   */ 00430000
*/*                 EROPER - TYPE OF CATALOG REQUEST WHICH CAUSED    */ 00431000
*/*                          THE ERROR.                              */ 00432000
*/*                 ERCATRC - CATALOG RETURN CODE.                   */ 00433000
*/*                 ERCPLPT - POINTER TO VSAM CPL.                   */ 00434000
*/*                                                                  */ 00435000
*/* OUTPUT -                                                         */ 00436000
*/*             THE DARGLIST IS INITIALIZED IN ORDER TO PRINT THE    */ 00437000
*/*             CONVERTED MESSAGE.                                   */ 00438000
*/*                                                                  */ 00439000
*/********************************************************************/ 00440000
*                                                                  0204 00441000
*CATERCNV: PROCEDURE;                                              0204 00442000
@EL00001 L     @13,4(,@13)                                         0204 00443000
@EF00001 L     @00,@SIZDATD                                        0204 00444000
         LR    @01,@11                                             0204 00445000
         FREEMAIN R,LV=(0),A=(1)                                        00446000
@ER00001 LM    @14,@12,12(@13)                                     0204 00447000
         BR    @14                                                 0204 00448000
CATERCNV STM   @14,@12,@SA00002                                    0204 00449000
*DCL CTGPLPTR PTR(31);                                             0205 00450000
*/********************************************************************/ 00451000
*/*                                                                  */ 00452000
*/*   MACRO NAME = IEZCTGPL                                          */ 00453000
*/*                                                                  */ 00454000
*/*   DESCRIPTIVE NAME = CATALOG PARAMETER LIST                      */ 00455000
*/*                                                                  */ 00456000
*/*   FUNCTION = THE CATALOG PARAMETER LIST (CTGPL) DEFINES THE      */ 00457000
*/*              CATALOG MANAGEMENT REQUEST AND ITS OPTIONS, THE     */ 00458000
*/*              CATALOG RECORD TO BE PROCESSED, AND THE VSAM        */ 00459000
*/*              CATALOG THAT CONTAINES THE RECORD.  THE CTGPL IS    */ 00460000
*/*              BUILT BEFORE AN OS/VS COMPONENT ISSUES THE CATLG    */ 00461000
*/*              MACRO INSTRUCTION (SVC 26) TO PROCESS A CATALOG     */ 00462000
*/*              RECORD.  WHEN THE CATALOG MANAGEMENT ROUTINES       */ 00463000
*/*              BUILD A CCA TO SUPPORT THE REQUEST, THE ADDRESS     */ 00464000
*/*              OF THE CTGPL IS PUT INTO THE CCA (CCACPL).          */ 00465000
*/*                                                                  */ 00466000
*/*   CONTROL BLOCK STRUCTURE = THE CTGPL IS POINTED TO BY           */ 00467000
*/*                             REGISTER 1.                          */ 00468000
*/*                                                                  */ 00469000
*/*   INCLUDED MACROS = NONE                                         */ 00470000
*/*                                                                  */ 00471000
*/*   METHOD OF ACCESS = PL/S - NO DECLARES NECESSARY                */ 00472000
*/*                                                                  */ 00473000
*/*   STATUS = VS/2 RELEASE 4   (CHANGE FLAG @Z40WSXX)       @Z40WSSG*/ 00474000
*/*                                                                  */ 00475000
*/*   DATE OF LAST CHANGE = 16 AUG 77                        @ZA20773*/ 00476000
*/*                                                                  */ 00477000
*/********************************************************************/ 00478000
*   DECLARE                                                        0206 00479000
*     1 CTGPL BASED(CTGPLPTR)       /* DECLARE CTGPL LEVEL ONE       */ 00480000
*        BDY(WORD),                 /* WORD BOUNDARY                 */ 00481000
*       5 CTGOPTN1 BIT(8),          /* FIRST OPTION INDICATOR        */ 00482000
*         10 CTGBYPSS BIT(1),       /* BYPASS                        */ 00483000
*         10 CTGMAST  BIT(1),       /* VERIFY MASTER PASSWORD        */ 00484000
*         10 CTGCI    BIT(1),       /* VERIFY CONTROL INTERVAL       */ 00485000
*         10 CTGUPD   BIT(1),       /* VERIFY UPDATE                 */ 00486000
*         10 CTGREAD  BIT(1),       /* VERIFY READ                   */ 00487000
*         10 CTGNAME  BIT(1),       /* 1 = 44-BYTE NAME OR VOL SER,  */ 00488000
*                                   /* 0 = ENTRY ID NUMBER           */ 00489000
*         10 CTGCNAME BIT(1),       /* 1 = 44-BYTE NAME,             */ 00490000
*                                   /* 0 = ACB ADDRESS               */ 00491000
*         10 CTGGENLD BIT(1),       /* GENERIC LOCATE REQUEST  Y02020*/ 00492000
*       5 CTGOPTN2 BIT(8),          /* SECOND OPTION INDICATOR       */ 00493000
*         10 CTGEXT   BIT(1),       /* EXTEND       (UPDATE)         */ 00494000
*            15 CTGNSVS BIT(1),     /* CATLG CLEANUP REQUEST @ZA00605*/ 00495000
*         10 CTGERASE BIT(1),       /* ERASE        (DELETE)         */ 00496000
*            15 CTGSMF   BIT(1),    /* WRITE SMF    (LSPACE)         */ 00497000
*               20 CTGREL   BIT(1), /* RELEASE      (UPDATE)         */ 00498000
*                  25 CTGGTALL BIT(1),/* CONCAT SEARCH  FOR    Y02020*/ 00499000
*                                   /* (LISTCAT)               Y02020*/ 00500000
*         10 CTGPURG  BIT(1),       /* PURGE        (DELETE)         */ 00501000
*           15 CTGVMNT BIT(1),      /* VOLUME MOUNT CALLER           */ 00502000
*              20 CTGRCATN BIT(1),  /* RTN CATLG NAME(GLOC)    Y02020*/ 00503000
*                 25 CTGSWAP BIT(1),/* SWAPSPACE (DEFINE)    @Z40WSSG*/ 00504000
*         10 CTGGTNXT BIT(1),       /* GET NEXT     (LIST CATALOG)   */ 00505000
*         10 CTGDISC BIT(1),        /* DISCONNECT   (DELETE)         */ 00506000
*         10 CTGOVRID BIT(1),       /* ERASE OVERRIDE (DELETE)       */ 00507000
*         10 CTGSCR   BIT(1),       /* SCRATCH SPACE (DELETE)        */ 00508000
*         10 *        BIT(1),       /* RESERVED                      */ 00509000
*       5 CTGOPTN3 BIT(8),          /* THIRD OPTION INDICATOR        */ 00510000
*         10 CTGFUNC  BIT(3),       /* CATALOG FUNCTION              */ 00511000
*         10 CTGSUPLT BIT(1),       /* SUPER LOCATE                  */ 00512000
*         10 CTGGDGL  BIT(1),       /* GDG LOCATE REQUEST      Y02020*/ 00513000
*                                   /* WITH BASE LEVEL GIVEN   Y02020*/ 00514000
*                                   /* (CTGWAGB IN CTGWA)      Y02020*/ 00515000
*         10 CTGSRH   BIT(1),       /* 0 = SEARCH MASTER CATLG Y02020*/ 00516000
*                                   /*     ONLY                Y02020*/ 00517000
*                                   /* 1 = SEARCH OS CATALOG FIRST   */ 00518000
*         10 CTGNUM   BIT(1),       /* 0 = SEARCH BOTH CATALOGS,     */ 00519000
*                                   /* 1 = SEARCH ONE CATALOG        */ 00520000
*         10 CTGAM0   BIT(1),       /* VSAM REQ VERSUS NONVSAM       */ 00521000
*       5 CTGOPTN4 BIT(8),          /* GDG FLAGS                     */ 00522000
*         10 CTGLBASE BIT(1),       /* LOCATE GDG BASE ONLY Y02020   */ 00523000
*         10 CTGDOCAT BIT(1),       /* DO NOT OPEN NEEDED CATALOG    */ 00524000
*         10 CTGNPROF BIT(1),       /* NO (RAC) PROFILE SHOULD BE  0206 00525000
*                                      DEFINED OR DELETED    @Z40RSRC*/ 00526000
*         10 CTGCOIN  BIT(1),       /* CONTROLLER INTERCEPT REQUESTED   00527000
*                                                            @ZA20773*/ 00528000
*         10 CTGBYPMT BIT(1),       /* BYPASS SECURITY PROMPTING   0206 00529000
*                                       TO SYSTEM OPERATOR   @ZA07531*/ 00530000
*         10 CTGTIOT  BIT(1),       /* CALLER OWNS SYSZTIOT EXCLUSIVE   00531000
*                                                            @ZA20773*/ 00532000
*         10 *        BIT(2),       /* RESERVED              @ZA20773*/ 00533000
*       5 CTGENT   PTR(31),         /* USER ENTRY ADDR OR PTR TO VOLUME 00534000
*                                        SERIAL NUMBER (LSPACE)      */ 00535000
*         10 CTGFVT   PTR(31),      /* FVT ADDRESS (DEFINE, ALTER)   */ 00536000
*       5 CTGCAT   PTR(31),         /* CATALOG POINTER               */ 00537000
*         10 CTGCVOL PTR(31),       /* CVOL PTR (SUPER LOCATE)       */ 00538000
*       5 CTGWKA  PTR(31),          /* WORKAREA ADDR                 */ 00539000
*       5 CTGDSORG CHAR(2),         /* DATA SET ORG - SUPERLOCATE    */ 00540000
*         10 CTGOPTNS BIT(5),       /* CMS OPTIONS                   */ 00541000
*         10 *        BIT(11),      /* RESERVED                      */ 00542000
*       5 CTGTYPE  CHAR(1),         /* ENTRY TYPE - LISTCAT, DELETE  */ 00543000
*       5 CTGNOFLD PTR(8),          /* NUMBER OF FIELD POINTERS      */ 00544000
*       5 CTGDDNM PTR(31),          /* DD NAME ADDR                  */ 00545000
*         10 CTGNEWNM PTR(31),      /* NEWNAME ADDRESS - ALTER       */ 00546000
*            15 CTGFDBK  PTR(16),   /* SUPER LOCATE FEEDBACK         */ 00547000
*            15 CTGFBFLG BIT(16),   /* SUPER LOCATE FLAGS            */ 00548000
*               20 CTGPAR   BIT(1), /* PARALLEL MOUNT -SUPERLOCATE   */ 00549000
*               20 CTGKEEP  BIT(1), /* FORCED KEEP - SUPERLOCATE     */ 00550000
*               20 CTGGDGB  BIT(1), /* GDG BASE LOCATE         Y02020*/ 00551000
*               20 CTGNGDSN BIT(1), /* GDG NAME GENERATED      Y02020*/ 00552000
*               20 *        BIT(12), /* RESERVED               Y02020*/ 00553000
*       5 CTGJSCB  PTR(31),         /* JSCB ADDR                     */ 00554000
*         10 CTGPSWD  PTR(31),      /* PASSWORD ADDR                 */ 00555000
*       5 CTGFIELD(*) PTR(31) ;        /* FIELD POINTERS             */ 00556000
*/********************************************************************/ 00557000
*/*     CONSTANTS USED TO SET AND/OR TEST FIELDS DECLARED ABOVE      */ 00558000
*/********************************************************************/ 00559000
*   DECLARE                         /* CATALOG FUNCTION - CTGFUNC    */ 00560000
*     CTGLOC   BIT(3) CONSTANT('001'B), /* LOCATE                    */ 00561000
*     CTGLSP   BIT(3) CONSTANT('010'B), /* LSPACE                    */ 00562000
*     CTGUPDAT BIT(3) CONSTANT('011'B), /* UPDATE                    */ 00563000
*     CTGCMS   BIT(3) CONSTANT('100'B); /* CMS FUNCTION              */ 00564000
*   DECLARE                         /* CMS OPTIONS - CTGOPTNS        */ 00565000
*     CTGDEFIN BIT(5) CONSTANT('00001'B), /* DEFINE                  */ 00566000
*     CTGALTER BIT(5) CONSTANT('00010'B), /* ALTER                   */ 00567000
*     CTGDELET BIT(5) CONSTANT('00011'B), /* DELETE                  */ 00568000
*     CTGLTCAT BIT(5) CONSTANT('00100'B), /* LIST CATALOG            */ 00569000
*     CTGCNVTV BIT(5) CONSTANT('00110'B); /* CONVERTV        @Y30LSPS*/ 00570000
*   DECLARE                           /* RECORD ENTRY TYPE - CTGTYPE */ 00571000
*     CTGTDATA CHAR(1) CONSTANT('D'), /* DATA                        */ 00572000
*     CTGTINDX CHAR(1) CONSTANT('I'), /* INDEX                       */ 00573000
*     CTGTALIN CHAR(1) CONSTANT('A'), /* ALIEN                       */ 00574000
*     CTGTUCAT CHAR(1) CONSTANT('U'), /* USER CATALOG                */ 00575000
*     CTGTVOL  CHAR(1) CONSTANT('V'), /* VOLUME                      */ 00576000
*     CTGTCL   CHAR(1) CONSTANT('C'), /* CLUSTER                     */ 00577000
*     CTGTAIX  CHAR(1) CONSTANT('G'), /* ALTERNATE INDEX     @Y30SSPJ*/ 00578000
*     CTGTPATH CHAR(1) CONSTANT('R'), /* PATH                @Y30SSPJ*/ 00579000
*     CTGTFREE CHAR(1) CONSTANT('F'), /* FREE                @Y30SSPJ*/ 00580000
*     CTGTPTH  CHAR(1) CONSTANT('R'), /* PATH                @Y30SSSB*/ 00581000
*     CTGTUPG  CHAR(1) CONSTANT('Y'), /* UPGRADE             @Y30SSSB*/ 00582000
*     CTGTGBS  CHAR(1) CONSTANT('B'), /* GDG BASE              Y02020*/ 00583000
*     CTGTANM  CHAR(1) CONSTANT('X'), /* ALIAS NAME            Y02020*/ 00584000
*     CTGTPGSP CHAR(1) CONSTANT('P'), /* PAGE SPACE            Y02020*/ 00585000
*     CTGTMCAT CHAR(1) CONSTANT('M'); /* MASTER CATALOG              */ 00586000
*/********************************************************************/ 00587000
*/*                 PROBLEM  DETERMINATION  FIELDS                   */ 00588000
*/********************************************************************/ 00589000
*   DECLARE                                                        0210 00590000
*     1 * DEF(CTGDDNM),             /* PROBLEM DETERMINATION @Y30SSJG*/ 00591000
*       2 CTGPROB CHAR(4),          /* PROBLEM DETERMINATION @Y30SSJG*/ 00592000
*         3 CTGMODID CHAR(2),       /* MODULE IDENTIFICATION @Y30SSJG*/ 00593000
*         3 CTGREASN CHAR(2),       /* REASON CODE           @Y30SSJG*/ 00594000
*           4 CTGREAS1 CHAR(1),     /* HIGH ORDER BYTE ZERO  @Y30SSJG*/ 00595000
*           4 CTGREAS2 CHAR(1);     /* REASON CODE LOW BYTE  @Y30SSJG*/ 00596000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00597000
*         /*                                                         */ 00598000
*         /* CATALOG ERROR MESSAGE ID ARRAY- THE ENTRIES IN THIS     */ 00599000
*         /* TABLE DETERMINE THE STATIC TEXT ENTRY TO BE RETRIEVED   */ 00600000
*         /* AN ENTRY OF X'0B' INDICATES THE COMMON 'CATALOG ERROR'  */ 00601000
*         /* MESSAGE IS TO BE ISSUED. VALUES OTHER THAN '0B'X        */ 00602000
*         /* SIGNIFY A VERBAL REPRESENTATION OF A SPECIFIC CATALOG   */ 00603000
*         /* RETURN CODE. CATLG RETURN CODES EXIST IN MULTIPLES OF   */ 00604000
*         /* TWO (I.E. A RC = 20 IS ASSOCIATED WITH THE TENTH ENTRY  */ 00605000
*         /* IN THE TABLE.                                           */ 00606000
*         /*                                                         */ 00607000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00608000
*         DCL                                                      0211 00609000
*           CNVINDEX(128) CHAR(1) INIT(                            0211 00610000
*                  '0B'X,              /* COMMON TEXT CATLG ERROR    */ 00611000
*                  '0C'X,              /* CATALOG RC 4               */ 00612000
*               (7)'0B'X,              /* COMMON TEXT CATLG ERROR    */ 00613000
*                  '0D'X,              /* CATALOG RC 20              */ 00614000
*              (17)'0B'X,              /* COMMON TEXT-CATLG ERROR    */ 00615000
*                  '0E'X,              /* CATALOG RC 56              */ 00616000
*                  '0B'X,              /* COMMON TEXT-CATLG ERROR    */ 00617000
*                  '0F'X,              /* CATALOG RC 60              */ 00618000
*               (3)'0B'X,              /* COMMON TEXT-CATLG ERROR    */ 00619000
*                  '10'X,              /* CATALOG RC 68              */ 00620000
*                  '0B'X,              /* COMMON TEXT-CATLG ERROR    */ 00621000
*                  '11'X,              /* CATALOG RC 72              */ 00622000
*               (3)'0B'X,              /* COMMON TEXT-CATLG ERROR    */ 00623000
*                  '12'X,              /* CATALOG RC 80              */ 00624000
*                  '0B'X,              /* COMMON TEXT-CATLG ERROR    */ 00625000
*                  '13'X,              /* CATALOG RC 84              */ 00626000
*              (14)'0B'X,              /* COMMON TEXT-CATLG ERROR    */ 00627000
*                  '1F'X,              /* CATALOG RC 114     @Z40RSSA*/ 00628000
*                  '0B'X,              /* COMMON TEXT-CATLG ERROR    */ 00629000
*                  '20'X,              /* CATALOG RC 118     @Z40RSSA*/ 00630000
*              (14)'0B'X,              /* COMMON TEXT-CATLG ERROR    */ 00631000
*                  '15'X,              /* CATALOG RC 148             */ 00632000
*               (3)'0B'X,              /* COMMON TEXT-CATLG ERROR    */ 00633000
*                  '16'X,              /* CATALOG RC 156             */ 00634000
*               (7)'0B'X,              /* COMMON TEXT-CATLG ERROR    */ 00635000
*                  '17'X,              /* CATALOG RC 172             */ 00636000
*                  '0B'X,              /* COMMON TEXT-CATLG ERROR    */ 00637000
*                  '18'X,              /* CATALOG RC 176             */ 00638000
*               (3)'0B'X,              /* COMMON TEXT-CATLG ERROR    */ 00639000
*                  '19'X,              /* CATALOG RC 184             */ 00640000
*               (3)'0B'X,              /* COMMON TEXT-CATLG ERROR    */ 00641000
*                  '1A'X,              /* CATALOG RC 192             */ 00642000
*                  '0B'X,              /* COMMON TEXT-CATLG ERROR    */ 00643000
*                  '1B'X,              /* CATALOG RC 196             */ 00644000
*                  '0B'X,              /* COMMON TEXT-CATLG ERROR    */ 00645000
*                  '1B'X,              /* CATALOG RC 200             */ 00646000
*                  '0B'X,              /* COMMON TEXT-CATLG ERROR    */ 00647000
*                  '1C'X,              /* CATALOG RC 204             */ 00648000
*                  '0B'X,              /* COMMON TEXT-CATLG ERROR    */ 00649000
*                  '1D'X,              /* CATALOG RC 208             */ 00650000
*              (19)'0B'X,              /* COMMON TEXT-CATLG ERROR    */ 00651000
*                  '1E'X,              /* CATALOG RC 248             */ 00652000
*               (4)'0B'X);             /* COMMON TEXT-CATLG ERROR    */ 00653000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00654000
*         /*                                                         */ 00655000
*         /* INDEX FOR ACCESSING THE CNVINDEX                        */ 00656000
*         /*                                                         */ 00657000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00658000
*         DCL                                                      0212 00659000
*           CINDEX FIXED(31);                                      0212 00660000
*                                                                  0212 00661000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00662000
*         /*                                                         */ 00663000
*         /* INDEX FOR COMPUTING NAME LENGTH                         */ 00664000
*         /*                                                         */ 00665000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00666000
*         DCL                                                      0213 00667000
*           N FIXED(31);                                           0213 00668000
*                                                                  0213 00669000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00670000
*         /*                                                         */ 00671000
*         /* OVERLAY OF DSNAME REFERENCED FROM ERDARGL               */ 00672000
*         /*                                                         */ 00673000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00674000
*         DCL                                                      0214 00675000
*           ERDSNAME CHAR(44) BASED(ERDSNM);                       0214 00676000
*                                                                  0214 00677000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00678000
*         /*                                                         */ 00679000
*         /* ENTRY POINT TO CATERCNV - INTERNAL ERROR CONVERSION     */ 00680000
*         /*                                                         */ 00681000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00682000
*         OLDERID2 = NEWERID2;                                     0215 00683000
         L     @10,@PC00001                                        0215 00684000
         L     @10,GDTTR2(,@10)                                    0215 00685000
         MVC   @TS00001(95),NEWERID2(@10)                          0215 00686000
         MVC   OLDERID2(95,@10),@TS00001                           0215 00687000
*         NEWID2 = 'TPE2';                                         0216 00688000
*                                                                  0216 00689000
         MVC   NEWID2(4,@10),@CC00780                              0216 00690000
*         RFY CTGPL BASED (ERCPLPT);                               0217 00691000
*                                                                  0217 00692000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00693000
*         /*                                                         */ 00694000
*         /* INSURE THAT THE POINTER TO THE CPL HAS BEEN INITIALIZED */ 00695000
*         /*                                                         */ 00696000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00697000
*         IF ERCPLPT = NULLPTR                                     0218 00698000
*           THEN                                                   0218 00699000
         L     @10,ERCPLPT(,ERCNVADR)                              0218 00700000
         LTR   @10,@10                                             0218 00701000
         BNZ   @RF00218                                            0218 00702000
*             RETURN CODE(LASTCC08);                               0219 00703000
*                                                                  0219 00704000
         LA    @15,8                                               0219 00705000
         L     @14,@SA00002                                        0219 00706000
         LM    @00,@12,@SA00002+8                                  0219 00707000
         BR    @14                                                 0219 00708000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00709000
*         /*                                                         */ 00710000
*         /* COMPUTE THE INDEX TO BE USED IN ACCESSING THE CATALOG   */ 00711000
*         /* ERROR CONVERSION INDEX (CNVINDEX).                      */ 00712000
*         /* CATALOG ERROR CODES ARE MULTIPLES OF 2.                 */ 00713000
*         /*                                                         */ 00714000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00715000
*         CINDEX = ERCATRC / 2;                                    0220 00716000
*                                                                  0220 00717000
@RF00218 L     @10,ERCATRC(,ERCNVADR)                              0220 00718000
         LR    @00,@10                                             0220 00719000
         SRDA  @00,32                                              0220 00720000
         D     @00,@CF00145                                        0220 00721000
         LR    CINDEX,@01                                          0220 00722000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00723000
*         /*                                                         */ 00724000
*         /* INSURE VALIDITY OF ERCATRC WHICH WAS PASSED IN ERCNVTAB */ 00725000
*         /* . RETURN CODES MUST BE A MULTIPLE OF 2.                 */ 00726000
*         /* . THE MAXIMUM CINDEX IS 255.                            */ 00727000
*         /*                                                         */ 00728000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00729000
*         IF ERCATRC // 2 ¬= 0 |                                   0221 00730000
*            CINDEX > 128                                          0221 00731000
*           THEN                                                   0221 00732000
         LR    @00,@10                                             0221 00733000
         SRDA  @00,32                                              0221 00734000
         D     @00,@CF00145                                        0221 00735000
         LTR   @00,@00                                             0221 00736000
         BNZ   @RT00221                                            0221 00737000
         CH    CINDEX,@CH00753                                     0221 00738000
         BNH   @RF00221                                            0221 00739000
@RT00221 DS    0H                                                  0222 00740000
*             RETURN CODE(LASTCC08);                               0222 00741000
*                                                                  0222 00742000
         LA    @15,8                                               0222 00743000
         L     @14,@SA00002                                        0222 00744000
         LM    @00,@12,@SA00002+8                                  0222 00745000
         BR    @14                                                 0222 00746000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00747000
*         /*                                                         */ 00748000
*         /* INITIALIZE STANDARD PORTIONS OF DARGLIST IN ANTICIPATION*/ 00749000
*         /* OF THE VERBAL CATALOG TEXT RETRIEVAL.                   */ 00750000
*         /*                                                         */ 00751000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00752000
*         ERDARGL = ''B;                                           0223 00753000
@RF00221 XC    ERDARGL(52),ERDARGL                                 0223 00754000
*         DARGRETP = (ADDR(MSGBUFER));                             0224 00755000
         L     @10,DDSTRU                                          0224 00756000
         LA    @15,MSGBUFER                                        0224 00757000
         ST    @15,DARGRETP(,@10)                                  0224 00758000
*         DARGSMOD = 'TP6';                                        0225 00759000
         MVC   DARGSMOD(3,@10),@CC00630                            0225 00760000
*         DARGRETL = (LENGTH(MSGBUFER));                           0226 00761000
*                                                                  0226 00762000
         MVC   DARGRETL(2,@10),@CH00619                            0226 00763000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00764000
*         /*                                                         */ 00765000
*         /* SPECIAL PROCESSING IS PERFORMED WHEN THE CATALOG R.C.=8 */ 00766000
*         /* CHECK FOR THAT VALUE AND PERFORM NECESSARY PROCESSING   */ 00767000
*         /*                                                         */ 00768000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00769000
*         IF ERCATRC = CATRC08                                     0227 00770000
*           THEN                                                   0227 00771000
         CLC   ERCATRC(4,ERCNVADR),@CF00171                        0227 00772000
         BNE   @RF00227                                            0227 00773000
*             DO;                                                  0228 00774000
*             IF CTGREAS2 = FBFLG08                                0229 00775000
*               THEN                                               0229 00776000
         L     @03,ERCPLPT(,ERCNVADR)                              0229 00777000
         CLI   CTGREAS2(@03),X'08'                                 0229 00778000
         BNE   @RF00229                                            0229 00779000
*                 DARGSENT = DUPENTID;                             0230 00780000
*                                                                  0230 00781000
         MVI   DARGSENT(@10),X'0A'                                 0230 00782000
*               ELSE                                               0231 00783000
*                 DO;                                              0231 00784000
         B     @RC00229                                            0231 00785000
@RF00229 DS    0H                                                  0232 00786000
*                 IF ERDSNM ¬= NULLPTR                     /*@OZ09407*/ 00787000
*                   THEN                                   /*@OZ09407*/ 00788000
         L     @10,ERDSNM(,ERCNVADR)                               0232 00789000
         LTR   @10,@10                                             0232 00790000
         BZ    @RF00232                                            0232 00791000
*                     DO;                                  /*@OZ09407*/ 00792000
*                     DARGSENT = LOCENTID;                         0234 00793000
         L     @03,DDSTRU                                          0234 00794000
         MVI   DARGSENT(@03),X'09'                                 0234 00795000
*                     DARGDBP = ERDSNM;                            0235 00796000
*                                                                  0235 00797000
         ST    @10,DARGDBP(,@03)                                   0235 00798000
*                     /***********************************************/ 00799000
*                     /*                                             */ 00800000
*                     /* COMPUTE LENGTH OF NAME OR VOLSER AND PASS   */ 00801000
*                     /* THE LENGTH IN DARGILP. THIS PREVENTS LISTING*/ 00802000
*                     /* UNPRINTABLE CHARACTERS.                     */ 00803000
*                     /*                                             */ 00804000
*                     /***********************************************/ 00805000
*                     DO N = (LENGTH(ERDSNAME)) TO 1 BY -1         0236 00806000
*                        WHILE ERDSNAME(N) = '00'X   |             0236 00807000
*                              ERDSNAME(N) = '40'X;                0236 00808000
         LA    N,44                                                0236 00809000
@DL00236 L     @10,ERDSNM(,ERCNVADR)                               0236 00810000
         LR    @01,@10                                             0236 00811000
         ALR   @01,N                                               0236 00812000
         BCTR  @01,0                                               0236 00813000
         CLI   ERDSNAME(@01),X'00'                                 0236 00814000
         BE    @DB00236                                            0236 00815000
         ALR   @10,N                                               0236 00816000
         BCTR  @10,0                                               0236 00817000
         CLI   ERDSNAME(@10),X'40'                                 0236 00818000
         BNE   @DC00236                                            0236 00819000
@DB00236 DS    0H                                                  0237 00820000
*                     END;                                         0237 00821000
         BCTR  N,0                                                 0237 00822000
         LTR   N,N                                                 0237 00823000
         BP    @DL00236                                            0237 00824000
@DC00236 DS    0H                                                  0238 00825000
*                     DARGILP = N;                                 0238 00826000
         L     @10,DDSTRU                                          0238 00827000
         STH   N,DARGILP(,@10)                                     0238 00828000
*                     END;                                         0239 00829000
*                   ELSE                                   /*@OZ09407*/ 00830000
*                     DARGSENT = LOCCIID;                  /*@OZ09407*/ 00831000
         B     @RC00232                                            0240 00832000
@RF00232 L     @10,DDSTRU                                          0240 00833000
         MVI   DARGSENT(@10),X'0B'                                 0240 00834000
*                 END;                                     /*@OZ09407*/ 00835000
*             END;                                         /*@OZ09407*/ 00836000
*           ELSE                                           /*@OZ09407*/ 00837000
*             DO;                                          /*@OZ09407*/ 00838000
         B     @RC00227                                            0243 00839000
@RF00227 DS    0H                                                  0244 00840000
*             IF ERCATRC = CATRC240                        /*@OZ09407*/ 00841000
*               THEN                                       /*@OZ09407*/ 00842000
         CLC   ERCATRC(4,ERCNVADR),@CF00602                        0244 00843000
         BNE   @RF00244                                            0244 00844000
*                 DO;                                      /*@OZ09407*/ 00845000
*                   IF CTGREAS2 = LUBNF                    /*@OZ09407*/ 00846000
*                     THEN                                 /*@OZ09407*/ 00847000
         L     @10,ERCPLPT(,ERCNVADR)                              0246 00848000
         CLI   CTGREAS2(@10),X'14'                                 0246 00849000
         BNE   @RF00246                                            0246 00850000
*                       DARGSENT = CNVINDEX(CINDEX);       /*@OZ09407*/ 00851000
         SLR   @10,@10                                             0247 00852000
         IC    @10,CNVINDEX-1(CINDEX)                              0247 00853000
         L     @01,DDSTRU                                          0247 00854000
         STC   @10,DARGSENT(,@01)                                  0247 00855000
*                   ELSE                                   /*@OZ09407*/ 00856000
*                     DARGSENT = FDEFMID;                  /*@OZ09407*/ 00857000
         B     @RC00246                                            0248 00858000
@RF00246 L     @10,DDSTRU                                          0248 00859000
         MVI   DARGSENT(@10),X'2B'                                 0248 00860000
*                 END;                                     /*@OZ09407*/ 00861000
*               ELSE                                       /*@OZ09407*/ 00862000
*                 DARGSENT = CNVINDEX(CINDEX);             /*@OZ09407*/ 00863000
         B     @RC00244                                            0250 00864000
@RF00244 SLR   @10,@10                                             0250 00865000
         IC    @10,CNVINDEX-1(CINDEX)                              0250 00866000
         L     @01,DDSTRU                                          0250 00867000
         STC   @10,DARGSENT(,@01)                                  0250 00868000
*             END;                                                 0251 00869000
*                                                                  0251 00870000
@RC00244 DS    0H                                                  0252 00871000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00872000
*         /*                                                         */ 00873000
*         /* RETRIEVE THE VERBAL CATALOG RETURN CODE MESSAGE         */ 00874000
*         /*                                                         */ 00875000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00876000
*                                                                  0252 00877000
*         CALL AMSTP011 (GDTTBL,PRTFILE,DDSTRU);                   0252 00878000
*                                                                  0252 00879000
@RC00227 L     @10,@PC00001                                        0252 00880000
         ST    @10,@AL00001                                        0252 00881000
         LA    @15,@CF00107                                        0252 00882000
         ST    @15,@AL00001+4                                      0252 00883000
         LA    @15,DDSTRU                                          0252 00884000
         ST    @15,@AL00001+8                                      0252 00885000
         MVI   @AL00001+8,X'80'                                    0252 00886000
         L     @15,GDTPRT(,@10)                                    0252 00887000
         LA    @01,@AL00001                                        0252 00888000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             0252 00889000
*         RESPECIFY RTNREG RSTD;                                   0253 00890000
*         TESTRC = RTNREG;                                         0254 00891000
         LR    TESTRC,RTNREG                                       0254 00892000
*         RESPECIFY RTNREG UNRSTD;                                 0255 00893000
*                                                                  0255 00894000
*         IF TESTRC > 4                                            0256 00895000
*           THEN                                                   0256 00896000
         CH    TESTRC,@CH00034                                     0256 00897000
         BNH   @RF00256                                            0256 00898000
*             RETURN CODE(LASTCC08);                               0257 00899000
*                                                                  0257 00900000
*                                                                  0257 00901000
         LA    @15,8                                               0257 00902000
         L     @14,@SA00002                                        0257 00903000
         LM    @00,@12,@SA00002+8                                  0257 00904000
         BR    @14                                                 0257 00905000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00906000
*         /*                                                         */ 00907000
*         /* SET THE DARGLIST TO ZEROS                               */ 00908000
*         /*                                                         */ 00909000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00910000
*                                                                  0258 00911000
*         ERDARGL = ''B;                                           0258 00912000
*                                                                  0258 00913000
@RF00256 XC    ERDARGL(52),ERDARGL                                 0258 00914000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00915000
*         /*                                                         */ 00916000
*         /* TEST THE PROBLEM DETERMINATION FILEDS OF THE CPL.       */ 00917000
*         /* THE STATIC TEXT ENTRY USED WILL BE DETERMINED BY        */ 00918000
*         /* THE EXISTANCE OF PROBLEM DETERMINATION IN THE CPL.      */ 00919000
*         /*                                                         */ 00920000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00921000
*         IF CTGFDBK ¬= 0                                          0259 00922000
*           THEN                                                   0259 00923000
         L     @10,ERCPLPT(,ERCNVADR)                              0259 00924000
         MVC   @ZT00002+2(2),CTGFDBK(@10)                          0259 00925000
         L     @03,@ZT00002                                        0259 00926000
         LTR   @03,@03                                             0259 00927000
         BZ    @RF00259                                            0259 00928000
*             DO;                                                  0260 00929000
*                                                                  0260 00930000
*             DARGSMOD  = 'TP6';                                   0261 00931000
         L     @03,DDSTRU                                          0261 00932000
         MVC   DARGSMOD(3,@03),@CC00630                            0261 00933000
*             DARGSENT  = LONGCTG;                                 0262 00934000
         MVI   DARGSENT(@03),X'02'                                 0262 00935000
*             DARGCNT   = 3;                                       0263 00936000
         LA    @15,3                                               0263 00937000
         STH   @15,DARGCNT(,@03)                                   0263 00938000
*             DARGDBP   = (ADDR(MSGBUFER));                        0264 00939000
         LA    @14,MSGBUFER                                        0264 00940000
         ST    @14,DARGDBP(,@03)                                   0264 00941000
*             DARGILP   = (LENGTH(MSGBUFER));                      0265 00942000
         MVC   DARGILP(2,@03),@CH00619                             0265 00943000
*             DARGINS(1)  = 1;                                     0266 00944000
         MVC   DARGINS(2,@03),@CH00211                             0266 00945000
*             DARGINL(1)  = 2;                                     0267 00946000
         LA    @14,2                                               0267 00947000
         STH   @14,DARGINL(,@03)                                   0267 00948000
*             DARGDTM(1)  = (ADDR(ERCATRC) + 2);                   0268 00949000
         LA    @09,ERCATRC(,ERCNVADR)                              0268 00950000
         ALR   @09,@14                                             0268 00951000
         ST    @09,DARGDTM(,@03)                                   0268 00952000
*             DARGINS(2)  = 2;                                     0269 00953000
         STH   @14,DARGINS+8(,@03)                                 0269 00954000
*             DARGINL(2)  = 2;                                     0270 00955000
         STH   @14,DARGINL+8(,@03)                                 0270 00956000
*             DARGDTM(2)  = ADDR(CTGFDBK);                         0271 00957000
         LA    @09,CTGFDBK(,@10)                                   0271 00958000
         ST    @09,DARGDTM+8(,@03)                                 0271 00959000
*             DARGINS(3)  = 3;                                     0272 00960000
         STH   @15,DARGINS+16(,@03)                                0272 00961000
*             DARGINL(3)  = 2;                                     0273 00962000
         STH   @14,DARGINL+16(,@03)                                0273 00963000
*             DARGDTM(3)  = ADDR(CTGFBFLG);                        0274 00964000
*                                                                  0274 00965000
         LA    @10,CTGFBFLG(,@10)                                  0274 00966000
         ST    @10,DARGDTM+16(,@03)                                0274 00967000
*             END;                                                 0275 00968000
*                                                                  0275 00969000
*           ELSE                                                   0276 00970000
*             DO;                                                  0276 00971000
*                                                                  0276 00972000
         B     @RC00259                                            0276 00973000
@RF00259 DS    0H                                                  0277 00974000
*             DARGSMOD    = 'TP6';                                 0277 00975000
         L     @10,DDSTRU                                          0277 00976000
         MVC   DARGSMOD(3,@10),@CC00630                            0277 00977000
*             DARGSENT    = SHORTCTG;                              0278 00978000
         MVI   DARGSENT(@10),X'01'                                 0278 00979000
*             DARGCNT     = 1;                                     0279 00980000
         LA    @03,1                                               0279 00981000
         STH   @03,DARGCNT(,@10)                                   0279 00982000
*             DARGDBP     = (ADDR(MSGBUFER));                      0280 00983000
         LA    @15,MSGBUFER                                        0280 00984000
         ST    @15,DARGDBP(,@10)                                   0280 00985000
*             DARGILP     = (LENGTH(MSGBUFER));                    0281 00986000
         MVC   DARGILP(2,@10),@CH00619                             0281 00987000
*             DARGINS(1)  = 1;                                     0282 00988000
         STH   @03,DARGINS(,@10)                                   0282 00989000
*             DARGINL(1)  = 2;                                     0283 00990000
         LA    @03,2                                               0283 00991000
         STH   @03,DARGINL(,@10)                                   0283 00992000
*             DARGDTM(1)  = (ADDR(ERCATRC) + 2);                   0284 00993000
*                                                                  0284 00994000
         LA    @15,ERCATRC(,ERCNVADR)                              0284 00995000
         ALR   @15,@03                                             0284 00996000
         ST    @15,DARGDTM(,@10)                                   0284 00997000
*             END;                                                 0285 00998000
*                                                                  0285 00999000
*         /***********************************************************/ 01000000
*         /*                                                         */ 01001000
*         /* RETURN TO MAIN PROCEDURE TO PRINT THE MESSAGE           */ 01002000
*         /*                                                         */ 01003000
*         /***********************************************************/ 01004000
*                                                                  0286 01005000
*         RETURN CODE(LASTCC00);                                   0286 01006000
*                                                                  0286 01007000
@RC00259 SLR   @15,@15                                             0286 01008000
         L     @14,@SA00002                                        0286 01009000
         LM    @00,@12,@SA00002+8                                  0286 01010000
         BR    @14                                                 0286 01011000
*         END CATERCNV;                                            0287 01012000
*/********************************************************************/ 01013000
*/*                                                                  */ 01014000
*/* PROCEDURE NAME - DAERCNV                                         */ 01015000
*/*                                                          @Z40GSJG*/ 01016000
*/* FUNCTION - CONVERT DYNAMIC ALLOCATION ERROR RETURN       @Z40GSJG*/ 01017000
*/*            CODES INTO VERBAL MESSAGES. THIS PROCEDURE    @Z40GSJG*/ 01018000
*/*            INVOKES THE SYSTEM SERVICE ROUTINE DAIRFAIL   @Z40GSJG*/ 01019000
*/*            AND PRINTS THE RETURNED VERBALIZED ERROR      @Z40GSJG*/ 01020000
*/*            RETURN CODE MESSAGE(S).                       @Z40GSJG*/ 01021000
*/*                                                          @Z40GSJG*/ 01022000
*/*            IN MOST CASES, DAIRFAIL PROVIDES BOTH A       @Z40GSJG*/ 01023000
*/*            PRIMARY AND A SECONDARY MESSAGE. FOR THOSE    @Z40GSJG*/ 01024000
*/*            RETURN CODE HAVING ONLY ONE MESSAGE, A STID   @Z40GSJG*/ 01025000
*/*            INDICATING A SINGLE MESSAGE FORMAT LIST IS    @Z40GSJG*/ 01026000
*/*            USED.                                         @Z40GSJG*/ 01027000
*/*                                                          @Z40GSJG*/ 01028000
*/*            BOTH THE PRIMARY AND SECONDARY MESSAGES ARE   @Z40GSJG*/ 01029000
*/*            TRANSMITTED BY A SINGLE DYNAMIC DATA STRUCTURE@Z40GSJG*/ 01030000
*/*            ARGUMENT LIST (DARGLIST). IF IDCAMS IS BEING  @Z40GSJG*/ 01031000
*/*            USED INTERACTIVLY VIA TSO, THE SECONDARY      @Z40GSJG*/ 01032000
*/*            MESSAGE IS ISSUED TO THE TSO SECOND LEVEL     @Z40GSJG*/ 01033000
*/*            INFORMATIONAL CHAIN.                          @Z40GSJG*/ 01034000
*/*                                                          @Z40GSJG*/ 01035000
*/* INPUT    - THERE ARE NO ARGUMENTS OF INVOCATION TO THIS  @Z40GSJG*/ 01036000
*/*            PROCEDURE. THE FOLLOWING AREAS GLOBAL TO      @Z40GSJG*/ 01037000
*/*            IDCTP06 ARE USED BY DAERCNV.                  @Z40GSJG*/ 01038000
*/*                                                          @Z40GSJG*/ 01039000
*/*             . ERCNVTAB - THE ERROR CONVERSION TABLE      @Z40GSJG*/ 01040000
*/*                 ERDYNRC - DYNAMIC ALLOCATION RETURN CODE.@Z40GSJG*/ 01041000
*/*                 ERDARBPT - POINTER TO SVC99 REQUEST BLOCK@Z40GSJG*/ 01042000
*/*                                                          @Z40GSJG*/ 01043000
*/* OUTPUT -                                                 @Z40GSJG*/ 01044000
*/*             THE DARGLIST IS INITIALIZED IN ORDER TO      @Z40GSJG*/ 01045000
*/*             PRINT THE CONVERTED MESSAGE(S).              @Z40GSJG*/ 01046000
*/*                                                          @Z40GSJG*/ 01047000
*/***********************************************************@Z40GSJG*/ 01048000
*                                                                  0288 01049000
*DAERCNV: PROCEDURE;                                       /*@Z40GSJG*/ 01050000
DAERCNV  STM   @14,@12,@SA00003                                    0288 01051000
*/********************************************************************/ 01052000
*/*                                                                  */ 01053000
*/* *** IKJEFFDF ***     LEVEL=06/19/75     OS/VS2 RELEASE 4.0       */ 01054000
*/*                                                          @Z40NQKJ*/ 01055000
*/* DESCRIPTION - BILINGUAL MAPPING MACRO FOR IKJEFF18 PARAMETER     */ 01056000
*/*               LIST (DYNAMIC ALLOCATION SVC99 FAILURES OR         */ 01057000
*/*               DAIR FAILURES)                                     */ 01058000
*/*                                                                  */ 01059000
*/* FUNCTION   - THE PARAMETER LIST IS THE INTERFACE                 */ 01060000
*/*              TO IKJEFF18 FROM CALLER WITH AN ERROR RETURN        */ 01061000
*/*              FROM SVC99 OR DAIR                                  */ 01062000
*/*                                                                  */ 01063000
*/*              REGISTER 1 CONTAINS THE ADDRESS OF DFPARMS          */ 01064000
*/*              REGISTER 15 WILL CONTAIN IKJEFF18'S RETURN CODE     */ 01065000
*/*                          TO THE CALLER (0 IF MESSAGE(S)          */ 01066000
*/*                          ISSUED SUCCESSFULLY)                    */ 01067000
*/*                                                                  */ 01068000
*/* METHOD OF ACCESS                                                 */ 01069000
*/*      PL/S   - %DFTYPE='BDY(WORD)'- - - IF DON'T WANT BASED       */ 01070000
*/*                                        (THIS IS THE DEFAULT)     */ 01071000
*/*               %DFTYPE2='BASED(DFBUFP)' IF WANT TO HAVE   @Z40GQKU*/ 01072000
*/*                                        BASED (THIS IS THE@Z40GQKU*/ 01073000
*/*                                        DEFAULT)          @Z40GQKU*/ 01074000
*/*               %INCLUDE SYSLIB(IKJEFFDF)                          */ 01075000
*/*                                                                  */ 01076000
*/*      BAL    - DFDSECT=YES  IF DON'T WANT TO GET CORE             */ 01077000
*/*                 THEN CODE      LA    REG,MYDFCORE  *CALLER AREA  */ 01078000
*/*                                USING DFSECTD,REG                 */ 01079000
*/*               DFDSECT=NO   IS THE DEFAULT.                       */ 01080000
*/*               DFDSEC2=YES  IF DON'T WANT TO GET CORE     @Z40GQKU*/ 01081000
*/*                 THEN CODE      LA    REG,MYDFCORE        @Z40GQKU*/ 01082000
*/*                                           *CALLER AREA   @Z40GQKU*/ 01083000
*/*                                USING DFDSECT2,REG        @Z40GQKU*/ 01084000
*/*               DFDSEC2=NO   THIS IS THE DEFAULT           @Z40GQKU*/ 01085000
*/*                                                                  */ 01086000
*/*               IKJEFFDF                                           */ 01087000
*/*                                                                  */ 01088000
*/* NOTES       - IKJEFF18 WILL INDEX INTO THE S99RB FOR SVC 99      */ 01089000
*/*               ERRORS AND THE DAIR PARAMETER BLOCK FOR DAIR       */ 01090000
*/*               ERRORS TO OBTAIN DSNAME, DDNAME, VOLSER,ETC,       */ 01091000
*/*               INFORMATION WHICH MAY BE INSERTED INTO THE         */ 01092000
*/*               OUTPUT MESSAGE                                     */ 01093000
*/*                                                                  */ 01094000
*/* F.E.'S      - MICROFICHE LISTING    IKJEFFDF                     */ 01095000
*/*                                                                  */ 01096000
*/********************************************************************/ 01097000
*   DCL 1 DFPARMS BDY(WORD),           /* PARAMETER LIST TO IKJEFF18 */ 01098000
*        2 DFS99RBP PTR(31),           /* ADDRESS OF THE FAILING SVC 99 01099000
*                                         REQUEST BLOCK FOR SVC 99 0289 01100000
*                                         ERRORS                     */ 01101000
*         3 DFDAPLP PTR(31),           /* ADDRESS OF THE FAILING DAIR   01102000
*                                         PARAMETER LIST FOR DAIR  0289 01103000
*                                         ERRORS                     */ 01104000
*        2 DFRCP PTR(31),              /* ADDRESS OF A FOUR BYTE   0289 01105000
*                                         STORAGE AREA CONTAINING THE   01106000
*                                         SVC 99 OR THE DAIR REGISTER   01107000
*                                         15 RETURN CODE             */ 01108000
*        2 DFJEFF02 PTR(31),           /* ADDRESS OF A FOUR BYTE   0289 01109000
*                                         STORAGE AREA WHICH CONTAINS   01110000
*                                         EITHER THE ENTRY POINT   0289 01111000
*                                         ADDRESS OF IKJEFF02 (MESSAGE  01112000
*                                         WRITER FOR IKJEFF18) OR  0289 01113000
*                                         ZEROES IF ENTRY ADDRESS  0289 01114000
*                                         UNKNOWN                    */ 01115000
*        2 DFIDP PTR(31),              /* ADDR OF DFID FIELD @Z40GQKU*/ 01116000
*        2 DFCPPLP PTR(31),            /* ADDRESS OF THE CPPL - THIS    01117000
*                                         IS NEEDED ONLY WHEN IKJEFF18  01118000
*                                         IS CALLED WITH AN SVC 99 0289 01119000
*                                         ERROR                      */ 01120000
*        2 DFBUFP PTR(31);             /* ADDRESS OF DFBUFS FIELD  0289 01121000
*                                         IF DFBUFSW OR DFBUFS2    0289 01122000
*                                         ON                 @Z40GQKU*/ 01123000
*                                                                  0289 01124000
*   /* IKJEFFDF - RETURN CODE, MESSAGE WRITER ENTRY AND              */ 01125000
*   /*            CALLER IDENTIFIER POINTED TO BY DFPARMS            */ 01126000
*                                                                  0290 01127000
*   DCL DFRC FIXED(31) BASED(DFRCP);    /* RETURN CODE FROM SVC 99 0290 01128000
*                                          OR DAIR                   */ 01129000
*   DCL DFMSGWTP PTR(31) BASED(DFJEFF02); /* ENTRY POINT ADDRESS OF     01130000
*                                            IKJEFF02 OR ZEROES      */ 01131000
*   /* MAP OF THE CALLER IDENTIFIER AREA POINTED TO BY DFIDP         */ 01132000
*   DCL 1 DFID FIXED(15) BASED(DFIDP), /* CALLER IDENTIFIER          */ 01133000
*        2 * BIT(8),                   /* FLAG AREA                  */ 01134000
*         3 DFWTP BIT(1),              /* ON IF THE CALLER WANTS A 0292 01135000
*                                         WRITE TO PROGRAMMER INSTEAD   01136000
*                                         OF A DEFAULT PUTLINE       */ 01137000
*         3 DFBUFSW BIT(1),         /* ON IF THE CALLER WANTS@Z40GQKU   01138000
*                                      MESSAGE TEXT RETURNED @Z40GQKU   01139000
*                                      IN BUFFERS INSTEAD OF @Z40GQKU   01140000
*                                      A DEFAULT PUTLINE     @Z40GQKU*/ 01141000
*         3 DFBUFS2 BIT(1),         /* ON IF WANT DFBUFSW    @Z40GQKU   01142000
*                                      FUNCTION PLUS PUTLINE @Z40GQKU   01143000
*                                      (OR WTP)              @Z40GQKU*/ 01144000
*         3 * BIT(5),                  /* RESERVED - MUST BE ZERO    */ 01145000
*       2 IDNUM FIXED(8),              /* CALLER IDENTIFIER NUMBER 0292 01146000
*                                         (VALUES DESCRIBED BELOW)   */ 01147000
*         3 DFIDNUM FIXED(8);          /* ALTERNATE NAME           0292 01148000
*                                         FOR IDNUM          @Z40NQKQ*/ 01149000
*   /* POSSIBLE VALUES FOR IDNUM                                     */ 01150000
*   DCL DFSVC99 FIXED(8) CONSTANT(50); /* GENERAL CALLER WITH AN   0293 01151000
*                                         SVC 99 ERROR       @Z40NQKQ*/ 01152000
*   DCL DFFREE FIXED(8) CONSTANT(51); /* FREE COMMAND WITH AN      0294 01153000
*                                         SVC 99 ERROR       @Z40NQKQ*/ 01154000
*   DCL DFDAIR FIXED(8) CONSTANT(1);  /* GENERAL CALLER WITH A     0295 01155000
*                                         DAIR ERROR         @Z40NQKQ*/ 01156000
*   /*  MAP OF CALLER-SUPPLIED BUFFERS                       @Z40GQKU*/ 01157000
*   DCL 1 DFBUFS BASED(DFBUFP),     /* (NEED NOT INITIALIZE) @Z40GQKU*/ 01158000
*        2 DFBUF1,                  /* FIRST EXTRACT BUFFER  @Z40GQKU*/ 01159000
*         3 DFBUFL1 FIXED(15),      /* LENGTH OF AREA USED IN@Z40GQKU   01160000
*                                      DFBUF1 (INCLUDES      @Z40GQKU   01161000
*                                      DFBUFL1 AND DFBUFO1   @Z40GQKU   01162000
*                                      LENGTHS)              @Z40GQKU*/ 01163000
*         3 DFBUFO1 FIXED(15),      /* OFFSET IS ZERO ON     @Z40GQKU   01164000
*                                      RETURN                @Z40GQKU*/ 01165000
*         3 DFBUFT1 CHAR(251),      /* TEXT OF FIRST LEVEL   @Z40GQKU   01166000
*                                      MESSAGE               @Z40GQKU*/ 01167000
*        2 *       CHAR(1),         /* ALIGNMENT FACTOR      @Z40GQKU*/ 01168000
*        2 DFBUF2 BDY(HWORD),       /* SECOND EXTRACT BUFFER @Z40GQKU*/ 01169000
*         3 DFBUFL2 FIXED(15),      /* LENGTH (INCLUDES LLOO @Z40GQKU   01170000
*                                      FIELDS)               @Z40GQKU*/ 01171000
*         3 DFBUFO2 FIXED(15),      /* OFFSET                @Z40GQKU*/ 01172000
*         3 DFBUFT2 CHAR(251);      /* TEXT OF SECOND LEVEL  @Z40GQKU   01173000
*                                      MESSAGE               @Z40GQKU*/ 01174000
*/********************************************************************/ 01175000
*/* END OF IKJEFFDF MAPPING MACRO                                    */ 01176000
*/********************************************************************/ 01177000
*          /*************************************************@Z40GSJG*/ 01178000
*          /*                                                @Z40GSJG*/ 01179000
*          /* CONSTANTS USED BY DAERCNV                      @Z40GSJG*/ 01180000
*          /*                                                @Z40GSJG*/ 01181000
*          /*************************************************@Z40GSJG*/ 01182000
*                                                                  0297 01183000
*          DECLARE                                                 0297 01184000
*            DBLMSG   FIXED(15)   CONSTANT(6),/* DOUBLE      @Z40GSJG*/ 01185000
*                                             /* STID        @Z40GSJG*/ 01186000
*            LL00     FIXED(15)   CONSTANT(4),/* LENGTH LL00 @Z40GSJG*/ 01187000
*            MSGWTR   FIXED(31)   CONSTANT(0),/* DUMMY MSG.  @Z40GSJG*/ 01188000
*                                             /* WRITTER ADDR@Z40GSJG*/ 01189000
*            ONEMSG   FIXED(15)   CONSTANT(0),/* SINGLE MSG. @Z40GSJG*/ 01190000
*                                             /* INDICATOR   @Z40GSJG*/ 01191000
*            SGLMSG   FIXED(15)   CONSTANT(5);/* SINGLE MSG. @Z40GSJG*/ 01192000
*                                             /* STID        @Z40GSJG*/ 01193000
*                                                                  0298 01194000
*          /*************************************************@Z40GSJG*/ 01195000
*          /*                                                @Z40GSJG*/ 01196000
*          /* STORAGE - DAIRFAIL CALLER IDENTIFICATION AREA  @Z40GSJG*/ 01197000
*          /*                                                @Z40GSJG*/ 01198000
*          /*************************************************@Z40GSJG*/ 01199000
*                                                                  0298 01200000
*          DECLARE                                                 0298 01201000
*            CIDAFLD CHAR(LENGTH(DFID));  /* CALLER ID AREA  @Z40GSJG*/ 01202000
*                                                                  0298 01203000
*          /*************************************************@Z40GSJG*/ 01204000
*          /*                                                @Z40GSJG*/ 01205000
*          /* STORAGE - DAIRFAIL MESSAGE BUFFER AREA         @Z40GSJG*/ 01206000
*          /*                                                @Z40GSJG*/ 01207000
*          /*************************************************@Z40GSJG*/ 01208000
*                                                                  0299 01209000
*          DECLARE                                                 0299 01210000
*            DAIRFBUF CHAR(LENGTH(DFBUFS));                /*@Z40GSJG*/ 01211000
*         /**************************************************@Z40GSJG*/ 01212000
*         /*                                                 @Z40GSJG*/ 01213000
*         /* ENTRY POINT TO DAERCNV                          @Z40GSJG*/ 01214000
*         /*                                                 @Z40GSJG*/ 01215000
*         /**************************************************@Z40GSJG*/ 01216000
*                                                                  0300 01217000
*         OLDERID2 = NEWERID2;                                     0300 01218000
         L     @10,@PC00001                                        0300 01219000
         L     @10,GDTTR2(,@10)                                    0300 01220000
         MVC   @TS00001(95),NEWERID2(@10)                          0300 01221000
         MVC   OLDERID2(95,@10),@TS00001                           0300 01222000
*         NEWID2 = 'TPE4';                                 /*@Z40GSJG*/ 01223000
*                                                                  0301 01224000
         MVC   NEWID2(4,@10),@CC00829                              0301 01225000
*         /**************************************************@Z40GSJG*/ 01226000
*         /*                                                 @Z40GSJG*/ 01227000
*         /* INSURE THAT THE SVC99 (ALLOCATE) REQUEST BLOCK  @Z40GSJG*/ 01228000
*         /* POINTER, PASSED IN ERCNVTAB, IS OTHER THAN      @Z40GSJG*/ 01229000
*         /* ZERO. A ZERO POINTER IS AN ERCNVTAB ERROR.      @Z40GSJG*/ 01230000
*         /*                                                 @Z40GSJG*/ 01231000
*         /**************************************************@Z40GSJG*/ 01232000
*                                                                  0302 01233000
*         IF ERDARBPT = NULLPTR                            /*@Z40GSJG*/ 01234000
*           THEN                                           /*@Z40GSJG*/ 01235000
         L     @10,ERDARBPT(,ERCNVADR)                             0302 01236000
         LTR   @10,@10                                             0302 01237000
         BNZ   @RF00302                                            0302 01238000
*             RETURN CODE(LASTCC08);                       /*@Z40GSJG*/ 01239000
*                                                                  0303 01240000
         LA    @15,8                                               0303 01241000
         L     @14,@SA00003                                        0303 01242000
         LM    @00,@12,@SA00003+8                                  0303 01243000
         BR    @14                                                 0303 01244000
*           ELSE;                                          /*@Z40GSJG*/ 01245000
@RF00302 DS    0H                                                  0305 01246000
*         /**************************************************@Z40GSJG*/ 01247000
*         /*                                                 @Z40GSJG*/ 01248000
*         /* THE ERCNVTAB IS GOOD - INITIALIZE THE COMMON    @Z40GSJG*/ 01249000
*         /* PORTION OF THE DARGLIST.                        @Z40GSJG*/ 01250000
*         /*                                                 @Z40GSJG*/ 01251000
*         /**************************************************@Z40GSJG*/ 01252000
*                                                                  0305 01253000
*         DARGSMOD = 'TP6';                                /*@Z40GSJG*/ 01254000
*                                                                  0305 01255000
         L     @10,DDSTRU                                          0305 01256000
         MVC   DARGSMOD(3,@10),@CC00630                            0305 01257000
*         /**************************************************@Z40GSJG*/ 01258000
*         /*                                                 @Z40GSJG*/ 01259000
*         /* BUILD THE DAIRFAIL PARAMETER LIST               @Z40GSJG*/ 01260000
*         /*                                                 @Z40GSJG*/ 01261000
*         /**************************************************@Z40GSJG*/ 01262000
*                                                                  0306 01263000

**********************************************************************  00050002
*                                                                    *  00100002
* MODULE NAME - IDCTSAL0 - STATIC TEXT MODULE FOR ALTER              *  00150002
*                                                                    *  00200002

*                                                                    *  00300002

*                                                                    *  00360002
* STATUS - RELEASE 2  LEVEL 0                                        *  00370003

*     MODIFY   TXT23.                                          @Z40RSSA 00374004
*                                                                    *  00380002
* FUNCTION - CONTAINS NO EXECUTIBLE CODE, ONLY STATIC TEXT ENTRIES   *  00390002
*        FOR THE FUNCTION ALTER                                      *  00392002

*        REQUEST IS MADE.                                            *  00396002

./  ADD  SSI=50771251,NAME=IDCTSBI0
         TITLE '***** IDCTSBI0 - BLDINDEX STATIC TEXT *****'            00050003
**********************************************************************  00100003
*                                                                    *  00150003
* MODULE NAME - IDCTSBI0 - STATIC TEXT MODULE FOR BLDINDEX           *  00200003
*                                                                    *  00250003
* DESCRIPTIVE NAME - STATIC TEXT MODULE FOR THE FUNCTION BLDINDEX    *  00300003
*                                                                    *  00350003
* COPYRIGHT - NONE                                                   *  00400003
*                                                                    *  00450003
* STATUS - RELEASE 2  LEVEL 0                                        *  00500003
*                                                                    *  00550003
* FUNCTION - CONTAINS NO EXECUTIBLE CODE, ONLY STATIC TEXT ENTRIES   *  00600003
*        FOR THE FUNCTION BLDINDEX.                                  *  00650003
*        THIS MODULE IS LOADED BY IDCTP05 WHEN A STATIC TEXT         *  00700003
*        REQUEST IS MADE.                                            *  00750003
*                                                                    *  00800003
* NOTES - NONE                                                       *  00850003
*                                                                    *  00900003
*    DEPENDENCIES - NONE                                             *  00950003
*    RESTRICTIONS - NONE                                             *  01000003
*    REGISTER CONVENTIONS - NA                                       *  01050003
*    PATCH AREA - NA                                                 *  01100003
*                                                                    *  01150003
* MODULE TYPE - TABLES                                               *  01200003
*                                                                    *  01250003
*        PROCESSOR - ASSEMBLER                                       *  01300003
*        MODULE SIZE - 1400 BYTES                                    *  01350003
*        ATTRIBUTES - READ ONLY                                      *  01400003
*                                                                    *  01450003
*  ENTRY POINT - NA                                                  *  01500003
*                                                                    *  01550003
*  EXIT NORMAL - NA                                                  *  01600003
*                                                                    *  01650003
*  EXIT ERROR - NA                                                   *  01700003
*                                                                    *  01750003

*********************************************************************   02250003
*                                                                    *  02300003
* THIS MODULE IS THE FIRST MODULE OF STATIC TEXT REQUIRED BY THE     *  02350003

*********************************************************************   02500003
*                                                                    *  02550003
IDCTSBI0 CSECT                                                          02600003
*                                                                       02650003
* THIS SECTION CONTAINS THE INDICES TO REACH AN ENTRY.               *  02700003
*                                                                       02750003
INDEX    DC  H'19'                     COUNT OF ENTRIES.                02800003
INDEX1   DC  Y(TXT1-INDEX)             INVALID AIX                      02850003
INDEX2   DC  Y(TXT2-INDEX)             INVALID BASE CLUSTER             02900003
INDEX3   DC  Y(TXT3-INDEX)             AIX NOT RELATED TO BASE          02950003
INDEX4   DC  Y(TXT4-INDEX)             BASE IS EMPTY                    03000003
INDEX5   DC  Y(TXT5-INDEX)             AIX KEY NOT IN BASE - KSDS       03050003
INDEX6   DC  Y(TXT6-INDEX)             NONUNIQUE AIX KEY - KSDS         03100003
INDEX7   DC  Y(TXT7-INDEX)             EXCESS PRIME POINTERS            03150003
INDEX8   DC  Y(TXT8-INDEX)             NO CORE FOR BUFFERS/WORKAREAS    03200003
INDEX9   DC  Y(TXT9-INDEX)             JOB CONTROL ERROR                03250003
INDEX10  DC  Y(TXT10-INDEX)            NO CORE TO START SORT            03300003
INDEX11  DC  Y(TXT11-INDEX)            NO CORE TO FINISH SORT           03350003
INDEX12  DC  Y(TXT12-INDEX)            SORT FILE DEFINE FAILED          03400003
INDEX13  DC  Y(TXT13-INDEX)            AIX SUCCESSFULLY BUILT           03450003
INDEX14  DC  Y(TXT14-INDEX)            AIX BUILT WITH ERRORS            03500003
INDEX15  DC  Y(TXT15-INDEX)            AIX WAS NOT BUILT                03550003
INDEX16  DC  Y(TXT16-INDEX)            DATA NOT RETURNED BY LOCATE      03600003
INDEX17  DC  Y(TXT17-INDEX)            AIX KEY NOT IN BASE - ESDS       03650003
INDEX18  DC  Y(TXT18-INDEX)            NONUNIQUE AIX KEY - ESDS         03700003
INDEX19  DC  Y(TXT19-INDEX)            LOCATE FAILURE                   03750003
         EJECT                                                          03800003
