*********************************************************************** 00200000
*                                                                     * 00300000
* MODULE NAME - IDCTSCK0 - STATIC TEXT MODULE FOR CHKLIST MESSAGES    * 00400000
*                          AND REPORT DETAIL LINES                    * 00500000
*                                                                     * 00600000
* DESCRIPTIVE NAME - STATIC TEXT MODULE FOR THE CHECKPOINT LIST       * 00700000
*                    UTILITY FUNCTION MESSAGES AND DETAIL LINES       * 00800000
*                                                                     * 00900000
* COPYRIGHT - NONE                                                    * 01000000
*                                                                     * 01100000
* STATUS - RELEASE 0  LEVEL 0                                         * 01200000
*                                                                     * 01300000
* FUNCTION - CONTAINS NO EXECUTABLE CODE, ONLY STATIC TEXT ENTRIES    * 01400000
*            FOR THE CHECKPOINT LIST UTILITY (CHKLIST) FUNCTION       * 01500000
*            THIS MODULE IS LOADED BY IDCTP05 WHEN A STATIC TEXT      * 01600000
*            REQUEST IS MADE                                          * 01700000
*                                                                     * 01800000
* NOTES - NONE                                                        * 01900000
*                                                                     * 02000000
*    DEPENDENCIES - NONE                                              * 02100000
*    RESTRICTIONS - NONE                                              * 02200000
*    REGISTER CONVENTIONS - NA                                        * 02300000
*    PATCH AREA - NA                                                  * 02400000
*                                                                     * 02500000
* MODULE TYPE - TABLES                                                * 02600000
*                                                                     * 02700000
*    PROCESSER - ASSEMBLER                                            * 02800000
*    MODULE SIZE -                                                    * 02900000
*    ATTRIBUTES - READ ONLY                                           * 03000000
*                                                                     * 03100000
* ENTRY POINT - NA                                                    * 03200000
*                                                                     * 03300000
* EXIT NORMAL - NA                                                    * 03400000
*                                                                     * 03500000
* EXIT ERROR - NA                                                     * 03600000
*                                                                     * 03700000
* EXTERNAL REFERENCES - NA                                            * 03800000
*                                                                     * 03900000
* TABLES - NA                                                         * 04000000
*                                                                     * 04100000
* MACROS - NA                                                         * 04200000
*                                                                     * 04300000
* CHANGE ACTIVITY - NONE                                              * 04400000
*                                                                     * 04500000
*********************************************************************** 04600000
*                                                                     * 04700000
*********************************************************************** 04800000
*                                                                     * 04900000
* THIS MODULE IS THE FIRST MODULE OF STATIC TEXT REQUIRED BY THE      * 05000000
* CHECKPOINT LIST (CHKLIST) FUNCTION SUPORT ROUTINE                   * 05100000
*                                                                     * 05200000
*********************************************************************** 05300000
*                                                                     * 05400000
IDCTSCK0 CSECT                                                          05500000
*                                                                     * 05600000
*********************************************************************** 05700000
         EJECT                                                          05800000
*********************************************************************** 05900000
*                                                                     * 06000000
* INDEXES TO CHKLIST STATIC TEXT ENTRIES                              * 06100000
*                                                                     * 06200000
*********************************************************************** 06300000
         SPACE 1                                                        06400000
INDEX    DC    H'12'                    COUNT OF ENTRIES                06500000
INDEX1   DC    Y(TXT1-INDEX)            HEADER INFORMATION              06600000
INDEX2   DC    Y(TXT2-INDEX)            CHECKID DETAIL LINE             06700000
INDEX3   DC    Y(TXT3-INDEX)            DATA SET INFO DETAIL LINE       06800000
INDEX4   DC    Y(TXT4-INDEX)            VOLUME SERIALS DETAIL LINE      06900000
INDEX5   DC    Y(TXT5-INDEX)            SELECTED CHECKID NOT FOUND      07000000
INDEX6   DC    Y(TXT6-INDEX)            NO TAPE DATA SETS OPEN          07100000
INDEX7   DC    Y(TXT7-INDEX)            DUPLICATE SELECTED CHECKID      07200000
INDEX8   DC    Y(TXT8-INDEX)            DUPLICATE CKPOINT ENTRY         07300000

INDEX10  DC    Y(TXT10-INDEX)           ADDITIONAL VOLSERS NOT FOUND    07500000
INDEX11  DC    Y(TXT11-INDEX)           UNEXPECTED EOF ON CHKPT DS      07600000
INDEX12  DC    Y(TXT12-INDEX)           CURRENT VOLUME NOT FOUND        07700000
         EJECT                                                          07800000

**********************************************************************  00050002
*                                                                    *  00100002
* MODULE NAME - IDCTSDE0 - STATIC TEXT MODULE FOR DEFINE             *  00102002
*                                                                    *  00104002
* DESCRIPTIVE NAME - STATIC TEXT MODULE FOR THE FUNCTION DEFINE      *  00106002

* RELEASE 2, LEVEL 0                                                 *  00112337
*                                                                    *  00114337
* FUNCTION - CONTAINS NO EXECUTIBLE CODE, ONLY STATIC TEXT ENTRIES   *  00115137
*        FOR THE FUNCTION DEFINE.                                    *  00117837
*        THIS MODULE IS LOADED BY IDCTP05 WHEN A STATIC TEXT         *  00120537
*        REQUEST IS MADE.                                            *  00123202
*                                                                    *  00133202
* NOTES - NONE                                                       *  00135202
*                                                                    *  00135602
*    DEPENDENCIES - NONE                                             *  00161802
*    RESTRICTIONS - NONE                                             *  00171802
*    REGISTER CONVENTIONS - NA                                       *  00181802
*    PATCH AREA - NA                                                 *  00183802
*                                                                    *  00222802
* MODULE TYPE - TABLES                                               *  00231702
*                                                                    *  00240402
*        PROCESSOR - ASSEMBLER                                       *  00266602
*        MODULE SIZE - 2000 BYTES                                    *  00292837
*        ATTRIBUTES - READ ONLY                                      *  00319002
*                                                                    *  00345202

*********************************************************************   00450002
*                                                                    *  00500002
* THIS MODULE IS THE FIRST MODULE OF STATIC TEXT REQUIRED BY THE    *   00510002
* DEFINE FUNCTION SUB-ROUTINES.                                      *  00520002
*                                                                    *  00530002
*********************************************************************   00550002
*                                                                    *  00600002
IDCTSDE0 CSECT                                                          00610002
*                                                                       00620002
* THIS SECTION CONTAINS THE INDICES TO REACH AN ENTRY.               *  00630002
*                                                                       00640002
INDEX    DC  H'25'                     COUNT OF ENTRIES.       @OZ06147 00642037
INDEX1   DC  Y(TXT1-INDEX)             INCONSISTENT LISTS.              00644002
INDEX2   DC  Y(TXT2-INDEX)             INVALID RANGE LIST.              00646002
INDEX3   DC  Y(TXT3-INDEX)             VSAM DEFINE STRUCTURE MISSING.   00648002
INDEX4   DC  Y(TXT4-INDEX)             ENTYPE INCONSISTEN WITH OBJECT.  00648402
INDEX5   DC  Y(TXT5-INDEX)             PASSWORD SUPPRESSION IN MODEL.   00648802
INDEX6   DC  Y(TXT6-INDEX)             WRONG SPACE ALLOC                00648902
INDEX7   DC  Y(TXT7-INDEX)             VOLUME LIST OMITTED              00649002
INDEX8   DC  Y(TXT8-INDEX)             RECORD SIZE MISSING              00649102
INDEX9   DC  Y(TXT9-INDEX)             DATA ALLOC                       00661802
INDEX10  DC  Y(TXT10-INDEX)            INDEX ALLOC                      00671802
INDEX11  DC  Y(TXT11-INDEX)            CATALOG ALLOC                    00673802
INDEX12  DC  Y(TXT12-INDEX)            SPACE ALLOC                      00674202
INDEX13  DC  Y(TXT13-INDEX)            GENERATED NAMES                  00674302
INDEX14  DC  Y(TXT14-INDEX)            DNAME NOT SPECIFIED.             00676302
INDEX15  DC  Y(TXT15-INDEX)            KEYRANGES ARE INVALID.           00680302
INDEX16  DC  Y(TXT16-INDEX)            AVE RCDSIZE > MAX RCDSIZE.       00682302
INDEX17  DC  Y(TXT17-INDEX)            KEYS PARAMETER REQUIRED FOR KSDS 00682702
INDEX18  DC  Y(TXT18-INDEX)            AVG ¬= MAX (RRDS)       @Y30SSJH 00682837
INDEX19  DC  Y(TXT19-INDEX)            REUSE INVALID           @Y30SSJH 00682937
INDEX20  DC  Y(TXT20-INDEX)            REUSE CONFLICT          @Y30SSJH 00683037
INDEX21  DC  Y(TXT21-INDEX)            RECOVERY VOLUME         @Y30SSJH 00687237
INDEX22  DC  Y(TXT22-INDEX)            MAX RCDSIZE > 32,761    @Y30SSJH 00689237
INDEX23  DC  Y(TXT23-INDEX)            SPANNED INVALID - RRDS  @Y30SSJH 00691237
INDEX24  DC  Y(TXT24-INDEX)            GDG NAME TOO LONG       @Y30SSJH 00691337
INDEX25  DC  Y(TXT25-INDEX)            NON-ASCENDING KEYRANGE  @OZ06147 00691437
         EJECT                                                          00691637
*********************************************************************   00695837
*                                                                    *  00700002

TXT1     DC  Y(TXT1B-TXT1A)            ENTRY LENGTH.                    00950002
         DC  X'8000'                   MESSAGE FLAG.                    01000002
* SPACING CONTROL SUB-STRUCTURE.                                        01050002
TXT1A    DC  X'4000'                   SPACE SUB-STRUCTURE FLAG.        01100002
         DC  H'2'                      SPACING FACTOR.                  01150002
         DC  C'R '                     SPACING TYPE.                    01200002
* STATIC TEXT SUB-STRUCTURE.                                            01250002
         DC  X'8400'                   STATIC & EOF FLAG.               01300002
         DC  Y(STE11B-STE11A)          STATIC TEXT LENGTH.              01350002
         DC  Y(STE11A-TXT1A)           STATIC TEXT OFFSET.              01400002
         DC  H'1'                      PRINT COLUMN.                    01450002
         DC  Y(STE11B-STE11A)          PRINT FIELD LENGTH.              01500002
         DC  H'0'                      CONVERSION FLAGS.  (CHAR)        01550002
* STATIC TEXT ENTRY.                                                    01600002
STE11A   DC  C'IDC3503I  FILE SEQUENCE LIST IS INCONSISTENT WITH VOLUME*01650002
                LIST'                                                   01660002
STE11B   EQU *                                                          01700002

* /* START OF SPECIFICATIONS ****                            @Y30SSFR   00060003
*                                                                       00070003
*01*  MODULE-NAME = IDCTSDL0                                            00080003
*01*  MODULE-TYPE = MODULE                                              00090003

         TITLE '***** IDCTSDL0 - DELETE STATIC TEXT *****'              00098003
**********************************************************************  00098403
*                                                                    *  00100002
* MODULE NAME - IDCTSDL0 - STATIC TEXT MODULE FOR DELETE             *  00150002
*                                                                    *  00200002
* DESCRIPTIVE NAME - STATIC TEXT MODULE FOR THE FUNCTION DELETE      *  00250002
*                                                                    *  00300002
* COPYRIGHT - NONE                                                   *  00350002
*                                                                    *  00360002
* STATUS - RELEASE 2  LEVEL 0                                        *  00370003
* RELEASE 3 MODIFICATIONS                                      @Z40RSSA 00372004
*     ADD TXT12 AND TXT13 ENTRIES                              @Z40RSSA 00374004
*                                                                    *  00380002
* FUNCTION - CONTAINS NO EXECUTIBLE CODE, ONLY STATIC TEXT ENTRIES   *  00390002
*        FOR THE FUNCTION DELETE                                     *  00392002
*        THIS MODULE IS LOADED BY IDCTP05 WHEN A STATIC TEXT         *  00394002
*        REQUEST IS MADE.                                            *  00396002
*                                                                    *  00398002
* NOTES - NONE                                                       *  00398402
*                                                                    *  00398802
*    DEPENDENCIES - NONE                                             *  00400502
*    RESTRICTIONS - NONE                                             *  00402502
*    REGISTER CONVENTIONS - NA                                       *  00402902
*    PATCH AREA - NA                                                 *  00405002
*                                                                    *  00411902
* MODULE TYPE - TABLES                                               *  00414002
*                                                                    *  00416102
*    PROCESSOR - ASSEMBLER                                           *  00418202
*    MODULE SIZE - 76                                                *  00420302
*    ATTRIBUTES - READ-ONLY                                          *  00422402
*                                                                    *  00424502
*  ENTRY POINT - NA                                                  *  00424902
*                                                                    *  00426502
*  EXIT NORMAL - NA                                                  *  00428502
*                                                                    *  00428902
*  EXIT ERROR - NA                                                   *  00429002
*                                                                    *  00429302
*  EXTERNAL REFERENCES - NA                                          *  00429402
*                                                                    *  00429702
*  TABLES - NA                                                       *  00429802
*                                                                    *  00430102
*  MACROS - NA                                                       *  00430202
*                                                                    *  00430602
*                                                                    *  00438302
**********************************************************************  00442202
*                                                                       00446102
*********************************************************************** 00450002
*                                                                       00500002
* THIS MODULE IS THE FIRST MODULE OF STATIC TEXT REQUIRED BY THE        00550002
* DELETE MODULES.                                                       00600002
*                                                                       00700002
*********************************************************************** 00750002
*                                                                       00800002
*                                                                       00850002
IDCTSDL0 CSECT                                                          00900002
*                                                                       00950002
* THIS SECTION CONTAINS THE INDICES.                                    01000002
*                                                                       01050002
INDEX    DC  H'13'                     COUNT OF ENTRIES.       @Z40RSSA 01100004
INDEX1   DC  Y(TXT1-INDEX)             ENTRY DELETED                    01150002
INDEX2   DC  Y(TXT2-INDEX)             INVALID ENTRY TYPE               01200002
INDEX3   DC  Y(TXT3-INDEX)             ERASE OPTION NOT ALLOWED         01250002
INDEX4   DC  Y(TXT4-INDEX)             FILE PARM REQUIRED               01300002
INDEX5   DC  Y(TXT5-INDEX)             NULL ENTRY                       01350002
INDEX6   DC  H'-1'                     NULL ENTRY                       01360002
INDEX7   DC  Y(TXT7-INDEX)             SCRATCH OPTION NOT ALLOWED       01370002

./  ADD  SSI=50780173,NAME=IDCTSEX0
         TITLE '***** IDCTSEX0 - EXECUTIVE STATIC TEXT *****'           00010000
**********************************************************************  00050000
*                                                                    *  00100000
* MODULE NAME - IDCTSEX0 - STATIC TEXT MODULE FOR THE EXECUTIVE      *  00150000
*                                                                    *  00200000
* DESCRIPTIVE NAME - STATIC TEXT MODULE FOR THE EXUTIVE              *  00250000
*                                                                    *  00300000
* COPYRIGHT - NONE                                                   *  00350000
*                                                                    *  00360000
* STATUS - RELEASE 0  LEVEL 0                                        *  00370000
*                                                                    *  00380000
* FUNCTION - CONTAINS NO EXECUTABLE CODE, ONLY STATIC TEXT ENTRIES   *  00390000
*        FOR THE EXECUTIVE                                           *  00392000
*        THIS MODULE IS LOADED BY IDCTP05 WHEN A STATIC TEXT         *  00394000
*        REQUEST IS MADE.                                            *  00396000
*                                                                    *  00398000
* NOTES - NONE                                                       *  00398400
*                                                                    *  00398800
*    DEPENDENCIES - NONE                                             *  00401000
*    RESTRICTIONS - NONE                                             *  00403000
*    REGISTER CONVENTIONS - NA                                       *  00403100
*    PATCH AREA - NA                                                 *  00403200
*                                                                    *  00403400
* MODULE TYPE - TABLES                                               *  00405600
*                                                                    *  00407800
*    PROCESSOR - ASSEMBLER                                           *  00410000
*    MODULE SIZE - 1312                                              *  00412200
*    ATTRIBUTES - READ-ONLY                                          *  00414400
*                                                                    *  00416600
*  ENTRY POINT - NA                                                  *  00417000
*                                                                    *  00418600
*  EXIT NORMAL - NA                                                  *  00419000
*                                                                    *  00420600
*  EXIT ERROR - NA                                                   *  00421000
*                                                                    *  00422600
*  EXTERNAL REFERENCES - NA                                          *  00423000
*                                                                    *  00424600
*  TABLES - NA                                                       *  00424700
*                                                                    *  00425000
*  MACROS - NA                                                       *  00425100
*                                                                    *  00425800
* CHANGE ACTIVITY - NONE                                             *  00426600
*                                                                    *  00428600
**********************************************************************  00430600
*                                                                       00433300
**********************************************************************  00450000
*                                                                    *  00500000
* THIS MODULE IS THE FIRST MODULE OF STATIC TEXT REQUIRED BY THE     *  02500000
* EXECUTIVE MODULES.                                                 *  02550000
*                                                                    *  02600000
* THIS IS CURRENTLY THE ONLY MODULE.                                 *  02650000
*                                                                    *  02700000
**********************************************************************  02750000
*                                                                       02800000
*                                                                       02850000
IDCTSEX0  CSECT                                                         02900000
*                                                                    *  02950000
* THIS SECTION CONTAINS THE INDICES TO REACH AN ENTRY.               *  03000000
*                                                                    *  03050000
INDEX     DC  H'12'                     COUNT OF ENTRIES.               03100000
INDEX1    DC  Y(TXT1-INDEX)             EXEC UESTS ENTRY.               03150000
INDEX2    DC  Y(TXT2-INDEX)             DUMP FORMAT LIST.               03160000
INDEX3    DC  Y(TXT3-INDEX)             PROCESSING COMPLETED.           03170000
INDEX4    DC  Y(TXT4-INDEX)             FULL DUMP FAILURE.              03180000
INDEX5    DC  Y(TXT5-INDEX)             DUMP ELEMENT INVALID.           03190000
INDEX6    DC  Y(TXT6-INDEX)             ARRAY HEADER INVALID.           03192000
INDEX7    DC  Y(TXT7-INDEX)             DUMP INVOKED AT.                03194000
INDEX8    DC  Y(TXT8-INDEX)             SNAP DUMP PRODUCED AT.          03196000

INDEX10   DC  Y(TXT10-INDEX)            INTRA MODULE TRACE.             03198400
INDEX11   DC  H'-1'                     NULL ENTRY                      03198800
INDEX12   DC  Y(TXT12-INDEX)            INVALID MARGINS VALUES.         03199200
          EJECT                                                         03200000
********************************************************************    03250000
*                                                                    *  03300000
* THIS SECTION CONTAINS THE ENTRIES.                                 *  03350000
*                                                                    *  03400000
********************************************************************    03450000
*                                                                       03500000

         TITLE  '***** IDCTSIO0 - IO ADAPTOR STATIC TEXT *****'         00010002
**********************************************************************  00050002
*                                                                    *  00100002
* MODULE NAME - IDCTSIO0 - STATIC TEXT MODULE FOR IO ADAPTER         *  00150002
*               AND SYS ADAPTER                                      *  00160002
*                                                                    *  00200002
* DESCRIPTIVE NAME - STATIC TEXT MODULE FOR THE IO ADAPTER           *  00250002
*                    AND SYS ADAPTER                                 *  00260002
*                                                                    *  00300002
* COPYRIGHT - NONE                                                   *  00350002
*                                                                    *  00360002
* STATUS - RELEASE 0  LEVEL 0                                        *  00370002
*                                                                    *  00380002
* FUNCTION - CONTAINS NO EXECUTABLE CODE, ONLY STATIC TEXT ENTRIES   *  00390002
*        FOR THE IO ADAPTER AND SYS ADAPTER                          *  00392002
*        THIS MODULE IS LOADED BY IDCTP05 WHEN A STATIC TEXT         *  00394002
*        REQUEST IS MADE.                                            *  00396002
*                                                                    *  00398002
* NOTES - NONE                                                       *  00398402
*                                                                    *  00398502
*    DEPENDENCIES - NONE                                             *  00398602
*    RESTRICTIONS - NONE                                             *  00398702
*    REGISTER CONVENTIONS - NA                                       *  00400902
*    PATCH AREA - NA                                                 *  00402902
*                                                                    *  00403402
* MODULE TYPE - TABLES                                               *  00405602
*                                                                    *  00407802
*    PROCESSOR - ASSEMBLER                                           *  00410002
*    MODULE SIZE - 2600                                              *  00412203
*    ATTRIBUTES - READ-ONLY                                          *  00414402
*                                                                    *  00416402
*  ENTRY POINT - NA                                                  *  00416502
*                                                                    *  00416602

*                                                                    *  00417302
*  EXIT ERROR - NA                                                   *  00418002
*                                                                    *  00418402

*                                                                    *  00418802
*  TABLES - NA                                                       *  00418902

*                                                                       00433302
**********************************************************************  00450000
*                                                                    *  00560000
* THIS MODULE IS THE FIRST MODULE OF STATIC TEXT REQUIRED BY THE     *  00570000
* I/O SERVICE ROUTINE.                                               *  00600000
*                                                                    *  00810000
**********************************************************************  00820000
*                                                                       00850000
IDCTSIO0  CSECT                                                         00900002
*                                                                       00950000
* THIS SECTION CONTAINS THE INDICES TO REACH AN ENTRY.               *  01000000
*                                                                       01050000
INDEX     DC  AL2((LASTINDX-INDEX1)/2)  COUNT OF ENTRIES       @ZM41551 01100037
INDEX1    DC  Y(TXT1-INDEX)             OPEN ERROR                      01150000
INDEX2    DC  Y(TXT2-INDEX)             CLOSE ERROR                     01200000
INDEX3    DC  Y(TXT3-INDEX)             ACTION ERROR                    01250000
INDEX4    DC  Y(TXT4-INDEX)             OPEN ERROR (NON-AM0 UPDATE)     01300000
INDEX5    DC  Y(TXT5-INDEX)             DD CARD MISSING.                01350000
INDEX6    DC  Y(TXT6-INDEX)             OPEN ERROR (ISAM OUTPUT)        01400000
INDEX7    DC  Y(TXT7-INDEX)             OPEN ERROR (ISAM CHRON)         01450000
INDEX8    DC  Y(TXT8-INDEX)             OPEN ERROR (ISAM KEY)           01500000
INDEX9    DC  Y(TXT9-INDEX)             VSAM CONDITION CODE.            01550002
INDEX10   DC  Y(TXT10-INDEX)            DUPLICATE RECORD MSG.           01600002
INDEX11   DC  Y(TXT11-INDEX)            VSAM SYNAD                      01650002
INDEX12   DC  Y(TXT12-INDEX)            SEQUENTIAL RECORD TOO LONG      01700002
INDEX13   DC  Y(TXT13-INDEX)            KEY TOO LONG.                   01750000
INDEX14   DC  Y(TXT14-INDEX)            ILLEGAL POSITIONING.            01800000
INDEX15   DC  Y(TXT15-INDEX)            OPEN FAILURE.                   01810000
INDEX16   DC  Y(TXT16-INDEX)            NON-VSAM SYNAD MESSAGE.         01820002
INDEX17   DC  Y(TXT17-INDEX)            RECORD OUT OF SEQUENCE          01830002
INDEX18   DC  Y(TXT18-INDEX)            ENTRY DOESN'T EXIST             01840002
INDEX19   DC  Y(TXT19-INDEX)            DS NOT USER CATALOG             01842002
INDEX20   DC  Y(TXT20-INDEX)            PERM I/O ERROR                  01844002
INDEX21   DC  Y(TXT21-INDEX)            INVALID OPNAGL                  01846037
INDEX22   DC  Y(TXT22-INDEX)            ENTRY ALREADY EXISTS            01848002
INDEX23   DC  H'-1'                                            @Y30SSFY 01848437
INDEX24   DC  Y(TXT24-INDEX)            ABEND EXIT TAKEN.               01848802
INDEX25   DC  Y(TXT25-INDEX)            ORG NOT VSAM                    01849202
INDEX26   DC  Y(TXT26-INDEX)            INSUFFICIENT STORAGE  @YL026UE  01849602
INDEX27   DC  Y(TXT27-INDEX)            ERROR ALLOCATING DSNAME         01849702
INDEX28   DC  Y(TXT28-INDEX)            ERROR UNALLOCATING     @YL026UE 01849802
INDEX29   DC  Y(TXT29-INDEX)            DYNAMIC ALLOCATION RETURN CODE  01849902
INDEX30   DC  Y(TXT30-INDEX)            ERROR ALLOCATING VOLUME(S)      01866602
INDEX31   DC  Y(TXT31-INDEX)            ERROR IN DYNAMIC CONCATENATION  01876602
INDEX32   DC  Y(TXT32-INDEX)            TARGET CAT NOT EMPTY            01878602
INDEX33   DC  Y(TXT33-INDEX)            INVALID CI NUMBER               01880602

*                                                                    *  00100002
* MODULE NAME - IDCTSLC0 - STATIC TEXT MODULE FOR LIST CATALOG       *  00150002
*                                                                    *  00200002
* DESCRIPTIVE NAME - STATIC TEXT MODULE FOR THE FUNCTION LIST        *  00250002
*          CATALOG                                                   *  00300002
*                                                                    *  00310002
* COPYRIGHT - NONE                                                   *  00350002
*                                                                    *  00360002
* STATUS - RELEASE 3  LEVEL 0                                        *  00370004
*                                                                    *  00380002
* FUNCTION - CONTAINS NO EXECUTABLE CODE, ONLY STATIC TEXT ENTRIES   *  00390002
*        FOR THE FUNCTION LIST CATALOG                               *  00392002
*        THIS MODULE IS LOADED BY IDCTP05 WHEN A STATIC TEXT         *  00394002
*        REQUEST IS MADE.                                            *  00396002
*                                                                    *  00398002
* NOTES - NONE                                                       *  00398402
*                                                                    *  00398502

*    REGISTER CONVENTIONS - NA                                       *  00400902

*                                                                    *  00403402
* MODULE TYPE - TABLES                                               *  00405602
*                                                                    *  00407802
*    PROCESSOR - ASSEMBLER                                           *  00410002
*    MODULE SIZE - 8830                                      @Z40WSMK*  00412204
*    ATTRIBUTES - READ-ONLY                                          *  00414402
*                                                                    *  00416402
*  ENTRY POINT - NA                                                  *  00416502

*  EXIT NORMAL - NA                                                  *  00417002

         TITLE '***** IDCTSLC1 - LIST CATALOG STATIC TEXT *****'        00050002
**********************************************************************  00100002
*                                                                    *  00150002
* MODULE NAME - IDCTSLC1 - STATIC TEXT MODULE FOR LIST CATALOG       *  00200002
*                                      MESSAGES.                     *  00210002
*                                                                    *  00250002
* DESCRIPTIVE NAME - STATIC TEXT MODULE FOR THE FUNCTION LIST        *  00300002
*          CATALOG MESSAGES                                          *  00350002
*                                                                    *  00400002
* COPYRIGHT - NONE                                                   *  00450002
*                                                                    *  00500002
* STATUS - RELEASE 2  LEVEL 0                                        *  00550003
*                                                                    *  00600002
* FUNCTION - CONTAINS NO EXECUTABLE CODE, ONLY STATIC TEXT ENTRIES   *  00650002
*        FOR THE FUNCTION LIST CATALOG                               *  00700002
*        THIS MODULE IS LOADED BY IDCTP05 WHEN A STATIC TEXT         *  00750002
*        REQUEST IS MADE.                                            *  00800002
*                                                                    *  00850002
* NOTES - NONE                                                       *  00900002
*                                                                    *  00950002
*    DEPENDENCIES - NONE                                             *  01000002
*    RESTRICTIONS - NONE                                             *  01050002
*    REGISTER CONVENTIONS - NA                                       *  01100002
*    PATCH AREA - NA                                                 *  01150002
*                                                                    *  01200002
* MODULE TYPE - TABLES                                               *  01250002
*                                                                    *  01300002
*    PROCESSOR - ASSEMBLER                                           *  01350002
*    MODULE SIZE - 1480                                              *  01400003
*    ATTRIBUTES - READ-ONLY                                          *  01450002
*                                                                    *  01500002
*  ENTRY POINT - NA                                                  *  01550002
*                                                                    *  01600002
*  EXIT NORMAL - NA                                                  *  01650002
*                                                                    *  01700002
*  EXIT ERROR - NA                                                   *  01750002
*                                                                    *  01800002
*  EXTERNAL REFERENCES - NA                                          *  01850002
*                                                                    *  01900002
*  TABLES - NA                                                       *  01950002
*                                                                    *  02000002
*  MACROS - NA                                                       *  02050002
*                                                                    *  02100002
**********************************************************************  02250002
*                                                                       02300002
**********************************************************************  02350002
*                                                                    *  02400002
* THIS MODULE IS THE SECOND MODULE OF STATIC TEXT REQUIRED BY THE    *  02450002
* LIST CATALOG FUNCTIONAL SERVICE ROUTINE.                           *  02500002
*                                                                    *  02550002
**********************************************************************  02600002
*                                                                    *  02650002
IDCTSLC1 CSECT                                                          02700002
*                                                                       02750002
**********************************************************************  02800002
*                                                                    *  02850002
* THIS SECTION CONTAINS THE INDICES TO REACH AN ENTRY.                  02900002
*                                                                       02950002
INDEX    DC  H'12'                     COUNT OF ENTRIES.       @Y30LSMK 03000003
INDEX1   DC  H'-1'                     UNUSED                  @Y30SSMK 03050003
INDEX2   DC  Y(TXT2-INDEX)             LOW MAIN CORE                    03100002
INDEX3   DC  Y(TXT3-INDEX)             VOL SER TOO LONG                 03150002
INDEX4   DC  Y(TXT4-INDEX)             CONFLICTING FIELDS               03200002
INDEX5   DC  Y(TXT5-INDEX)             UNKNOWN TYPE                     03250002
INDEX6   DC  Y(TXT6-INDEX)             NOT REQUESTED TYPE               03300002
INDEX7   DC  Y(TXT7-INDEX)             ENTRIES PROCESSED MESSAGE        03350002
INDEX8   DC  Y(TXT8-INDEX)             COULD NOT BE LISTED.             03400002
INDEX9   DC  Y(TXT9-INDEX)             INVALID ASSOCIATIONS.            03450002
INDEX10  DC  Y(TXT10-INDEX)            SUPPRESSED ENTRY MSG.            03500002
INDEX11  DC  Y(TXT11-INDEX)            SUPPRESSED ENTRY MSG.   @YL026UE 03550002
INDEX12  DC  Y(TXT12-INDEX)            EXPIR DATE WARNING      @Y30LSMK 03600003
         EJECT                                                          03700002
**********************************************************************  03750002
*                                                                    *  03800002
* THIS SECTION CONTAINS THE ENTRIES.                                 *  03850002
*                                                                    *  03900002
**********************************************************************  03950002

         DC  Y(STE101B-STE101A)        TEXT LENGTH.                     20009502
         DC  Y(STE101A-TXT10A)         TEXT OFFSET.                     20019502
         DC  H'10'                     PRINT COLUMN.                    20029502
         DC  Y(STE101B-STE101A)        PRINT FIELD LENGTH.              20039502
         DC  H'0'                      CONVERSION FLAGS.  (CHAR)        20041502
* BLOCK DATA SUB-STRUCTURE.                                             20043502
         DC  X'9000'                   EOF & BLOCK DATA FLAG.           20045502
         DC  H'4'                      MAXIMUM LENGTH.                  20047502
         DC  H'0'                      OFFSET                           20047902
         DC  H'57'                     PRINT COLUMN.                    20048302
         DC  H'10'                     MAXIMUM LENGTH.                  20048702
         DC  X'1060'                   CONVERSION FLAGS.  (BD,AL,SS)    20049102
* STATIC TEXT ENTRIES.                                                  20139402
STE101A  DC  C'THE NUMBER OF PROTECTED ENTRIES SUPPRESSED WAS '         20145402
STE101B  EQU *                                                          20147402
TXT10B   EQU *                                                          20147802
         EJECT                                                 @YL026UE 20148202
*                                                              @YL026UE 20148602
* INVALID * FIRST OR LAST CHARACTER.                           @YL026UE 20149002
*                                                              @YL026UE 20149202
TXT11    DC  Y(TXT11B-TXT11A)          ENTRY LENGTH.           @YL026UE 20149302
         DC  X'8000'                   MESSAGE FLAG.           @YL026UE 20182702
* SPACING CONTROL SUB-STRUCTURE.                               @YL026UE 20199302
TXT11A   DC  X'4000'                   SPACE CONTROL FLAG.     @YL026UE 20209302
         DC  H'2'                      SPACING FACTOR.         @YL026UE 20219302
         DC  C'R '                     SPACING TYPE.           @YL026UE 20229302
* STATIC TEXT SUB-STRUCTURE.                                   @YL026UE 20239302
         DC  X'0400'                   STATIC TEXT FLAG.       @YL026UE 20241302
         DC  Y(STE111B-STE111A)        TEXT LENGTH.            @YL026UE 20243302
         DC  Y(STE111A-TXT11A)         TEXT OFFSET.            @YL026UE 20245302
         DC  H'1'                      PRINT COLUMN.           @YL026UE 20247302
         DC  Y(STE111B-STE111A)        PRINT FIELD LENGTH.     @YL026UE 20247702
         DC  H'0'                      CONVERSION FLAGS (CHAR) @YL026UE 20248802
* BLOCK DATA SUB-STRUCTURE.                                    @YL026UE 20248902
         DC  X'1000'                   BLOCK DATA FLAG.        @YL026UE 20249002
         DC  H'44'                     MAXIMUM LENGTH.         @YL026UE 20249102
         DC  H'0'                      OFFSET                  @YL026UE 20249202
         DC  H'10'                     PRINT COLUMN.           @YL026UE 20249302
         DC  H'44'                     MAXIMUM LENGTH.         @YL026UE 20299202
         DC  H'0'                      CONVERSION FLAGS (CHAR) @YL026UE 20309202
* STATIC TEXT SUB-STRUCTURE.                                   @YL026UE 20319202

         DC  X'0010'                   CNVRSN FLAGS (CHAR,BS)  @YL026UE 20347202
* STATIC TEXT ENTRIES.                                         @YL026UE 20347602
STE111A  DC  C'IDC3568I'                                       @YL026UE 20348002

./  ADD  SSI=71240575,NAME=IDCTSLR0
     TITLE  '***** IDCTSLR0 - LISTCRA STATIC TEXT *****'                00050007
* /* START OF SPECIFICATIONS ****                                       00100007
*                                                                       00150007
*01*  MODULE-NAME = IDCTSLR0                                            00200007
*01*  MODULE-TYPE = MODULE                                              00250007
*02*    PROCESSOR = ASSEMBLER                                           00300007
*                                                                       00350007
**** END OF SPECIFICATIONS ****/                                        00400007
**********************************************************************  00450007
*                                                                    *  00500007
* MODULE NAME - IDCTSLR0 - STATIC TEXT MODULE FOR LISTCRA            *  00550007
*                                                                    *  00600007
* DESCRIPTIVE NAME - TEXT PROCESSOR CONTROL FOR LISTCRA LISTINGS     *  00650007
*                                                                    *  00700007
* COPYRIGHT - NONE                                                   *  00750007
*                                                                    *  00800007
* STATUS - RELEASE 2  LEVEL 0                                        *  00850007
*                                                                    *  00900007
* FUNCTION - CONTAINS NO EXECUTABLE CODE, ONLY STATIC TEXT ENTRIES   *  00950007
*        FOR THE FUNCTION EXPORT                                     *  01000007
*        THIS MODULE IS LOADED BY IDCTP05 WHEN A STATIC TEXT         *  01050007
*        REQUEST IS MADE.                                            *  01100007
*        ALL OF THE FORMAT CONTROL ENTRIES ARE IN THIS MODULE        *  01150007
*        THE MESSAGES MODULE IS IDCTSLR1                             *  01200007
*                                                                    *  01250007
* NOTES - NONE                                                       *  01300007
*                                                                    *  01350007
*    DEPENDENCIES - NONE                                             *  01400007
*    RESTRICTIONS - NONE                                             *  01450007
*    REGISTER CONVENTIONS - NA                                       *  01500007
*    PATCH AREA - NA                                                 *  01550007
*                                                                    *  01600007
* MODULE TYPE - TABLES                                               *  01650007
*                                                                    *  01700007
*    PROCESSOR - ASSEMBLER                                           *  01750007
*    MODULE SIZE - 1200 BYTES                                        *  01800007
*                                                                    *  01850007
*  ENTRY POINT - NA                                                  *  01900007
*                                                                    *  01950007
*  EXIT NORMAL - NA                                                  *  02000007
*                                                                    *  02050007
*  EXIT ERROR - NA                                                   *  02100007
*                                                                    *  02150007
*  EXTERNAL REFERENCES - NA                                          *  02200007
*                                                                    *  02250007
*  TABLES - NA                                                       *  02300007
*                                                                    *  02350007
*  MACROS - NA                                                       *  02400007
*                                                                    *  02450007
*  CHANGE ACTIVITY SUMMARY -                                         *  02460000
*    D008600-008700,D054000,D056600-056984                   @OZ12892*  02470000
*                                                                    *  02500007
**********************************************************************  02550007
*                                                                       02600007
**********************************************************************  02650007
*                                                                    *  02700007
* THIS MODULE IS THE FIRST MODULE OF STATIC TEXT REQUIRED BY THE     *  02750007
*  LISTCRA FUNCTIONAL SUPPORT ROUTINES.                              *  02800007
*                                                                    *  02850007
**********************************************************************  02900007
*                                                                       02950007
IDCTSLR0 CSECT                                                          03000007
*                                                                       03050007
* THIS SECTIONS CONTAINS THE INDICES TO REACH AN ENTRY.                 03100007
*                                                                       03150007
INDEX    DC  H'13'                     COUNT OF ENTRIES                 03200007
INDEX1   DC  Y(TXT1-INDEX)             OBJECT HEADER                    03250007
INDEX2   DC  Y(TXT2-INDEX)             VOLUME HEADER                    03300007
INDEX3   DC  Y(TXT3-INDEX)             VOLSER AND HI KEY                03350007
INDEX4   DC  Y(TXT4-INDEX)             TIMESTAMP HEADER                 03400007
INDEX5   DC  Y(TXT5-INDEX)             TIMESTAMPS                       03450007
INDEX6   DC  Y(TXT6-INDEX)             ASOC AIX NAMES                   03500007
INDEX7   DC  Y(TXT7-INDEX)             MISCOMPARES                      03550007
INDEX8   DC  Y(TXT8-INDEX)             DUMP FIRST LINE                  03600007
INDEX9   DC  Y(TXT9-INDEX)             DUMP FOLLOWING LINES             03650007
INDEX10  DC  Y(TXT10-INDEX)            DUMP CATALOG RECORD              03700007
INDEX11  DC  Y(TXT11-INDEX)            MISCOMPARES                      03750007
INDEX12  DC  Y(TXT12-INDEX)            NUMBER OF ENTRIES HEADER         03800007
INDEX13  DC  Y(TXT13-INDEX)            NUMBER OF ENTRIES                03850007
         EJECT                                                          03900007
**********************************************************************  03950007
*                                                                    *  04000007
* THIS SECTION CONTAINS THE ENTRIES.                                 *  04050007
*                                                                    *  04100007
**********************************************************************  04150007
*                                                                       04200007
* OBJECT HEADER                                                         04250007
*                                                                       04300007
TXT1     DC  Y(TXT1B-TXT1A)            ENTRY LENGTH.                    04350007
         DC  X'0000'                   MESSAGE FLAG.                    04400007
* DOUBLE SPACE SUB-STRUCTURE.                                           04450007
TXT1A    DC  X'4000'                   SPACE SUB-STRUCTURE FLAG.        04500007
         DC  H'2'                      SPACING FACTOR                   04550007
         DC  C'R '                     SPACING TYPE.                    04600007
* INSERT DATA SUB-STRUCTURE.                                            04650007
         DC  X'2000'                   INSERT DATA FLAG.                04700007
         DC  H'1'                      REFERENCE NUMBER                 04750007
         DC  H'0'                      UNUSED                           04800007
         DC  H'1'                      PRINT COLUMN.                    04850007
         DC  H'4'                      PRINT FIELD LENGTH.              04900007
         DC  X'0000'                   CONVERSION FLAG.  (CHAR)         04950007
* STATIC TEXT SUB-STRUCTURE.                                            05000007
         DC  X'0400'                   STATIC FLAGS.                    05050007
         DC  Y(STE11B-STE11A)          STATIC TEXT LENGTH.              05100007
         DC  Y(STE11A-TXT1A)           STATIC TEXT OFFSET.              05150007
         DC  H'5'                      PRINT COLUMN OFFSET.             05200007
         DC  Y(STE11B-STE11A)          PRINT FIELD LENGTH.              05250007
         DC  X'0000'                   CONVERSION FLAG.  (CHAR)         05300007
* INSERT DATA SUB-STRUCTURE.                                            05350007
         DC  X'A000'                   INSERT DATA AND EOF FLAG.        05400007
         DC  H'2'                      REFERENCE NUMBER                 05450007
         DC  H'0'                      UNUSED                           05500007
         DC  H'8'                      PRINT COLUMN.                    05550007
         DC  H'44'                     PRINT FIELD LENGTH.              05600007
         DC  X'0000'                   CONVERSION FLAGS.  (CHAR)        05650007
* STATIC TEXT ENTRY.                                                    05700007
STE11A   DC  C' - '                                                     05750007
STE11B   EQU *                                                          05800007

         EJECT                                                          05900007

./  ADD  SSI=43200005,NAME=IDCTSLR1
     TITLE  '***** IDCTSLR1 - LISTCRA STATIC TEXT *****'                00050003
* /* START OF SPECIFICATIONS ****                                       00100003
*                                                                       00150003
*01*  MODULE-NAME = IDCTSLR1                                            00200003
*01*  MODULE-TYPE = MODULE                                              00250003
*02*    PROCESSOR = ASSEMBLER                                           00300003
*                                                                       00350003
**** END OF SPECIFICATIONS ****/                                        00400003
**********************************************************************  00450003
*                                                                    *  00500003
* MODULE NAME - IDCTSLR1 - STATIC TEXT MODULE FOR LISTCRA            *  00550003
*                                                                    *  00600003
* DESCRIPTIVE NAME - SECOND STATIC TEXT MODULE FOR LISTCRA           *  00650003
*                                                                    *  00700003
* COPYRIGHT - NONE                                                   *  00750003
*                                                                    *  00800003
* STATUS - RELEASE 2  LEVEL 0                                        *  00850003
*                                                                    *  00900003
* FUNCTION - CONTAINS NO EXECUTABLE CODE, ONLY STATIC TEXT ENTRIES   *  00950003
*        FOR THE FUNCTION EXPORT                                     *  01000003
*        THIS MODULE IS LOADED BY IDCTP05 WHEN A STATIC TEXT         *  01050003
*        REQUEST IS MADE.                                            *  01100003
*                                                                    *  01150003
* NOTES - NONE                                                       *  01200003
*                                                                    *  01250003

**********************************************************************  02550003

IDCTSLR1 CSECT                                                          02900003
*                                                                       02950003
* THIS SECTIONS CONTAINS THE INDICES TO REACH AN ENTRY.                 03000003
*                                                                       03050003
INDEX    DC  H'16'                     COUNT OF ENTRIES                 03100003
INDEX1   DC  Y(TXT1-INDEX)             VSAM ERROR READING CRA-CI        03150003
INDEX2   DC  Y(TXT2-INDEX)             VSAM ERROR READING CATALOG - CI  03200003
INDEX3   DC  Y(TXT3-INDEX)             CRA OWNED BY CATALOG             03250003
INDEX4   DC  Y(TXT4-INDEX)             COMPARE OPTION IGNORED           03300003
INDEX5   DC  Y(TXT5-INDEX)             NOT ALPHABETIC LISTING           03350003
INDEX6   DC  Y(TXT6-INDEX)             VERIFY FAILURE FOR CRA           03400003
INDEX7   DC  Y(TXT7-INDEX)             VERIFY FAILURE FOR CATALOG       03450003
INDEX8   DC  Y(TXT8-INDEX)             NUMBER OF MISCOMPARES IN CRA     03500003
INDEX9   DC  Y(TXT9-INDEX)             FIELD MGMT ERROR IGNORED         03550003
INDEX10  DC  Y(TXT10-INDEX)            FIELD MGMT ERROR                 03600003
INDEX11  DC  Y(TXT11-INDEX)            I/O ERROR READING F4DSCB         03650003
INDEX12  DC  Y(TXT12-INDEX)            IGNORED ERROR FOR ALTERNATE OUT  03700003
INDEX13  DC  Y(TXT13-INDEX)            ERROR READING CATLOG CTL RCD     03750003
INDEX14  DC  Y(TXT14-INDEX)            ERROR READING CATLOG CTL RCD     03800003
INDEX15  DC  Y(TXT15-INDEX)            ERROR TRANSLATING CAT - CRA CI   03850003
INDEX16  DC  Y(TXT16-INDEX)            NUMBER OF ENTRIES IN CRA         03900003
         EJECT                                                          03950003
**********************************************************************  04000003
*                                                                    *  04050003
* THIS SECTION CONTAINS THE ENTRIES.                                 *  04100003
*                                                                    *  04150003

* IGNORED VSAM ERROR READING CRA                                        04300003
*                                                                       04350003
TXT1     DC  Y(TXT1B-TXT1A)            ENTRY LENGTH.                    04400003
         DC  X'8000'                   MESSAGE FLAG.                    04450003
* DOUBLE SPACE SUB-STRUCTURE.                                           04500003
TXT1A   DC  X'4000'                   SPACE SUB-STRUCTURE FLAG.         04550003
         DC  H'1'                      SPACING FACTOR                   04600003
         DC  C'R '                     SPACING TYPE.                    04650003
* STATIC TEXT SUB-STRUCTURE.                                            04700003
         DC  X'0400'                   STATIC TEXT FLAG.                04750003
         DC  Y(STE11B-STE11A)          STATIC TEXT LENGTH.              04800003
         DC  Y(STE11A-TXT1A)           STATIC TEXT OFFSET.              04850003
         DC  H'1'                      PRINT COLUMN.                    04900003
         DC  Y(STE11B-STE11A)          PRINT FIELD LENGTH.              04950003
         DC  H'0'                      CONVERSION FLAGS. (CHAR)         05000003
* INSERT TEXT SUB-STRUCTURE.                                            05050003
         DC  X'A000'                   INSERT TEXT AND EOF FLAG.        05100003
         DC  H'1'                      REFERENCE NUMBER                 05150003
         DC  H'0'                      UNUSED                           05200003
         DC  H'49'                     PRINT COLUMN.                    05250003
         DC  H'0'                      DEFAULT                          05300003
         DC  X'4000'                   CONVERSION FLAGS. (BH)           05350003
* STATIC TEXT ENTRY.                                                    05400003
STE11A   DC  C'IDC1870I ** IGNORED VSAM ERROR READING CRA - CI '        05450003
STE11B   EQU *                                                          05500003
TXT1B    EQU *                                                          05550003
         EJECT                                                          05600003

* NUMBER OF CRA ENTRIES THAT MISCOMPARED                                22400003
*                                                                       22450003
TXT16    DC  Y(TXT16B-TXT16A)          ENTRY LENGTH.                    22500003
         DC  X'8000'                   MESSAGE FLAG.                    22550003
* DOUBLE SPACE SUB-STRUCTURE.                                           22600003
TXT16A   DC  X'4000'                   SPACE SUB-STRUCTURE FLAG.        22650003
         DC  H'2'                      SPACING FACTOR                   22700003
         DC  C'R '                     SPACING TYPE.                    22750003
* STATIC TEXT SUB-STRUCTURE.                                            22800003
         DC  X'0400'                   STATIC TEXT FLAG.                22850003
         DC  Y(STE161B-STE161A)        STATIC TEXT LENGTH.              22900003
         DC  Y(STE161A-TXT16A)         STATIC TEXT OFFSET.              22950003
         DC  H'1'                      PRINT COLUMN.                    23000003
         DC  Y(STE161B-STE161A)        PRINT FIELD LENGTH.              23050003
         DC  H'0'                      CONVERSION FLAGS. (CHAR)         23100003
* INSERT TEXT SUB-STRUCTURE.                                            23150003
         DC  X'A000'                   INSERT TEXT AND EOF FLAG.        23200003
         DC  H'1'                      REFERENCE NUMBER                 23250003
         DC  H'0'                      UNUSED                           23300003

         DC  C'IN THIS CRA - '                                          23600003

TXT16B   EQU *                                                          23700003

*                                                                    *  00100002

*                                                                    *  00380002
* FUNCTION - CONTAINS NO EXECUTABLE CODE, ONLY STATIC TEXT ENTRIES   *  00390002
*        FOR THE FUNCTION IMPORT                                     *  00392002
*        THIS MODULE IS LOADED BY IDCTP05 WHEN A STATIC TEXT         *  00394002
*        REQUEST IS MADE.                                            *  00396002
*                                                                    *  00398002
* NOTES - NONE                                                       *  00398402
*                                                                    *  00398802

TXT28    DC  Y(TXT28B-TXT28A)          ENTRY LENGTH.           @OZ17068 40339437
         DC  X'8000'                   MESSAGE FLAG.           @OZ17068 42339437
* DOUBLE SPACE SUB-STRUCTURE.                                  @OZ17068 44339437
TXT28A   DC  X'4000'                   SPACING FLAG.           @OZ17068 46339437
         DC  H'2'                      SPACING FACTOR.         @OZ17068 48339437
         DC  C'R '                     SPACING TYPE.           @OZ17068 50339437
* STATIC TEXT SUB-STRUCTURE.                                   @OZ17068 52339437
         DC  X'8400'                   STATIC FLAG.            @OZ17068 54339437
         DC  Y(STE281B-STE281A)        ENTRY LENGTH.           @OZ17068 56339437
         DC  Y(STE281A-TXT28A)         TEXT OFFSET.            @OZ17068 58339437
         DC  H'1'                      PRINT COLUMN.           @OZ17068 60339437
         DC  Y(STE281B-STE281A)        PRINT FIELD LENGTH.     @OZ17068 62339437
         DC  H'0'                      CONVERSION FLAGS.       @OZ17068 64339437
* STATIC TEXT ENTRIES.                                         @OZ17068 66339437
STE281A  DC  C'IDC3628I DUMMY NAME REMAINS IN CATALOG'         @OZ17068 68339437
STE281B  EQU *                                                 @OZ17068 70339437
TXT28B   EQU *                                                 @OZ17068 72339437
         END                                                            74339437

         TITLE '***** IDCTSPR0 - PRINT STATIC TEXT *****'               00010002
**********************************************************************  00050002
*                                                                    *  00100002
* MODULE NAME - IDCTSPR0 - STATIC TEXT MODULE FOR PRINT              *  00150002
*                                                                    *  00200002
* DESCRIPTIVE NAME - STATIC TEXT MODULE FOR THE FUNCTION PRINT       *  00250002
*                                                                    *  00300002
* COPYRIGHT - NONE                                                   *  00350002
*                                                                    *  00360002
* STATUS - RELEASE 2  LEVEL 0                                        *  00370003
*                                                                    *  00380002
* FUNCTION - CONTAINS NO EXECUTABLE CODE, ONLY STATIC TEXT ENTRIES   *  00390002
*        FOR THE FUNCTION PRINT                                      *  00392002
*        THIS MODULE IS LOADED BY IDCTP05 WHEN A STATIC TEXT         *  00394002
*        REQUEST IS MADE.                                            *  00396002
*                                                                    *  00398002
* NOTES - NONE                                                       *  00398402
*                                                                    *  00398802
*    DEPENDENCIES - NONE                                             *  00401002
*    RESTRICTIONS - NONE                                             *  00403002
*    REGISTER CONVENTIONS - NA                                       *  00403102
*    PATCH AREA - NA                                                 *  00403202
*                                                                    *  00403402
* MODULE TYPE - TABLES                                               *  00405602
*                                                                    *  00407802
*    PROCESSOR - ASSEMBLER                                           *  00410002
*    MODULE SIZE - 1702                                              *  00412203
*    ATTRIBUTES - READ-ONLY                                          *  00414402
*                                                                    *  00416402
*  ENTRY POINT - NA                                                  *  00416502
*                                                                    *  00416602
*  EXIT NORMAL - NA                                                  *  00417002
*                                                                    *  00417402
*  EXIT ERROR - NA                                                   *  00417802
*                                                                    *  00419402
*  EXTERNAL REFERENCES - NA                                          *  00419702
*                                                                    *  00420702
*  TABLES - NA                                                       *  00420802
*                                                                    *  00421002
*  MACROS - NA                                                       *  00421102
*                                                                    *  00421302
* CHANGE ACTIVITY - CHANGED FORMAT OF ENT 21 9/13/74         @Y30LSEC*  00421602
*                 - DELETED ENTRY 15 9/27/74                 @Y30LSEC*  00422002
*                 - READDED ENTRY 16                         @Y30LSEC*  00422103
*                 - ADDED ENTRY 24 1/7/75                    @Y30SSEC*  00435003
*                                                                    *  00448403
**********************************************************************  00461303
*                                                                    *  00474203
**********************************************************************  00487103
*                                                                    *  00500000
* THIS MODULE IS THE FIRST MODULE OF STATIC TEXT REQUIRED BY THE     *  00550000

IDCTSPR0  CSECT                                                         00850002
*                                                                       00900000
* THIS SECTION CONTAINS THE INDICES TO REACH AN ENTRY.               *  00950000
*                                                                       01000000
INDEX     DC    H'24'                   NULL INDEX VALUE.      @Y30SSEC 01050003
INDEX1    DC    Y(TXT1-INDEX)           LINE PRINT SUB-TITLE.           01100000
INDEX2    DC    Y(TXT2-INDEX)           KEY OF REC FMT ENTRY.  (CHAR)   01150003
INDEX3    DC    Y(TXT3-INDEX)           CCHHR OF RECORD FMT EN.(CHAR)   01160003
INDEX4    DC    Y(TXT4-INDEX)           RBA OF RECORD FMT ENT. (CHAR)   01170000
INDEX5    DC    Y(TXT5-INDEX)           RELATIVE RECORD ENTRY. (CHAR)   01170103
INDEX6    DC    Y(TXT6-INDEX)           KEY OF REC FMT ENT.   (HEX)     01180003
INDEX7    DC    Y(TXT7-INDEX)           CCHHR OF REC FMT ENT. (HEX)     01190003
INDEX8    DC    Y(TXT8-INDEX)           RBA OF REC ENT. (HEX)  @Y30SVLO 01192003
INDEX9    DC    Y(TXT9-INDEX)           REL. RECORD ENT.(HEX)  @Y30SVLO 01194003
INDEX10   DC    Y(TXT10-INDEX)          KEY OF REC FMT  (DUMP) @Y30SVLO 01194103
INDEX11   DC    Y(TXT11-INDEX)          CCHHR OF RECORD (DUMP) @Y30SVLO 01196003
INDEX12   DC    Y(TXT12-INDEX)          RBA OF REC ENT. (DUMP) @Y30SVLO 01198003
INDEX13   DC    Y(TXT13-INDEX)          REL. RECORD ENT.(DUMP) @Y30SVLO 01198103
INDEX14   DC    Y(TXT14-INDEX)          INVALID DS TYPES.      @Y30SVLO 01199603
INDEX15   DC    H'-1'                   NULL ENTRY             @Y30SVLO 01200203
INDEX16   DC    Y(TXT16-INDEX)          COPY CAT DELIM  ERR    @Y30LSEC 01200303
INDEX17   DC    Y(TXT17-INDEX)          INVALID DELIMITER.     @Y30SVLO 01200403
INDEX18   DC    Y(TXT18-INDEX)          CAT. RELOAD DELIM ERR  @YA04583 01216602
INDEX19   DC    Y(TXT19-INDEX)          CAT. RELOAD INVOKE     @YA04583 01226602
INDEX20   DC    Y(TXT20-INDEX)          TARGET CAT. SIZE ERR.  @YA04583 01228602
INDEX21   DC    Y(TXT21-INDEX)          CAT. NAME ERR.         @YA04583 01230602
INDEX22   DC    Y(TXT22-INDEX)          NO CAT. COMPARE        @YA04583 01232602
INDEX23   DC    Y(TXT23-INDEX)          TRUENAME COMPARE MSG   @YA04583 01233002

          EJECT                                                         01233302

TXT1      DC    Y(TXT1B-TXT1A)          LENGTH.                         01600000

./  ADD  SSI=72710584,NAME=IDCTSRC0
     TITLE  '***** IDCTSRC0 - EXPORTRA STATIC TEXT *****'               00050037
* /* START OF SPECIFICATIONS ****                                       00100037
*                                                                       00150037
*01*  MODULE-NAME = IDCTSRC0                                            00200037
*01*  MODULE-TYPE = MODULE                                              00250037
*02*    PROCESSOR = ASSEMBLER                                           00300037
*                                                                       00350037
**** END OF SPECIFICATIONS ****/                                        00400037
**********************************************************************  00450037
*                                                                    *  00500037
* MODULE NAME - IDCTSRC0 - STATIC TEXT MODULE FOR EXPORTRA           *  00550037
*                                                                    *  00600037
* DESCRIPTIVE NAME - STATIC TEXT MODULE FOR THE FUNCTION EXPORTRA    *  00650037
*                                                                    *  00700037
* COPYRIGHT - NONE                                                   *  00750037
*                                                                    *  00800037
* STATUS - RELEASE 2  LEVEL 0                                        *  00850037
*                                                                    *  00900037
* FUNCTION - CONTAINS NO EXECUTABLE CODE, ONLY STATIC TEXT ENTRIES   *  00950037
*        FOR THE FUNCTION EXPORT                                     *  01000037
*        THIS MODULE IS LOADED BY IDCTP05 WHEN A STATIC TEXT         *  01050037
*        REQUEST IS MADE.                                            *  01100037
*                                                                    *  01150037
* NOTES - NONE                                                       *  01200037
*                                                                    *  01250037
*    DEPENDENCIES - NONE                                             *  01300037
*    RESTRICTIONS - NONE                                             *  01350037
*    REGISTER CONVENTIONS - NA                                       *  01400037
*    PATCH AREA - NA                                                 *  01450037
*                                                                    *  01500037
* MODULE TYPE - TABLES                                               *  01550037
*                                                                    *  01600037
*    PROCESSOR - ASSEMBLER                                           *  01650037
*    MODULE SIZE - 1800 BYTES                                        *  01700037
*                                                                    *  01750037
*  ENTRY POINT - NA                                                  *  01800037
*                                                                    *  01850037
*  EXIT NORMAL - NA                                                  *  01900037
*                                                                    *  01950037
*  EXIT ERROR - NA                                                   *  02000037
*                                                                    *  02050037
*  EXTERNAL REFERENCES - NA                                          *  02100037
*                                                                    *  02150037
*  TABLES - NA                                                       *  02200037
*                                                                    *  02250037
*  MACROS - NA                                                       *  02300037
*                                                                    *  02350037
* CHANGE ACTIVITY                                                    *  02360037
* A031000,042640-043130,376000,405000                        @OZ25036*  02370037
*                                                                    *  02380037
*                                                                    *  02400037
**********************************************************************  02450037
*                                                                       02500037
**********************************************************************  02550037
*                                                                    *  02600037
* THIS MODULE IS THE FIRST MODULE OF STATIC TEXT REQUIRED BY THE     *  02650037
* EXPORTRA FUNCTIONAL SUPPORT ROUTINES.                              *  02700037
*                                                                    *  02750037
**********************************************************************  02800037
*                                                                       02850037
IDCTSRC0 CSECT                                                          02900037
*                                                                       02950037
* THIS SECTIONS CONTAINS THE INDICES TO REACH AN ENTRY.                 03000037
*                                                                       03050037
INDEX    DC  AL2((LASTINDX-INDEX1)/2)  COUNT OF ENTRIES       @OZ25036  03100037
INDEX1   DC  Y(TXT1-INDEX)             DATA SET NOT EXPORTED            03150037
INDEX2   DC  Y(TXT2-INDEX)             DATA SET EXPORTED(MINOR ERRORS)  03200037
INDEX3   DC  Y(TXT3-INDEX)             ENTRY TYPE NOT VALID             03250037
INDEX4   DC  Y(TXT3-INDEX)             OUT OF SYNC EXPORT(MINOR ERRORS) 03300037
INDEX5   DC  Y(TXT5-INDEX)             GOOD PORTABLE DATA SET           03350037
INDEX6   DC  Y(TXT6-INDEX)             OUT-OF-SYNC DATA SET EXPORTED    03400037
INDEX7   DC  Y(TXT7-INDEX)             OUT-OF-SYNC DATA SET BYPASSED    03450037
INDEX8   DC  Y(TXT8-INDEX)             PATH, ALIAS, ASSOCIATION ERROR   03500037
INDEX9   DC  Y(TXT9-INDEX)             CATALOG ASSOCIATION FIELD ERROR  03550037
INDEX10  DC  Y(TXT10-INDEX)            UNUSED                           03600037
INDEX11  DC  Y(TXT11-INDEX)            ENTRY NAME CANNOT BE FOUND       03650037
INDEX12  DC  Y(TXT12-INDEX)            VOLUME OUT-OF-SYNC               03700037
INDEX13  DC  Y(TXT13-INDEX)            REQUIRED VOLUME NOT SUPPLIED     03750037
INDEX14  DC  Y(TXT14-INDEX)            EXPORTING FROM CRA ON VOLUME     03800037
INDEX15  DC  Y(TXT15-INDEX)            DATA SET SUCCESSFULLY EXPORTED   03850037
INDEX16  DC  Y(TXT16-INDEX)            CRA NOT PROCESSED                03900037
INDEX17  DC  Y(TXT17-INDEX)            LOCKED ON CATALOG                03950037
INDEX18  DC  Y(TXT18-INDEX)            UNABLE TO REFERENCE CRA          04000037
INDEX19  DC  Y(TXT19-INDEX)            CONFLICTING JCL SPECIFICATIONS   04050037
INDEX20  DC  Y(TXT20-INDEX)            DSNAME                           04100037
INDEX21  DC  Y(TXT21-INDEX)            DUPLICATE NAME ENCOUNTERED       04150037
INDEX22  DC  Y(TXT22-INDEX)            ERROR REFERENCIND CRA            04200037
INDEX23  DC  Y(TXT23-INDEX)            EMPTY DATA SET                   04257037
INDEX24  DC  Y(TXT24-INDEX)            UNUSEABLE DATA SET     @OZ25036  04264037
INDEX25  DC  Y(TXT25-INDEX)            VOLUME REFER NO OBJECT REFER     04270037
*                                                             @OZ25036  04276037
**********************************************************************  04282037
*                                      INSERT ALL INDEX       @OZ25036  04288037
LASTINDX EQU  *                        NUMBERS BEFORE THIS    @OZ25036  04294037
*                                      BOX                    @OZ25036  04300037

         DC  H'0'                      CONVERSION FLAGS. (CHAR)         35100037
* INSERT DATA SUB-STRUCTURE.                                            35150037

         DC  H'0'                      UNUSED                           35300037

         DC  X'0000'                   CONVERSION FLAG.  (CHAR)         36150037
