./  ADD  SSI=50830880,NAME=IDCTSRI0
       TITLE '***** IDCTSRI0 - READER INTERPRETER STATIC TEXT *****'    00010002
**********************************************************************  00050002
*                                                                    *  00100002
* MODULE NAME - IDCTSRI0 - STATIC TEXT MODULE FOR READER INTERPRETER *  00150002
*                                                                    *  00200002
* DESCRIPTIVE NAME - STATIC TEXT MODULE FOR THE READER INTERPRETER   *  00250002
*                                                                    *  00300002
* COPYRIGHT - NONE                                                   *  00350002
*                                                                    *  00360002
* STATUS - RELEASE=1.5  LEVEL=0                                @YL026UL 00370002
*                                                                    *  00380002
* FUNCTION - CONTAINS NO EXECUTABLE CODE, ONLY STATIC TEXT ENTRIES   *  00390002
*        FOR THE READER INTERPRETER                                  *  00392002
*        THIS MODULE IS LOADED BY IDCTP05 WHEN A STATIC TEXT         *  00394002
*        REQUEST IS MADE.                                            *  00396002
*                                                                    *  00398002
* NOTES - NONE                                                       *  00398402
*                                                                    *  00398802
*    DEPENDENCIES - NONE                                             *  00401002
*    RESTRICTIONS - NONE                                             *  00403002
*    REGISTER CONVENTIONS - NA                                       *  00403102
*    PATCH AREA - NA                                                 *  00403202
*                                                                    *  00403402
* MODULE TYPE - TABLES                                               *  00405602
*                                                                    *  00407802
*    PROCESSOR - ASSEMBLER                                           *  00410002
*    MODULE SIZE - 2950 DECIMAL BYTES                          @YL026UL 00412202
*    ATTRIBUTES - READ-ONLY                                          *  00414402
*                                                                    *  00416402
*  ENTRY POINT - NA                                                  *  00416502
*                                                                    *  00416602
*  EXIT NORMAL - NA                                                  *  00417002
*                                                                    *  00417402
*  EXIT ERROR - NA                                                   *  00417802
*                                                                    *  00419402
*  EXTERNAL REFERENCES - NA                                          *  00419702
*                                                                    *  00420702
*  TABLES - NA                                                       *  00420802
*                                                                    *  00421002
*  MACROS - NA                                                       *  00421102
*                                                                    *  00421302
* CHANGE ACTIVITY - TWO MESSAGES REMOVED THAT ARE NOT NEEDED   @YL026UL 00421602
*                   FOR MVM.  SPACING CHANGED FOR COMMAND      @YL026UL 00421702
*                   COMPLETION MESSAGES.                       @YL026UL 00421802
*                                                                    *  00421902
**********************************************************************  00422202
*                                                                       00422402
*********************************************************************   00423302
*                                                                    *  00500002
* THIS MODULE IS THE FIRST MODULE OF STATIC TEXT REQUIRED BY THE     *  00550002
* READER INTERPRETER SERVICE ROUTINES.                               *  00600002
*                                                                    *  00650002
*********************************************************************   00700002
*                                                                       00750002

IDCTSRI0  CSECT                                                         00850002
*                                                                       00900002
*********************************************************************   00950002
*                                                                    *  01000002
* THIS SECTION OF CODE CONTAINS THE INDICIES REQUIRED TO REACH       *  01050002
* THE STATIC TEXT ENTRIES.                                           *  01100002
*                                                                    *  01150002
*********************************************************************   01200002
*                                                                       01250002
INDEX     DC  H'39'                     NUMBER OF ENTRIES.              01300002
INDEX1    DC  Y(TXT1-INDEX)             EXCESS POSIT SUB-PARMS          01350002

INDEX14   DC  Y(TXT14-INDEX)            KEYWORD TOO OFTEN.              02000002

         EJECT                                                          39010002

         DC  X'0000'                   MESSAGE FLAG.                    39046002
* BLOCK DATA SUB-STRUCTURE.                                             39049602

*        ENTRIES FOR THE R/I AND S/A USED IN THE TSO           @YL026UL 01060002
*        ENVIRONMENT. THIS MODULE IS LOADED BY IDCTP05 WHEN    @YL026UL 01100002
*        A STATIC TEXT REQUEST IS MADE.                        @YL026UL 01150002
*                                                                    *  01200002
* NOTES - NONE                                                       *  01250002

*********************************************************************   02700002

* THIS MODULE IS THE ONLY MODULE OF STATIC TEXT REQUIRED BY    @YL026UL 02800002

*                                                                       03150002
*********************************************************************   03200002
*                                                                    *  03250002
* THIS SECTION OF CODE CONTAINS THE INDICIES REQUIRED TO REACH       *  03300002
* THE STATIC TEXT ENTRIES.                                           *  03350002
*                                                                    *  03400002
*********************************************************************   03450002
*                                                              @YL026UL 03500002
INDEX    DC H'17'                      NUMBER OF ENTRIES       @Y30SSFR 03600003
INDEX1   DC Y(TXT1-INDEX)              NUMBER OUT OF RANGE     @YL026UL 03650002
INDEX2   DC Y(TXT2-INDEX)              INVALID NAME            @YL026UL 03700002
INDEX3   DC Y(TXT3-INDEX)              STRING TOO LONG         @YL026UL 03750002

INDEX9   DC Y(TXT9-INDEX)              BAD DATA ITEM PROMPT    @YL026UL 03870002

INDEX12  DC Y(TXT12-INDEX)             PUTGET ERROR            @YL026UL 03894002
INDEX13  DC Y(TXT13-INDEX)             DSN QUALIFYING ERROR    @YL026UL 03898002

INDEX16  DC Y(TXT16-INDEX)             EXTRANEOUS DATA CODED   @YL026UL 03899702
INDEX17  DC Y(TXT17-INDEX)             MISSING PARAMETER       @Y30SSFR 03899803
         EJECT                                                 @YL026UL 03900002

**********************************************************************  00100008
*                                                                    *  00150008
* MODULE NAME - IDCTSRS0 - STATIC TEXT MODULE FOR RESETCAT           *  00200008
*                                                                    *  00250008
* DESCRIPTIVE NAME - STATIC TEXT MODULE FOR THE FUNCTION RESETCAT    *  00300008
*                                                                    *  00350008
* COPYRIGHT - NONE                                                   *  00400008
*                                                                    *  00450008
* STATUS -                                                           *  00500008
*                                                                    *  00550008
* FUNCTION - CONTAINS NO EXECUTIBLE CODE, ONLY STATIC TEXT ENTRIES   *  00600008
*            FOR THE FUNCTION RESETCAT.                              *  00650008
*            THIS MODULE IS LOADED BY IDCTP05 WHEN A STATIC TEXT     *  00700008
*            REQUEST IS MADE.                                        *  00750008
*                                                                    *  00800008
* NOTES - NONE                                                       *  00850008
*                                                                    *  00900008
*    DEPENDENCIES - NONE                                             *  00950008
*    RESTRICTIONS - NONE                                             *  01000008
*    REGISTER CONVENTIONS - NA                                       *  01050008
*    PATCH AREA - NA                                                 *  01100008
*                                                                    *  01150008
* MODULE TYPE - TABLES                                               *  01200008
*                                                                    *  01250008
*    PROCESSOR - ASSEMBLER                                           *  01300008
*    MODULE SIZE -                                                   *  01350008
*    ATTRIBUTES - READ ONLY                                          *  01400008
*                                                                    *  01450008
* ENTRY POINT - NA                                                   *  01500008
*                                                                    *  01550008
*  EXIT NORMAL - NA                                                  *  01600008
*                                                                    *  01650008
*  EXIT ERROR - NA                                                   *  01700008
*                                                                    *  01750008
* EXTERNAL REFERENCES - NA                                           *  01800008
*                                                                    *  01850008
* TABLES - NA                                                        *  01900008
*                                                                    *  01950008
* MACROS - NA                                                        *  02000008
*                                                                    *  02050008

*  NONVSAM/USERCATALOG MOVE                                  @ZA18274*  02150008
**********************************************************************  02200008
IDCTSRS0 CSECT                                                          02600008
*                                                                       02650008
* THIS SECTION CONTAINS THE INDICES TO REACH AN ENTRY.               *  02700008
*                                                                       02750008

INDEX1   DC  Y(TXT1-INDEX)             CAT NOT A RECOVERABLE CAT        02850008

INDEX7   DC  Y(TXT7-INDEX)             PHYSICAL I/O ERROR ON THE CAT    03150008

INDEX9   DC  Y(TXT9-INDEX)             ERROR ACCESSING THE CATALOG      03250008

INDEX11  DC  Y(TXT11-INDEX)            CRA DOES NOT BELONG TO CATALOG   03350008

INDEX15  DC  Y(TXT15-INDEX)            DELETE OF WORKFILE FAILED        03550008

         TITLE  '***** IDCTSSA0 - SYS ADAPTER STATIC TEXT VS/2  *****'  08000024
**********************************************************************  09000024
*                                                                    *  10000024
* MODULE NAME - IDCTSSA0 - STATIC TEXT MODULE FOR SYSTEM ADAPTER     *  11000024
*                                                                    *  12000024
*                                                                    *  13000024
* DESCRIPTIVE NAME - STATIC TEXT MODULE FOR THE SYSTEM ADAPTER       *  14000024
*                                                                    *  15000037
*                                                                    *  16000037
* COPYRIGHT - NONE                                                   *  17000037
*                                                                    *  18000037
* STATUS - RELEASE 3  LEVEL 0                                        *  19000037
*                                                                    *  20000037
* FUNCTION - CONTAINS NO EXECUTABLE CODE, ONLY STATIC TEXT ENTRIES   *  21000037
*                                                                    *  22000037
*        THIS MODULE IS LOADED BY IDCTP05 WHEN A STATIC TEXT         *  23000037
*        REQUEST IS MADE.                                            *  24000037
*                                                                    *  25000037
* NOTES - NONE                                                       *  26000037
*                                                                    *  27000037
*    DEPENDENCIES - NONE                                             *  28000037
*    RESTRICTIONS - NONE                                             *  29000037
*    REGISTER CONVENTIONS - NA                                       *  30000037
*    PATCH AREA - NA                                                 *  31000037
*                                                                    *  32000037
* MODULE TYPE - TABLES                                               *  33000037
*                                                                    *  34000037
*    PROCESSOR - ASSEMBLER                                           *  35000037
*    MODULE SIZE - 0800                                              *  36000024
*    ATTRIBUTES - READ-ONLY                                          *  37000037
*                                                                    *  38000037
*  ENTRY POINT - NA                                                  *  39000037
*                                                                    *  40000037
*  EXIT NORMAL - NA                                                  *  41000037
*                                                                    *  42000037
*  EXIT ERROR - NA                                                   *  43000037
*                                                                    *  44000037
*  EXTERNAL REFERENCES - NA                                          *  45000037
*                                                                    *  46000037
*  TABLES - NA                                                       *  47000037
*                                                                    *  48000037
*  MACROS - NA                                                       *  49000037
*                                                                    *  50000037
* CHANGE ACTIVITY -                                                  *  51000037
*                                                                    *  52000037
*             VS/2 RELEASE 3.824 ADDITIONS                           *  52200024
* RACHECK MESSAGES WERE ADDED.                               @G24LSBS*  52400024
*                                                                    *  52600024
*                                                                    *  53000037
**********************************************************************  54000037
*                                                                       55000037
**********************************************************************  56000037
*                                                                    *  57000037
* THIS MODULE IS THE FIRST MODULE OF STATIC TEXT REQUIRED BY THE     *  58000037
* SYSTEM SERVICE ROUTINE.                                            *  59000024
*                                                                    *  60000037
**********************************************************************  61000037
*                                                                       62000037
IDCTSSA0  CSECT                                                         63000037
*                                                                       64000037
**********************************************************************  65000037
*                                                                    *  66000037
* THIS SECTION CONTAINS THE INDICES TO REACH AN ENTRY.               *  67000037
*                                                                    *  68000037
**********************************************************************  69000037
*                                                                       70000037
INDEX     DC  AL2((LASTINDX-INDEX1)/2)  COUNT OF ENTRIES                71000037
INDEX1    DC  Y(TXT1-INDEX)             UNABLE TO SCRATCH DSN           72000024
INDEX2    DC  Y(TXT2-INDEX)             NO VOLUME MOUNTED               72300024
INDEX3    DC  H'-1'                     DSN NOT ON VOLUME (DELETED)     72600024
INDEX4    DC  Y(TXT4-INDEX)             BAD PASSWORD                    72900024
INDEX5    DC  Y(TXT5-INDEX)             NON-EXPIRED DSN ON VOLUME       73200024
INDEX6    DC  Y(TXT6-INDEX)             PERM I/O ERROR ON VOLUME        73500024
INDEX7    DC  Y(TXT7-INDEX)             UNABLE TO MOUNT VOLUME          73800024
INDEX8    DC  Y(TXT8-INDEX)             DATA SET WAS IN USE             74100024
INDEX9    DC  Y(TXT9-INDEX)             NO RACF PROFILE ON 'ENTITY'     74400024
INDEX10   DC  Y(TXT10-INDEX)            URACHECK FAILED FOR 'ENTITY'    74700024
INDEX11   DC  Y(TXT11-INDEX)            INVALID RACF PARM LIST          75000024
INDEX12   DC  Y(TXT12-INDEX)            INVALID RACF AUTHORIZATION      75300024
*                                                                    *  75900024
**********************************************************************  76200024
*                                       INSERT ALL INDEX             *  76500024
LASTINDX EQU   *                        NUMBERS BEFORE THIS          *  76800024
*                                       BOX                          *  77100024
**********************************************************************  78000037
          EJECT                                                         79000037
**********************************************************************  80000037
*                                                                    *  81000037
* THIS SECTION CONTAINS THE ENTRIES.                                 *  82000037
*                                                                    *  83000037
**********************************************************************  84000037
          EJECT                                                         85000037
*                                                                       86000024
* DATA SET COULD NOT BE SCRATCHED MESSAGE.                              86050024
*                                                                       86100024

          DC    X'8000'                 MESSAGE FLAG.                   86200024

* STATIC ENTRY.                                                         93550024
STE81A    DC    C'IDC2916I ** DATA SET WAS IN USE'                      93600024
STE81B    EQU *                                                         93650024
TXT8B     EQU *                                                         93700024
          EJECT                                                         93750024
*                                                              @G24LSBS 93800024
* NO RACF PROFILE NO 'ENTITY' MESSAGE.                         @G24LSBS 93850024
*                                                              @G24LSBS 93900024
TXT9      DC    Y(TXT9B-TXT9A)          ENTRY LENGTH.          @G24LSBS 93950024
          DC    X'8000'                 MESSAGE FLAG.          @G24LSBS 94000024
* DOUBLE SPACE SUB-STRUCTURE.                                  @G24LSBS 94050024
TXT9A     DC    X'4000'                 SPACE CONTROL FLAG.    @G24LSBS 94100024
          DC    H'2'                    SPACING FACTOR.        @G24LSBS 94150024
          DC    C'R '                   SPACING TYPE.          @G24LSBS 94200024
* STATIC TEXT SUB-STRUCTURE.                                   @G24LSBS 94250024
          DC    X'0400'                 STATIC TEXT FLAG.      @G24LSBS 94300024
          DC    Y(STE91B-STE91A)        STATIC TEXT LENGTH.    @G24LSBS 94350024
          DC    Y(STE91A-TXT9A)         STATIC TEXT OFFSET.    @G24LSBS 94400024
          DC    H'1'                    PRINT COLUMN NO.       @G24LSBS 94450024
          DC    Y(STE91B-STE91A)        PRINT FIELD LENGTH     @G24LSBS 94500024
          DC    H'0'                    CONVERSION FLAGS(CHAR) @G24LSBS 94550024
* BLOCK DATA SUB-STRUCTURE.                                    @G24LSBS 94600024
          DC    X'9000'                 EOF & BLOCK DATA FLAGS @G24LSBS 94650024
          DC    H'44'                   INPUT DATA LENGTH.     @G24LSBS 94700024
          DC    H'0'                    INPUT DATA OFFSET      @G24LSBS 94750024
          DC    H'29'                   PRINT COLUMN.          @G24LSBS 94800024
          DC    H'44'                   PRINT FIELD LENGTH     @G24LSBS 94850024
          DC    H'0'                    CONVERSION FLAGS(CHAR) @G24LSBS 94900024
* STATIC ENTRY.                                                @G24LSBS 94950024
STE91A    DC    C'IDC2917I NO RACF PROFILE ON '                @G24LSBS 95000024
STE91B    EQU *                                                @G24LSBS 95050024
TXT9B     EQU *                                                @G24LSBS 95100024
          EJECT                                                         95150024
*                                                              @G24LSBS 95200024
* RACHECK FAILED FOR 'ENTITY' MESSAGE.                         @G24LSBS 95250024
*                                                              @G24LSBS 95300024
TXT10     DC    Y(TXT10B-TXT10A)        ENTRY LENGTH.          @G24LSBS 95350024
          DC    X'8000'                 MESSAGE FLAG.          @G24LSBS 95400024
* DOUBLE SPACE SUB-STRUCTURE.                                  @G24LSBS 95450024
TXT10A    DC    X'4000'                 SPACE CONTROL FLAG.    @G24LSBS 95500024
          DC    H'2'                    SPACING FACTOR.        @G24LSBS 95550024
          DC    C'R '                   SPACING TYPE.          @G24LSBS 95600024
* STATIC TEXT SUB-STRUCTURE.                                   @G24LSBS 95650024
          DC    X'0400'                 STATIC TEXT FLAG.      @G24LSBS 95700024
          DC    Y(STE101B-STE101A)      STATIC TEXT LENGTH.    @G24LSBS 95750024
          DC    Y(STE101A-TXT10A)       STATIC TEXT OFFSET.    @G24LSBS 95800024
          DC    H'1'                    PRINT COLUMN NO.       @G24LSBS 95850024
          DC    Y(STE101B-STE101A)      PRINT FIELD LENGTH     @G24LSBS 95900024
          DC    H'0'                    CONVERSION FLAGS(CHAR) @G24LSBS 95950024
* BLOCK DATA SUB-STRUCTURE.                                    @G24LSBS 96000024
          DC    X'9000'                 EOF & BLOCK DATA FLAGS @G24LSBS 96050024
          DC    H'44'                   INPUT DATA LENGTH.     @G24LSBS 96100024
          DC    H'0'                    INPUT DATA OFFSET      @G24LSBS 96150024
          DC    H'29'                   PRINT COLUMN.          @G24LSBS 96200024
          DC    H'44'                   PRINT FIELD LENGTH     @G24LSBS 96250024
          DC    H'0'                    CONVERSION FLAGS(CHAR) @G24LSBS 96300024
* STATIC ENTRY.                                                @G24LSBS 96350024
STE101A   DC    C'IDC2918I RACHECK FAILED FOR '                @G24LSBS 96400024
STE101B   EQU *                                                @G24LSBS 96450024
TXT10B    EQU *                                                @G24LSBS 96500024
          EJECT                                                         96550024
*                                                              @G24LSBS 96600024
* INVALID URACHECK PARAMETER LIST MESSAGE.                     @G24LSBS 96650024
*                                                              @G24LSBS 96700024
TXT11     DC    Y(TXT11B-TXT11A)        ENTRY LENGTH.          @G24LSBS 96750024
          DC    X'A000'                 MESSAGE FLAG.          @G24LSBS 96800024
* STATIC TEXT SUB-STRUCTURE.                                   @G24LSBS 96850024
TXT11A    DC    X'8400'                 STATIC TEXT FLAG.      @G24LSBS 96900024
          DC    Y(STE111B-STE111A)      STATIC TEXT LENGTH.    @G24LSBS 96950024
          DC    Y(STE111A-TXT11A)       STATIC TEXT OFFSET.    @G24LSBS 97000024
          DC    H'1'                    PRINT COLUMN.          @G24LSBS 97050024
          DC    Y(STE111B-STE111A)      PRINT FIELD LENGTH.    @G24LSBS 97100024
          DC    H'0'                    CONVERSION FLAGS(CHAR) @G24LSBS 97150024
* STATIC TEXT ENTRY.                                           @G24LSBS 97200024
STE111A   DC  C'IDC2919I INVALID URACHECK PARAMETER LIST'      @G24LSBS 97250024
STE111B   EQU *                                                @G24LSBS 97300024
TXT11B    EQU *                                                @G24LSBS 97350024
          EJECT                                                         97400024
*                                                              @G24LSBS 97450024
* INVALID RACF AUTHORIZATION   MESSAGE.                        @G24LSBS 97500024
*                                                              @G24LSBS 97550024
TXT12     DC    Y(TXT12B-TXT12A)        ENTRY LENGTH.          @G24LSBS 97600024
          DC    X'A000'                 MESSAGE FLAG.          @G24LSBS 97650024
* STATIC TEXT SUB-STRUCTURE.                                   @G24LSBS 97700024
TXT12A    DC    X'8400'                 STATIC TEXT FLAG.      @G24LSBS 97750024
          DC    Y(STE121B-STE121A)      STATIC TEXT LENGTH.    @G24LSBS 97800024
          DC    Y(STE121A-TXT12A)       STATIC TEXT OFFSET.    @G24LSBS 97850024
          DC    H'1'                    PRINT COLUMN.          @G24LSBS 97900024
          DC    Y(STE121B-STE121A)      PRINT FIELD LENGTH.    @G24LSBS 97950024
          DC    H'0'                    CONVERSION FLAGS(CHAR) @G24LSBS 98000024
* STATIC TEXT ENTRY.                                           @G24LSBS 98050024
STE121A   DC  C'IDC2930I ** INVALID RACF AUTHORIZATION'        @G24LSBS 98100024
STE121B   EQU *                                                @G24LSBS 98150024
TXT12B    EQU *                                                @G24LSBS 98200024
          EJECT                                                         98250024
          END                                                           98300024
./  ADD  SSI=50780175,NAME=IDCTSTP0
         TITLE '***** IDCTSTP0 - TEXT PROCESSOR STATIC TEXT *****'      00002000
**********************************************************************  00010000
*                                                                    *  00020000
* MODULE NAME - IDCTSTP0 - STATIC TEXT MODULE FOR TEXT PROCESSOR.    *  00030000
*                                                                    *  00040000
* DESCRIPTIVE NAME - STATIC TEXT MODULE CONTAINING THE TRANSLATE     *  00042000
*        TABLES USED IN PRINT LINE TRANSLATION                       *  00042400
*                                                                    *  00044000
* COPYRIGHT - NONE                                                   *  00046000
*                                                                    *  00048000
* STATUS - RELEASE 0  LEVEL 0                                        *  00048400
*                                                                    *  00048800
* FUNCTION - CONTAINS NO EXECUTABLE CODE, ONLY STATIC TEXT ENTRIES   *  00049200
*        FOR THE FUNCTION TEXT PROCESSOR                             *  00049600
*        THIS MODULE IS LOADED BY IDCTP05 WHEN A STATIC TEXT         *  00049700
*        REQUEST IS MADE.                                            *  00049800
*                                                                    *  00049900
* NOTES - NONE                                                       *  00066600
*                                                                    *  00068600
*    DEPENDENCIES - NONE                                             *  00070600
*    RESTRICTIONS - NONE                                             *  00072600
*    REGISTER CONVENTIONS - NONE                                     *  00074600
*    PATCH AREA - NONE                                               *  00075000
*                                                                    *  00076600
* MODULE TYPE - TABLES                                               *  00086600
*                                                                    *  00096600
*    PROCESSOR - ASSEMBLER                                           *  00098600
*    MODULE SIZE - 1056                                              *  00099000
*    ATTRIBUTES - READ-ONLY                                          *  00099400
*                                                                    *  00099800
*  ENTRY POINT - NA                                                  *  00101900
*                                                                    *  00105400
*  EXIT NORMAL - NA                                                  *  00105800
*                                                                    *  00107400
*  EXIT ERROR - NA                                                   *  00107800
*                                                                    *  00109400
*  EXTERNAL REFERENCES - NA                                          *  00109500
*                                                                    *  00109800
*  TABLES - NA                                                       *  00109900
*                                                                    *  00110200
*  MACROS - NA                                                       *  00110300
*                                                                    *  00110600
* CHANGE ACTIVITY - NONE                                             *  00111000
*                                                                    *  00116600
**********************************************************************  00126600
*01*  MODULE-NAME = IDCTSTP0                                            00150000
**********************************************************************  00400000
*                                                                    *  00450000
* THIS MODULE IS THE FIRST STATIC TEXT MODULE FOR TEXT OUTPUT        *  00500000
* PROCESSING.  IT CONTAINS THE STANDARD TRANSLATE TABLES.            *  00550000
*                                                                    *  00650000
********************************************************************    00700000
*                                                                       00750000
IDCTSTP0  CSECT                                                         00800000
*                                                                       00850000
*         THIS SECTION CONTAINS THE INDICES TO REACH THE ENTRY.      *  00900000
*                                                                       00950000
INDEX     DC  H'7'                      NULL INDEX VALUE.               01000000
INDEX1    DC  Y(TXT1-INDEX)             AN PRINT CHAIN TEXT.            01050000
INDEX2    DC  Y(TXT2-INDEX)             PN PRINT CHAIN TEXT.            01100000
INDEX3    DC  Y(TXT3-INDEX)             QN PRINT CHAIN TEXT.            01150000
INDEX4    DC  Y(TXT4-INDEX)             SN PRINT CHAIN TEXT.            01200000
INDEX5    DC  Y(TXT5-INDEX)             TN PRINT CHAIN TEXT.            01250000
INDEX6    DC  Y(TXT6-INDEX)             HN PRINT CHAIN TEXT.            01260000
INDEX7    DC  Y(TXT7-INDEX)             RN PRINT CHAIN TEXT.            01270000
*                                                                       01300000
* THE BEGINNING OF THE TEXT SECTION.                                    01350000
*                                                                       01400000
*         THE FOLLOWING IS THE AN PRINT CHAIN TRANSLATE TABLE.          01450000
*                                                                       01500000
          DS  0F                                                        01510000
TXT1      DC  Y(TXT1B-TXT1A)            TRAN TABLE LENGTH.              01550000
FLG1      DC  H'0'                      FLAG BYTE.                      01560000
TXT1A     DC  64C'.'                                                    01600000
          DC  C' ...........<.+.&&..........$*...-/.........,%'         01650000
          DC  C'..............#@..'                                     01700000
          DC  66C'.'                                                    01750000
          DC  C'ABCDEFGHI.......JKLMNOPQR........STUVWXYZ......'        01800000
          DC  C'0123456789......'                                       01850000
TXT1B     EQU *                                                         01900000
*                                                                       01950000
*         THE FOLLOWING IS THE PN PRINT CHAIN TRANSLATE TABLE           02000000
*                                                                       02050000
          DS  0F                                                        02060000
TXT2      DC  Y(TXT2B-TXT2A)            TRAN TABLE LENGTH.              02100000
FLG2      DC  H'0'                      FLAG BYTE.                      02110000
TXT2A     DC  64C'.'                                                    02150000
          DC  C' ...........<(+|&&..........$*);¬-/.........,%'         02200000
          DC  C'_>?..........:#@''="'                                   02250000
          DC  65C'.'                                                    02300000
          DC  C'ABCDEFGHI.......JKLMNOPQR........STUVWXYZ......'        02350000
          DC  C'0123456789......'                                       02400000
TXT2B     EQU *                                                         02450000
*                                                                       02500000
*         THE FOLLOWING IS THE QN CHAIN TRANSLATE TABLE              *  02550000
*                                                                       02600000
          DS  0F                                                        02610000
TXT3      DC  Y(TXT3B-TXT3A)            TRAN TABLE LENGTH.              02650000
FLG3      DC  H'0'                      FLAG BYTE.                      02660000
TXT3A     DC  64C'.'                                                    02700000
          DC  C' ...........<(+|&&..........$*);¬-/.........,%'         02750000
          DC  C'_>?..........:#@''="'                                   02800000
          DC  65C'.'                                                    02850000
          DC  C'ABCDEFGHI.......JKLMNOPQR........STUVWXYZ......'        02900000
          DC  C'0123456789......'                                       02950000
TXT3B     EQU *                                                         03000000
*                                                                       03050000
*         THE FOLLOWING IS THE SN CHAIN TRANSLATE TABLE.             *  03100000
*                                                                       03150000
          DS  0F                                                        03160000
TXT4      DC  Y(TXT4B-TXT4A)            TRAN TABLE LENGTH.              03200000
FLG4      DC  H'0'                      FLAG BYTE.                      03210000
TXT4A     DC  64C'.'                                                    03250000
          DC  C' .........Ý.<(+|&&.........¨$*);.-/.........,%'         03300000
          DC  C'..?..........:.@''."'                                   03350000
          DC  C'.abcdefghi.......jklmnopqr........stuvwxyz........'     03400000
          DC  C'.............×.'                                        03450000
          DC  C'ABCDEFGHI.......JKLMNOPQR........STUVWXYZ......'        03500000
          DC  C'0123456789......'                                       03550000
TXT4B     EQU *                                                         03600000
*                                                                       03650000
*         THE FOLLOWING IS THE TN PRINT CHAIN TRANSLATE TABLE           03700000
*                                                                       03750000
          DS  0F                                                        03760000
TXT5      DC  Y(TXT5B-TXT5A)            TRAN TABLE LENGTH.              03800000
FLG5      DC  H'0'                      FLAG BYTE.                      03810000
TXT5A     DC   64C'.'                                                   03850000
          DC  C' '                                                      04000000
          DC  9C'.'                                                     04050000
          DC  C'¢.<(+|&&'                                               04100000
          DC  9C'.'                                                     04150000
          DC  C'!$*);¬-/'                                               04160000
          DC  9C'.'                                                     04170000
          DC  C',%_>?'                                                  04180000
          DC  10C'.'                                                    04190000
          DC  X'7A7B7C7D7E7F4B8182838485868788894B8B8C8D8E8F'           04192400
          DC  X'4B9192939495969798994B9B9C9D9E9F'                       04194400
          DC  X'A0A1A2A3A4A5A6A7A8A94BABACADAE4B'                       04196400
          DC  X'B0B1B2B3B4B5B6B7B8B94BBBBCBDBEBF'                       04198100
          DC  C'.ABCDEFGHI......'                                       04198400
          DC  C'.JKLMNOPQR......'                                       04198800
          DC  C'..STUVWXYZ......'                                       04199200
          DC  C'0123456789......'                                       04199600
TXT5B     EQU *                                                         04200000
*                                                                       04220000
*         THE FOLLOWING IS THE HN PRINT CHAIN TRANSLATE TABLE.          04230000
*                                                                       04240000
          DS  0F                                                        04242000
TXT6      DC  Y(TXT6B-TXT6A)            TRAN TABLE LENGTH.              04244000
FLG6      DC  H'0'                      FLAG BYTE.                      04246000
TXT6A     DC  64C'.'                                                    04248000
          DC  C' ............(+.&&..........$*)..-/.........,.'         04248400
          DC  C'................''='                                    04248800
          DC  66C'.'                                                    04249200
          DC  C'ABCDEFGHI.......JKLMNOPQR........STUVWXYZ......'        04249600
          DC  C'0123456789......'                                       04249700
TXT6B     EQU *                                                         04249800
*                                                                       04249900
*         THE FOLLOWING IS THE RN PRINT CHAIN TRANSLATE TABLE.          04299900
*                                                                       04309900
          DS  0F                                                        04319900
TXT7      DC  Y(TXT7B-TXT7A)            TRAN TABLE LENGTH.              04329900
FLG7      DC  H'0'                      FLAG BYTE.                      04339900
TXT7A     DC  64C'.'                                                    04341900
          DC  C' ...........<(+.&&..........$*)..-/.........,%'         04343900
          DC  C'..............#@''='                                    04345900
          DC  66C'.'                                                    04347900
          DC  C'ABCDEFGHI.......JKLMNOPQR........STUVWXYZ......'        04348300
          DC  C'0123456789......'                                       04348700
TXT7B     EQU *                                                         04349100
          END                                                           04349900
./  ADD  SSI=50780176,NAME=IDCTSTP1
         TITLE '*****IDCTSTP1 - TEXT PROCESSOR STATIC TEXT *****'       00010000
**********************************************************************  00050000
*                                                                    *  00100000
* MODULE NAME - IDCTSTP1 - STATIC TEXT MODULE FOR TEXT PROCESSOR     *  00150000
*        THIS MODULE CONTAINS THE MESSAGES FOR THE TEXT PROCESSOR.   *  00170000
*                                                                    *  00200000
* DESCRIPTIVE NAME - STATIC TEXT MODULE FOR THE TEXT PROCESSOR       *  00250000
*                                                                    *  00300000
* COPYRIGHT - NONE                                                   *  00350000
*                                                                    *  00360000
* STATUS - RELEASE 0  LEVEL 0                                        *  00370000
*                                                                    *  00380000
* FUNCTION - CONTAINS NO EXECUTABLE CODE, ONLY STATIC TEXT ENTRIES   *  00390000
*        FOR THE TEXT PROCESSOR                                      *  00392000
*        THIS MODULE IS LOADED BY IDCTP05 WHEN A STATIC TEXT         *  00394000
*        REQUEST IS MADE.                                            *  00396000
*                                                                    *  00398000
* NOTES - NONE                                                       *  00398400
*                                                                    *  00398500
*    DEPENDENCIES - NONE                                             *  00398600
*    RESTRICTIONS - NONE                                             *  00398700
*    REGISTER CONVENTIONS - NA                                       *  00400900
*    PATCH AREA - NA                                                 *  00402900
*                                                                    *  00403400
* MODULE TYPE - TABLES                                               *  00405600
*                                                                    *  00407800
*    PROCESSOR - ASSEMBLER                                           *  00410000
*    MODULE SIZE - 374                                               *  00412200
*    ATTRIBUTES - READ-ONLY                                          *  00414400
*                                                                    *  00416600
*  ENTRY POINT - NA                                                  *  00417000
*                                                                    *  00418600
*  EXIT NORMAL - NA                                                  *  00419000
*                                                                    *  00420600
*  EXIT ERROR - NA                                                   *  00421000
*                                                                    *  00422600
*  EXTERNAL REFERENCES - NA                                          *  00423000
*                                                                    *  00424600
*  TABLES - NA                                                       *  00424700
*                                                                    *  00425000
*  MACROS - NA                                                       *  00425100
*                                                                    *  00425400
* CHANGE ACTIVITY - NONE                                             *  00426600
*                                                                    *  00428600
**********************************************************************  00430600
*                                                                       00433300
*********************************************************************   00450000
*                                                                    *  00500000
* THIS MODULE IS THE SECOND MODULE OF STATIC TEXT REQUIRED BY THE    *  00550000
* TEXT PROCESSING ROUTINES.                                          *  00600000
*                                                                    *  00650000
********************************************************************    00700000
*                                                                       00750000
*                                                                       00800000
IDCTSTP1  CSECT                                                         00850000
*                                                                       00900000
* THIS SECTION CONTAINS THE INDICES TO REACH AN ENTRY.                  00950000
*                                                                       01000000
INDEX     DC  H'7'                      NULL INDEX VALUE.               01050000
INDEX1    DC  Y(TXT1-INDEX)             FORMAT ERROR                    01100000
INDEX2    DC  Y(TXT2-INDEX)             OUT COL ERROR                   01150000
INDEX3    DC  Y(TXT3-INDEX)             LONG LENGTH FIELD               01200000
INDEX4    DC  Y(TXT4-INDEX)             NESTED REDO                     01250000
INDEX5    DC  H'-1'                     NULL ENTRY                      01300000
INDEX6    DC  Y(TXT6-INDEX)             MISSING ENTRY                   01350000
INDEX7    DC  Y(TXT7-INDEX)             INVALID DECIMAL                 01360000
          EJECT                                                         01400000
**********************************************************************  01450000
*                                                                    *  01500000
* THIS SECTION CONTAINS THE ENTRIES.                                 *  01550000
*                                                                    *  01600000
**********************************************************************  01650000
*                                                                       01700000
* AN INVALID FORMAT STRUCTURE HAS BEEN ENCOUNTERED.                     01710000
*                                                                       01720000
TXT1      DC  Y(TXT1B-TXT1A)            LENGTH.                         01800000
FLG1A     DC  X'8000'                   MESSAGE FLAG.                   01850000
* STATIC TEXT SUB-STRUCTURE.                                            01860000
TXT1A     DC  X'8400'                   EOF & STATIC FLAGS.             01870000
          DC  Y(STE11B-STE11A)          STATIC TEXT LENGTH.             01880000
          DC  Y(STE11A-TXT1A)           STATIC TEXT OFFSET.             01890000
          DC  H'1'                      PRINT COLUMN.                   01892000
          DC  Y(STE11B-STE11A)          OUTPUT LENGTH.                  01894000
          DC  H'0'                      CONVERSION FLAGS. (CHAR)        01896000
* STATIC TEXT ENTRY.                                                    01898000
STE11A    DC  C'IDC2950I  INVALID FORMAT STRUCTURE'                     01900000
STE11B    EQU *                                                         01910000
TXT1B     EQU *                                                         01950000
          EJECT                                                         01960000
*                                                                       01962000
* AN OUTPUT COLUMN HAS BEEN SPECIFIED BEYOND THE LINE WIDTH.            01970000
*                                                                       01980000
TXT2      DC  Y(TXT2B-TXT2A)            LENGTH.                         02050000
FLG2A     DC  X'8000'                   MESSAGE FLAG.                   02100000
* STATIC TEXT SUB-STRUCTURE.                                            02110000
TXT2A     DC  X'8400'                   EOF AND STATIC FLAGS.           02120000
          DC  Y(STE21B-STE21A)          STATIC TEXT LENGTH.             02130000
          DC  Y(STE21A-TXT2A)           STATIC TEXT OFFSET.             02140000
          DC  H'1'                      PRINT COLUMN.                   02142000
          DC  Y(STE21B-STE21A)          PRINT FIELD LENGTH.             02144000
          DC  H'0'                      CONVERSION FLAGS. (CHAR)        02146000
* STATIC TEXT ENTRY.                                                    02148000
STE21A    DC  C'IDC2951I  OUTPUT COLUMN SPECIFIED OUT OF RANGE'         02150000
STE21B    EQU *                                                         02160000
TXT2B     EQU *                                                         02200000
          EJECT                                                         02202000
*                                                                       02210000
* A FIELD HAS BEEN ENCOUNTERED WHOSE LENGTH EXCEEDS THE ALLOWABLE       02220000
* MAXIMUM.                                                              02230000
*                                                                       02240000
TXT3      DC  Y(TXT3B-TXT3A)            LENGTH.                         02300000
FLG3A     DC  X'8000'                   MESSAGE FLAG.                   02350000
* STATIC TEXT SUB-STRUCTURE.                                            02360000
TXT3A     DC  X'8400'                   EOF AND STATIC FLAGS.           02370000
          DC  Y(STE31B-STE31A)          STATIC TEXT LENGTH.             02380000
          DC  Y(STE31A-TXT3A)           STATIC TEXT OFFSET.             02390000
          DC  H'1'                      PRINT COLUMN.                   02392000
          DC  Y(STE31B-STE31A)          PRINT FIELD LENGTH.             02394000
          DC  H'0'                      CONVERSION FLAGS. (CHAR)        02396000
* STATIC TEXT ENTRY.                                                    02398000
STE31A    DC  C'IDC2952I  EXCESSIVE FIELD LENGTH FOR BD OR PU CONV'     02400000
STE31B    EQU *                                                         02410000
TXT3B     EQU *                                                         02450000
          EJECT                                                         02452000
*                                                                       02460000
* A REQUEST FOR A REDO HAS BEEN ENCOUNTERED WITHIN A REDO.              02470000
*                                                                       02480000
TXT4      DC  Y(TXT4B-TXT4A)            LENGTH.                         02550000
FLG4A     DC  X'8000'                   MESSAGE FLAG.                   02600000
* STATIC TEXT SUB-STRUCTURE.                                            02610000
TXT4A     DC  X'8400'                   EOF & STATIC FLAGS.             02620000
          DC  Y(STE41B-STE41A)          STATIC TEXT LENGTH.             02630000
          DC  Y(STE41A-TXT4A)           STATIC TEXT OFFSET.             02640000
          DC  H'1'                      PRINT COLUMN.                   02642000
          DC  Y(STE41B-STE41A)          PRINT FIELD LENGTH.             02644000
          DC  H'0'                      CONVERSION FLAGS. (CHAR)        02646000
* STATIC TEXT ENTRY.                                                    02648000
STE41A    DC  C'IDC2953I  A REDO SUB-STRUCTURE IS NESTED'               02650000
STE41B    EQU *                                                         02660000
TXT4B     EQU *                                                         02700000
          EJECT                                                         03000000
*                                                                       03010000
* A STATIC TEXT ENTRY IS NOT IN THE INDICATED MODULE.                   03020000
*                                                                       03030000
TXT6      DC  Y(TXT6B-TXT6A)            LENGTH.                         03050000
FLG6A     DC  X'8000'                   MESSAGE FLAG.                   03100000
* STATIC TEXT SUB-STRUCTURE.                                            03110000
TXT6A     DC  X'8400'                   EOF & STATIC FLAGS.             03120000
          DC  Y(STE61B-STE61A)          STATIC TEXT LENGTH.             03130000

./  ADD  SSI=50780177,NAME=IDCTSUV0
* /* START OF SPECIFICATIONS ****                            @Y30LSMK   00008003

*01* MODULE-NAME = IDCTSUV0                                             00008803

         TITLE '***** IDCTSUV0 - UNIVERSAL STATIC TEXT *****'           00010002
**********************************************************************  00050002
*                                                                    *  00100002
* MODULE NAME - IDCTSUV0 - UNIVERSAL STATIC TEXT MODULE              *  00150002
*                                                                    *  00200002
* DESCRIPTIVE NAME - UNIVERSALLY USED STATIC TEXT.                   *  00250002
*                                                                    *  00300002
* COPYRIGHT - NONE                                                   *  00350002
*                                                                    *  00360002
* STATUS - RELEASE 2  LEVEL 0                                @Y30SSMK*  00370003
*                                                                    *  00380002
* FUNCTION - CONTAINS NO EXECUTABLE CODE, ONLY STATIC TEXT ENTRIES   *  00390002
*        USED BY MORE THAN ONE MODULE.                               *  00392002
*        THIS MODULE IS LOADED BY IDCTP05 WHEN A STATIC TEXT         *  00394002
*        REQUEST IS MADE.                                            *  00396002
*                                                                    *  00398002
* NOTES - NONE                                                       *  00398402
*                                                                    *  00398502
*    DEPENDENCIES - NONE                                             *  00398602
*    RESTRICTIONS - NONE                                             *  00398702
*    REGISTER CONVENTIONS - NA                                       *  00400902
*    PATCH AREA - NA                                                 *  00402902
*                                                                    *  00403402
* MODULE TYPE - TABLES                                               *  00405602
*                                                                    *  00407802
*    PROCESSOR - ASSEMBLER                                           *  00410002
*    MODULE SIZE - 1240                                      @Y30SSMK*  00412203
*    ATTRIBUTES - READ-ONLY                                          *  00414402
*                                                                    *  00416602
*  ENTRY POINT - NA                                                  *  00417002
*                                                                    *  00418602
*  EXIT NORMAL - NA                                                  *  00419002
*                                                                    *  00420602
*  EXIT ERROR - NA                                                   *  00421002
*                                                                    *  00422602
*  EXTERNAL REFERENCES - NA                                          *  00423002
*                                                                    *  00424602
*  TABLES - NA                                                       *  00424702
*                                                                    *  00425002
*  MACROS - NA                                                       *  00425102
*                                                                    *  00425402
**********************************************************************  00432403
*                                                                    *  00433302
**********************************************************************  00450002
*                                                                    *  00460002
* THIS MODULE CONTAINS THOSE MESSAGES THAT ARE COMMON TO ALL FSR'S   *  00470002
* AND IN SOME CASES OTHER SERVICE ROUTINES.                          *  00472002
*                                                                    *  00480002
**********************************************************************  00500002
*                                                                       00550002
IDCTSUV0 CSECT                                                          00600002
*                                                                       00650002
* THIS SECTION CONTAINS THE INDICES TO REACH AN ENTRY.                  00700002
*                                                                       00750002
INDEX    DC  H'15'                     COUNT OF ENTRIES.       @Y30SSMK 00800003
INDEX1   DC  Y(TXT1-INDEX)             FUNCTION CMPLTD NOPRINT @YL026UE 00850002
INDEX2   DC  Y(TXT2-INDEX)             PROCESSING COMPLETE.             00900002
INDEX3   DC  Y(TXT3-INDEX)             FUNCTION TERMINATED.             00950002
INDEX4   DC  Y(TXT4-INDEX)             INSUFF STORAGE.                  01000002
INDEX5   DC  Y(TXT5-INDEX)             RECORDS PROCESSED.               01010002
INDEX6   DC  Y(TXT6-INDEX)             POSITIONING ERROR.               01020002
INDEX7   DC  Y(TXT7-INDEX)             CATALOG ERROR MESSAGE.           01030002
INDEX8   DC  Y(TXT8-INDEX)             FUNCT NOT SUPPORTED.    @YL026UE 01040002
INDEX9   DC  Y(TXT9-INDEX)             FUNCTION COMPLETED.     @YL026UE 01042002
INDEX10  DC  Y(TXT10-INDEX)            CATALOG R.C. AND REASON @Y30SSMK 01044003
INDEX11  DC  Y(TXT11-INDEX)            UNABLE TO OPEN CATALOG  @Y30LSMK 01046103
INDEX12  DC  Y(TXT12-INDEX)            INSUFF MAIN STORAGE     @Y30LSMK 01048003
INDEX13  DC  Y(TXT13-INDEX)            ENTRY XXXX NOT FOUND    @ZA01484 01079202
INDEX14  DC  Y(TXT14-INDEX)            DUPLICATE DATA SET      @ZA01484 01089202
INDEX15  DC  Y(TXT15-INDEX)            TSO LASTCC MSG          @Y30SSMK 01089303
         EJECT                                                          01089602
**********************************************************************  01100002
*                                                                    *  01150002
* THIS SECTION CONTAINS THE ENTRIES.                                 *  01200002
*                                                                    *  01250002
**********************************************************************  01300002
*                                                                       01350002
* FUNCTION COMPLETED NORMALLY MESSAGE, NOT PRINTED IN TSO.     @YL026UE 01400002
*                                                                       01450002
TXT1     DC  Y(TXT1B-TXT1A)            ENTRY LENGTH.                    01500002
         DC  X'9000'                   MESSAGE FLAG.           @YL026UE 01550002
* SPACING CONTROL SUB-STRUCTURE.                                        01600002
TXT1A    DC  X'4000'                   SPACE CONTROL FLAG.              01650002
         DC  H'2'                      SPACING FACTOR.                  01700002
         DC  C'R '                     SPACING TYPE.                    01750002
* STATIC TEXT SUB-STRUCTURE.                                            01800002
         DC  X'0400'                   STATIC TEXT FLAG.                01850002
         DC  Y(STE11B-STE11A)          STATIC TEXT LENGTH.              01900002
         DC  Y(STE11A-TXT1A)           STATIC TEXT OFFSET.              01950002
         DC  H'1'                      PRINT COLUMN.                    02000002
         DC  Y(STE11B-STE11A)          PRINT FIELD LENGTH.              02050002
         DC  H'0'                      CONVERSION FLAGS.  (CHAR)        02100002
* BLOCK DATA SUBSTRUCTURE.                                              02150002
         DC  X'9000'                   BLOCK AND EOF FLAGS.             02200002
         DC  H'2'                      INPUT LENGTH.                    02250002
         DC  H'0'                      INPUT OFFSET.                    02300002
         DC  H'57'                     PRINT COLUMN.                    02350002

* DUPLICATE DATA SET NAME                                      @ZA01484 09917302
*                                                              @ZA01484 09927302
TXT14    DC   Y(TXT14B-TXT14A)         ENTRY LENGTH.           @ZA01484 09929302
         DC   X'8000'                  MESSAGE FLAG.           @ZA01484 09931302
* SPACING CONTROL SUB-STRUCTURE.                               @ZA01484 09933302
TXT14A   DC   X'4000'                  SPACE CONTROL FLAG.     @ZA01484 09935302
         DC   H'2'                     SPACING FACTOR.         @ZA01484 09935702
         DC   C'R '                    SPACING TYPE.           @ZA01484 09936102
* STATIC TEXT SUB-STRUCTURE.                                   @ZA01484 09936502
         DC   X'8400'                  EOB & STATIC TEXT FLAG. @ZA01484 09936902
         DC   Y(STE14B-STE14A)         STATIC TEXT LENGTH.     @ZA01484 09937002
         DC   Y(STE14A-TXT14A)         STATIC TEXT OFFSET.     @ZA01484 09937102
         DC   H'1'                     PRINT COLUMN.           @ZA01484 09937202
         DC   Y(STE14B-STE14A)         PRINT FIELD LENGTH.     @ZA01484 09987202
         DC   H'0'                                             @ZA01484 09997202
* STATIC TEXT ENTRY.                                           @ZA01484 10007202
STE14A   DC   C'IDC3013I DUPLICATE DATA SET NAME'              @ZA01484 10017202
STE14B   EQU  *                                                @ZA01484 10027202
TXT14B   EQU  *                                                @ZA01484 10029202
         EJECT                                                 @Y30SSMK 10029603
*                                                              @Y30SSMK 10031203
* TSO LASTCC MESSAGE.                                          @Y30SSMK 10033203
*                                                              @Y30SSMK 10035203
TXT15    DC  Y(TXT15B-TXT15A)          ENTRY LENGTH.           @Y30SSMK 10035603
         DC  X'8000'                   MESSAGE FLAG.           @ZA01484 10036003
* SPACING CONTROL SUB-STRUCTURE.                               @Y30SSMK 10036403
TXT15A   DC  X'4000'                   SPACE CONTROL FLAG.     @Y30SSMK 10036803
         DC  H'2'                      SPACING FACTOR.         @Y30SSMK 10036903
         DC  C'R '                     SPACING TYPE.           @Y30SSMK 10037003
* STATIC TEXT SUB-STRUCTURE.                                   @Y30SSMK 10037103
         DC  X'0400'                   STATIC TEXT FLAG.       @Y30SSMK 10087103
         DC  Y(STE151B-STE151A)        STATIC TEXT LENGTH.     @Y30SSMK 10097103
         DC  Y(STE151A-TXT15A)         STATIC TEXT OFFSET.     @Y30SSMK 10107103
         DC  H'1'                      PRINT COLUMN.           @Y30SSMK 10117103
         DC  Y(STE151B-STE151A)        PRINT FIELD LENGTH.     @Y30SSMK 10127103
         DC  H'0'                      CONVERSION FLAGS (CHAR) @Y30SSMK 10129103
* BLOCK DATA SUBSTRUCTURE.                                     @Y30SSMK 10131103
         DC  X'9000'                   BLOCK AND EOF FLAGS.    @Y30SSMK 10133103
         DC  H'2'                      INPUT LENGTH.           @Y30SSMK 10135103
         DC  H'0'                      INPUT OFFSET.           @Y30SSMK 10135503
         DC  H'17'                     PRINT COLUMN.           @Y30SSMK 10135903
         DC  H'3'                      PRINT FIELD LENGTH.     @Y30SSMK 10136303
         DC  X'1060'                   CONV FLAGS.  (BD,AL,SS) @Y30SSMK 10136703
* STATIC TEXT ENTRIES.                                         @Y30SSMK 10136803
STE151A  DC  C'IDC0014I LASTCC='                               @Y30SSMK 10136903
STE151B  EQU *                                                 @Y30SSMK 10137003
TXT15B   EQU *                                                 @Y30SSMK 10187003
         END                                                            10237003

**********************************************************************  00050002

*        FOR THE FUNCTION EXPORT                                     *  00392002

* THIS SECTIONS CONTAINS THE INDICES TO REACH AN ENTRY.                 00900002
*                                                                       00950002

INDEX2   DC  H'-1'                     NULL                             01100002

INDEX4   DC  Y(TXT4-INDEX)             REQUIRED CAT FIELD NOT FOUND     01200002

./  ADD  SSI=82010042,NAME=IDCVY01
         TITLE '*********** IDCVY01:  VERIFY FUNCTION SUPPORT ROUTINE **00001000
               *********'                                               00002000
        MACRO                                                           00003000
        GETMAIN &R,&LV=                                                 00004000
        L     REG15,0(REG1)           GDTTBL ADDRESS                    00005000
        L     REG15,GDTPRL(REG15)     PROL ROUTINE ADDRESS              00006000
        CNOP  2,4                     BOUNDARY ALIGNMENT                00007000
        LA    REG14,*+14              RETURN ADDRESS                    00008000
        BALR  REG1,REG15              LINKAGE TO PROL ROUTINE           00009000
        DC    A(MODID)                MODULE ID ADDRESS                 00010000
        DC    A(@SIZDATD)             AUTOMATIC STORAGE SIZE ADDRESS    00011000
        MEND                                                            00012000
IDCVY01  CSECT ,                                                   0002 00013000
@MAINENT DS    0H                                                  0002 00014000
         USING *,@15                                               0002 00015000
         B     @PROLOG                                             0002 00016000
         DC    AL1(16)                                             0002 00017000
         DC    C'IDCVY01   78.201'                                 0002 00018000
         DROP  @15                                                      00019000
@PROLOG  STM   @14,@12,12(@13)                                     0002 00020000
         BALR  @12,0                                               0002 00021000
@PSTART  DS    0H                                                  0002 00022000
         USING @PSTART,@12                                         0002 00023000
         L     @00,@SIZDATD                                        0002 00024000
         GETMAIN  R,LV=(0)                                              00025000
         LR    @11,@01                                             0002 00026000
         USING @DATD,@11                                           0002 00027000
         ST    @13,@SA00001+4                                      0002 00028000
         LM    @00,@01,20(@13)                                     0002 00029000
         ST    @11,8(,@13)                                         0002 00030000
         LR    @13,@11                                             0002 00031000
         MVC   @PC00001(12),0(@01)                                 0002 00032000
*                                      /*TSO NON-ZERO FUNCTION END   */ 00033000
*        /************************************************************/ 00034000
*        /*                                                          */ 00035000
*        /*  THIS IS THE CENTRAL SECTION OF THE VERIFY ROUTINE.      */ 00036000
*        /*  THIS SECTION PERFORMS INITIALIZATION AND TERMINATION    */ 00037000
*        /*  FUNCTIONS AND ROUTES CONTROL AMONG THE SUB-PROCEDURES.  */ 00038000
*        /*  ALL EXITS FROM THE VERIFY ROUTINE OCCUR FROM HERE.      */ 00039000
*        /*                                                          */ 00040000
*        /************************************************************/ 00041000
*                                                                  0154 00042000
*        OLDERID2 = NEWERID2;                                      0154 00043000
         L     @10,@PC00001                                        0154 00044000
         L     @15,GDTTR2(,@10)                                    0154 00045000
         MVC   @TS00001(95),NEWERID2(@15)                          0154 00046000
         MVC   OLDERID2(95,@15),@TS00001                           0154 00047000
*        NEWID2 = 'VYST';                                          0155 00048000
*                                                                  0155 00049000
         MVC   NEWID2(4,@15),@CC00614                              0155 00050000
*        IF GDTDBG = NULLPTR                                       0156 00051000
*          THEN;                                                   0156 00052000
         L     @10,GDTDBG(,@10)                                    0156 00053000
         LTR   @10,@10                                             0156 00054000
         BZ    @RT00156                                            0156 00055000
*          ELSE                                                    0158 00056000
*            CALL IDCDB010 (GDTTBL,'VYBG');                        0158 00057000
*                                                                  0158 00058000
         L     @10,@PC00001                                        0158 00059000
         ST    @10,@AL00001                                        0158 00060000
         LA    @15,@CC00615                                        0158 00061000
         ST    @15,@AL00001+4                                      0158 00062000
         MVI   @AL00001+4,X'80'                                    0158 00063000
         L     @15,GDTDBG(,@10)                                    0158 00064000
         LA    @01,@AL00001                                        0158 00065000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             0158 00066000
*        /************************************************************/ 00067000
*        /*                                                          */ 00068000
*        /*  INITIALIZE THE PRINT ARGUMENT LIST                      */ 00069000
*        /*                                                          */ 00070000
*        /************************************************************/ 00071000
*                                                                  0159 00072000
*        DDSTRU = ADDR (PRINTTAB);                                 0159 00073000
@RT00156 LA    @10,PRINTTAB                                        0159 00074000
         ST    @10,DDSTRU                                          0159 00075000
*        PRINTTAB = ''B;                                           0160 00076000
*                                                                  0160 00077000
         XC    PRINTTAB(20),PRINTTAB                               0160 00078000
*        /************************************************************/ 00079000
*        /*                                                          */ 00080000
*        /*  OPEN THE VSAM DATA SET SPECIFIED ON THE VERIFY COMMAND  */ 00081000
*        /*                                                          */ 00082000
*        /************************************************************/ 00083000
*                                                                  0161 00084000
*        CALL OPENPROC;                                            0161 00085000
*                                                                  0161 00086000
         BAL   @14,OPENPROC                                        0161 00087000
*        /************************************************************/ 00088000
*        /*                                                          */ 00089000
*        /*  IF THE OPEN WAS SUCCESSFUL, CALL THE VSAM CATALOG TO    */ 00090000
*        /*  VERIFY THE DATA SET.                                    */ 00091000
*        /*                                                          */ 00092000
*        /************************************************************/ 00093000
*                                                                  0162 00094000
*        IF IOCSPTR>0  &  (IOCMSGOP=ON  |  IOCVRC=116)     /*@OZ32758*/ 00095000
*          THEN                                                    0162 00096000
         L     @10,IOCSPTR                                         0162 00097000
         LTR   @10,@10                                             0162 00098000
         BNP   @RF00162                                            0162 00099000
         TM    IOCMSGOP(@10),B'00100000'                           0162 00100000
         BO    @RT00162                                            0162 00101000
         CLC   IOCVRC(4,@10),@CF00619                              0162 00102000
         BNE   @RF00162                                            0162 00103000
@RT00162 DS    0H                                                  0163 00104000
*            DO;                                                   0163 00105000
*                                                                  0163 00106000
*            CALL IDCIOVY0 (GDTTBL,IOCSPTR);                       0164 00107000
*                                                                  0164 00108000
         L     @10,@PC00001                                        0164 00109000
         ST    @10,@AL00001                                        0164 00110000
         LA    @05,IOCSPTR                                         0164 00111000
         ST    @05,@AL00001+4                                      0164 00112000
         MVI   @AL00001+4,X'80'                                    0164 00113000
         L     @15,GDTVFY(,@10)                                    0164 00114000
         LA    @01,@AL00001                                        0164 00115000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             0164 00116000
*            RESPECIFY RTNREG RSTD;                                0165 00117000
*            TESTRC = RTNREG;                                      0166 00118000
         LR    TESTRC,RTNREG                                       0166 00119000
*            RESPECIFY RTNREG UNRSTD;                              0167 00120000
*            IF TESTRC ¬= 0                                        0168 00121000
*              THEN                                                0168 00122000
         LTR   TESTRC,TESTRC                                       0168 00123000
         BZ    @RF00168                                            0168 00124000
*                LASTCOND = LASTCC12;                              0169 00125000
         L     @10,@PC00001+8                                      0169 00126000
         MVC   LASTCOND(2,@10),@CH00570                            0169 00127000
*            END;                                                  0170 00128000
*          ELSE                                                    0171 00129000
*            LASTCOND = LASTCC12;                          /*@Y30SSMK*/ 00130000
*                                                                  0171 00131000
         B     @RC00162                                            0171 00132000
@RF00162 L     @10,@PC00001+8                                      0171 00133000
         MVC   LASTCOND(2,@10),@CH00570                            0171 00134000
*        /************************************************************/ 00135000
*        /*                                                          */ 00136000
*        /*  TERMINATION PROCESSING - CLOSE THE VSAM DATA SET        */ 00137000
*        /*                                                          */ 00138000
*        /************************************************************/ 00139000
*                                                                  0172 00140000
*        IF GDTDBG = NULLPTR                                       0172 00141000
*          THEN;                                                   0172 00142000
@RC00162 L     @10,@PC00001                                        0172 00143000
         L     @10,GDTDBG(,@10)                                    0172 00144000
         LTR   @10,@10                                             0172 00145000
         BZ    @RT00172                                            0172 00146000
*          ELSE                                                    0174 00147000
*            CALL IDCDB010 (GDTTBL,'VYND');                        0174 00148000
*                                                                  0174 00149000
         L     @10,@PC00001                                        0174 00150000
         ST    @10,@AL00001                                        0174 00151000
         LA    @15,@CC00620                                        0174 00152000
         ST    @15,@AL00001+4                                      0174 00153000
         MVI   @AL00001+4,X'80'                                    0174 00154000
         L     @15,GDTDBG(,@10)                                    0174 00155000
         LA    @01,@AL00001                                        0174 00156000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             0174 00157000
*        CALL TERMPROC;                                            0175 00158000
@RT00172 BAL   @14,TERMPROC                                        0175 00159000
*        RESPECIFY RTNREG RSTD;                                    0176 00160000
*        TESTRC = RTNREG;                                          0177 00161000
         LR    TESTRC,RTNREG                                       0177 00162000
*        RESPECIFY RTNREG UNRSTD;                                  0178 00163000
*        LASTCOND = MAX (LASTCOND,TESTRC);                         0179 00164000
*                                                                  0179 00165000

        GETMAIN &R,&LV=                                                 00004000

        L     REG15,GDTPRL(REG15)     PROL ROUTINE ADDRESS              00006000
        CNOP  2,4                     BOUNDARY ALIGNMENT                00007000
